source: blizzard
target: 暴雪

source: A blizzard is swirling here.
target: 这里刮起了一阵暴风雪。

source: confusion gas
target: 致眩气体

source: A cloud of confusion gas is swirling here.
target: 这里盘绕着一片致眩气体。

source: electricity
target: 电场

source: A field of electricity is sparking brightly here.
target: 火花在这片电场中不断闪烁着。

source: Electrocuted
target: 触电

source: You were shocked to death...
target: 你因触电而亡...

source: fire
target: 火焰

source: A fire is raging here.
target: 一团火焰正在这里肆虐。

source: foliage
target: 落叶

source: Shafts of light pierce the gloom of the underground garden.
target: 光柱刺破了地下花园中的黑暗。

source: freezing air
target: 冰霜

source: The air is unnaturally frigid here.
target: 这里的空气寒冷刺骨，很不寻常。

source: dark energy
target: 黑暗能量

source: Specks of dark energy are swarming here!
target: 黑暗能量正在这里涌动！

source: inferno
target: 狱火

source: An inferno is raging here.
target: 一阵狱火正在这里肆虐。

source: paralytic gas
target: 麻痹气体

source: A cloud of paralytic gas is swirling here.
target: 这里盘绕着一片麻痹气体。

source: regrowth
target: 草木再生

source: sacrificial fire
target: 献祭之火

source: There is an altar here with a sacrificial fire burning atop it. Any creature that's killed here will be consumed as an offering to the spirits of the dungeon.\n\nPerhaps a reward will be given if enough sacrifices are made?
target: 这是一个承载着献祭之火的祭坛。在此殒命的生物都将成为献给地牢幽魂的祭品。\n\n或许献祭够多，就能得到回报？

source: The fire consumes your offering and grows stronger.
target: 火焰吞噬了你的祭品，燃烧得愈加旺盛。

source: The fire consumes your offering, but doesn't change.
target: 火焰吞噬了你的祭品，然而没有任何变化。

source: The fire flares and then dissipates, leaving a reward behind!
target: 火焰骤然升腾，继而消散，并留下一份奖励！

source: smokescreen
target: 烟幕

source: A cloud of thick black smoke is swirling here.
target: 这里翻腾着一团浓密的黑烟。

source: stench gas
target: 腐臭气体

source: A cloud of fetid stench is swirling here.
target: 这里盘绕着一片腐烂的臭气。

source: storm clouds
target: 暴雨

source: A cloud of billowing water vapor is swirling here.
target: 这里盘绕着一片翻腾的水汽。

source: toxic gas
target: 毒气

source: A greenish cloud of toxic gas is swirling here.
target: 这里盘绕着一片发绿的毒气。

source: Suffocated
target: 窒息而死

source: You died from the toxic gas...
target: 你被毒气毒死了...

source: corrosive gas
target: 腐蚀酸雾

source: A cloud of deadly caustic gas is swirling here.
target: 这里盘绕着一片致命的腐蚀酸雾。

source: water of awareness
target: 觉察之泉

source: As you take a sip, you feel knowledge pour into your mind.
target: 在你小酌一口时，你感觉到知识涌入了你的头脑。

source: Power of knowledge radiates from the water of this well. Drinking from the well will fully identify all equipped items, identify curses on all items in your inventory, and reveal all items on the current floor.
target: 知识的力量正在从这口井的水里涌出。饮下井中的水将会鉴定所有已装备的物品、探测背包中所有物品的诅咒并揭示本层所有物品的位置。

source: water of health
target: 生命之泉

source: As you take a sip, you feel your wounds heal completely.
target: 你小酌一口后，立刻感到所有伤口都痊愈了。

source: Power of health radiates from the water of this well. Drinking from this well will heal your wounds, satisfy hunger, and cleanse curses on any worn items.
target: 生命的力量正在从这口井的水里涌出。饮下井中的水可以治疗伤口、解除饥饿并净化所有已装备物品的诅咒。

source: spider web
target: 蛛网

source: A thick web is covering everything here. Anything that touches or is thrown through the web will break it, but will also be stuck in place.
target: 这里所有东西都被厚厚的蜘蛛网覆盖着。任何接触或丢向蛛网的东西都会打破它，但也都会被固定在原地。

source: adrenaline
target: 激素涌动

source:
A surge of physical power, adrenaline enhanced both attack and movement speed.

Adrenaline allows its target to run at 2x speed, and attack at 1.5x speed.

Turns remaining: %s.
target:
由肾上腺素带来的纯粹的潜能爆发，激素涌动能够增强一名角色的移动和攻击速度。

激素涌动允许角色拥有2倍的移动速度和1.5倍的攻击速度。

激素涌动持续时间：%s回合

source: strength boost
target: 力量激发

source:
A surge of great might, but sadly not permanent.

Strength boost: +%d.
Turns until boost weakens: %s.
target:
一股强大的力量，不过很可惜不是永久的。

力量加成：+%d
距离效果衰减还有：%s回合

source: amok
target: 狂乱

source:
Amok causes a state of great rage and confusion in its target.

When a creature is amoked, they will attack whatever is near them, whether they be friend or foe.

Turns of amok remaining: %s.
target:
狂乱会导致目标陷入极度愤怒和混乱的状态。

狂乱的生物会不分敌我地攻击任何靠近它们的人。

狂乱效果的剩余时长：%s回合

source: arcane armor
target: 奥术护甲

source:
A thin shield is surrounding you, blocking some of the damage from magical attacks.

Your magical armor is currently boosted by: 0-%d.

Turns until arcane armor weakens: %s.
target:
一层淡薄的护盾环绕着你，可为你抵挡一定的魔法伤害。

当前你的魔法护甲为：0~%d

距离奥术护甲衰减还有：%s回合

source: artifact recharging
target: 神器充能

source:
Energy is coursing through you, increasing the rate your equipped artifacts charge.

Each artifact is affected a little differently, but they will all gain charge much faster than normal.

Turns remaining: %s.
target:
魔力在你体内奔腾而过，提高你手中神器的充能速率。

每件神器受到的影响都不尽相同，但它们的充能速率都会大幅提升。

神器充能剩余时长：%s回合

source: amulet's curse
target: 护符诡咒

source: Somehow Yog-Dzewa is maintaining influence on this world through the amulet, and is trying to stop your ascent!\n\nYog's power is making the dungeon much more dangerous, increasing the number of enemies and making them stronger! This power will keep building if left unchecked, it can be weakened by defeating enemies that have been enhanced by Yog's power.
target: 不知为何古神仍能借护符维系自己对这个世界的影响，祂正借此设法阻止你向上返程！\n\n古神运用祂的力量使你的敌人变得更为众多、强大，整座地牢也因此变得更危险了！所幸你可以通过击败古神所加强过的敌人来削弱他的力量，若是置之不理则只会使古神之力愈发强大。

source: The dark energy radiating from the amulet has been weakened as much as possible for now.
target: 护符中散发出的黑暗能量现今已被最大程度的削弱了。

source: The amulet is currently _calling out to distant enemies,_ alerting them to your position.
target: 护符正在_呼唤远处的敌人_，向它们通告你的位置。

source: The amulet is currently _hastening distant enemies,_ letting them reach you faster!
target: 护符正在_为远处的敌人加速_，令它们得以更快接近你！

source: The amulet is currently _slowing you down,_ and negating speed boosting effects!
target: 护符正在_使你减速_，并阻止了一切加速效果！

source: The energy from the amulet has gotten so strong that it's _directly harming you!_
target: 护符中涌动的黑暗能量已极为强大，它正在_直接对你造成伤害_！

source: The amulet begins calling out to distant enemies.
target: 护符开始呼唤远处的敌人前来。

source: The amulet begins hastening distant enemies!
target: 护符开始为周遭的敌人提升移速！

source: The amulet starts to feel like a lead weight in your inventory!
target: 你背包中的护符此刻恍如重逾千钧！

source: The amulet begins radiating dark energy. It burns!
target: 护符开始释放黑暗能量。此物灼烫难忍！

source: The amulet's curse can be weakened by defeating more enemies.
target: 护符的诅咒可通过击败更多敌人来削弱。

source: If you defeat enemies the amulet's curse will weaken!
target: 如果你击败敌人，护符的诅咒就会被削弱！

source: You can feel the amulet's curse weaken slightly.
target: 你能感受到护符上的诅咒正缓慢地消退。

source: You take a moment to catch your breath and feel your wounds begin to close!
target: 你稍作喘息，感受到身上的伤口开始愈合！

source: You feel Yog's grip on the amulet begin to weaken, you're almost there!
target: 你能感觉到古神对护符的掌控愈发微弱了起来，胜利的曙光已然在你面前！

source: The dark energy consumes you...
target: 黑暗能量吞噬了你...

source: barkskin
target: 树肤

source:
Your skin is hardened, it feels rough and solid like bark.

The hardened skin increases your effective armor, allowing you to better defend against physical attack.

Your armor is currently increased by: 0-%d.
Turns until barkskin weakens: %s.

If you receive barkskin from multiple sources, only the strongest one will apply.
target:
你的皮肤硬化了，摸起来如同树皮般粗糙而坚固。

硬化的皮肤增强了你的护甲，使你能更好地抵御物理攻击。

当前增加的护甲：0~%d
距离效果衰减还有：%s回合

从多个来源获得树肤效果时，只有效果最强的那一个会起效。

source: barrier
target: 奥术屏障

source:
A durable bubble of force which blocks all damage.

The barrier will take damage for whatever it is protecting so long as there is shielding left. The shielding will also slowly decay over time.

Shielding remaining: %d.
target:
一团可以抵挡全部伤害的能量屏障。

只要奥术屏障的能量仍然存在，它将完全抵挡单位所受到的任何伤害。同时这种能量会随时间逐渐衰减。

护盾能量剩余：%d

source: angered
target: 愤怒

source: berserking
target: 狂暴

source: exhausted
target: 力竭

source: recovering
target: 恢复

source:
The severity of the Berserker's injuries strengthen his blows. As the berserker takes physical damage, his rage will build, granting him bonus damage. Damage which is blocked by armor still counts towards building rage.

Rage will fade over time. The lower the berserker's health, the longer it will last.

At 100%% rage, the Berserker can go berserk, granting him shielding based on the level of his armor and his missing health. While berserking, his shielding decays over time and once it runs out he will have to rest before building rage again.

Current Rage: _%1$.0f%%_
_+%2$.0f%%_ damage

Berserk shield at current armor and HP: _%3$d_
target:
狂战士受伤的严重程度会增强他的攻击。每当狂战士受到物理伤害时，他会积累怒气并获得额外伤害，被护甲格挡的伤害仍可作为怒气积累。

怒气会随时间消逝，狂战士生命值越低，怒气留存时间越长。

狂战士可以100%%的怒气进入狂暴，使他获得基于护甲等级与已损生命值的护盾。狂暴时，他的护盾会随时间衰减，而且其一旦耗尽则他必须稍作休息之后才能再次积累怒气。

当前怒气：_%1$.0f%%_
_+%2$.0f%%_伤害

当前护甲与生命值的狂暴护盾：_%3$d_

source:
Fear and uncertainty bleed away, leaving only anger. In this state the Berserker is extremely powerful, _dealing +50%% damage and gaining bonus shielding,_ but also losing shielding every turn.

When all of his shielding is reduced to 0, berserking will end.

After raging, the Berserker will need to recover before being able to build rage again.

Shield Remaining: %d
target:
恐惧与疑虑已然消散，只余满腔怒火。在这种狂暴状态下，狂战士将无比强大，_造成50%%额外伤害并获得额外护盾_，但每回合都会损失部分护盾。

当其所有护盾归零时，狂暴将会结束。

狂暴过后，狂战士需要稍作休息才能再次积累怒气。

剩余护盾值：%d

source: Inner strength has its limits. The Berserker must rest before using his rage again.\n\nWhile recovering the Berserker does not build any rage from taking damage.
target: 内在潜力是有限的。狂战士必须充分休息才能再次释放他的怒火。\n\n恢复状态下的狂战士无法从伤痛中积累怒气。

source: Turns until recovered: _%d_
target: 恢复所需回合数：%d

source: Levels until recovered: _%.2f_
target: 恢复所需等级：%.2f

source: Berserked to Death
target: 暴走至死

source: Berserk
target: 狂暴

source: You need your broken seal to berserk!
target: 你需要破损纹章才能进入狂暴！

source: bleeding
target: 流血

source: You bled to death...
target: 你因失血过多而死...

source: You are bleeding!
target: 你正在流血！

source: Bled to Death
target: 流血致死

source:
That wound is leaking a worrisome amount of blood.

Bleeding causes damage every turn. Each turn the damage decreases by a random amount, until the bleeding eventually stops.

Current bleed damage: %d.
target:
伤口正在令人不安地涌出大量血液。

流血每回合都会造成伤害。每回合这个伤害数值都会随机减少，直到出血最终停止。

当前流血伤害：%d

source: blessed
target: 赐福

source:
A great burst of focus, some say it is inspired by the gods.

Blessing increases accuracy and evasion by 25%%, making the blessed much more effective in combat.

Turns of bless remaining: %s.
target:
你的集中力正在喷薄而出，有人说这是神赐的礼物。

赐福状态能够提高自己25%%的精准与闪避属性，使被赐福者在战斗中势如破竹。

赐福效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: blinded
target: 失明

source: You are blinded!
target: 你失明了！

source:
Blinding turns the surrounding world into a dark haze.

While blinded, a character's vision range is reduced to one tile, rendering ranged attacks useless and making it very easy to lose track of distant enemies. Additionally, a blinded hero is unable to read scrolls or books.

Turns of blindness remaining: %s.
target:
失明使周遭的一切陷入黑暗。

失明时，单位的视距被减少至一格，致使远程攻击难堪大用，并使其很容易失去对远处敌人的追踪。此外，失明的英雄无法阅读卷轴或书籍。

失明效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: burning
target: 燃烧

source: You catch fire!
target: 你着火了！

source: %s burns up!
target: %s被烧毁了！

source: You burned to death...
target: 你被燃烧至死...

source: Burned to Ash
target: 燃烧殆尽

source:
Few things are more distressing than being engulfed in flames.

Fire will deal damage every turn until it is put out by water or it expires. Fire can be extinguished by stepping into water, or from the splash of a shattering potion.

Additionally, the fire may ignite flammable terrain or items that it comes into contact with.

Turns of burning remaining: %s.
target:
没什么比被火焰吞没更痛苦了。

火焰每回合都会造成伤害，直到它被液体扑灭或者自行消散。火会在你进入水中时熄灭，打碎药瓶产生的水花也具有同样的效果。

此外，火焰还会点燃所有接触到的可燃地形与可燃物。

燃烧效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: You sense a deadly presence.
target: 你感受到了强敌的气场。

source: blazing champion
target: 烈焰精英

source: Blazing champions deal 25% more melee damage, ignite enemies they attack, are immune to fire, and spread fire around them as they die. They can't spread fire onto water however.
target: 烈焰精英造成25%额外近战伤害，会点燃攻击目标，免疫火焰，且会在死亡时引燃周遭。不过，它们的火焰无法向水上蔓延。

source: projecting champion
target: 索敌精英

source: Projecting champions deal 25% more melee damage and have +3 attack range.
target: 索敌精英拥有25%额外近战伤害，且拥有额外的3格近战攻击距离。

source: antimagic champion
target: 敌法精英

source: Antimagic champions take 50% less damage and are completely immune to magical effects.
target: 敌法精英拥有50%的伤害减免，且完全免疫所有魔法效果。

source: giant champion
target: 巨型精英

source: Giant champions take 80% less damage and have +1 attack range, but cannot move through enclosed spaces.
target: 巨型精英拥有80%的伤害减免与额外的1格近战攻击距离，但无法进入狭窄的空间。

source: blessed champion
target: 天佑精英

source: Blessed champions have 4x accuracy and evasion.
target: 天佑精英拥有4倍精准与闪避。

source: growing champion
target: 成长精英

source:
Growing champions gain a steadily increasing bonus to accuracy, evasion, physical damage, and a reduction to damage taken.

Current acc/eva/dmg boost: %1$d%%
Current damage reduction: %2$d%%
target:
成长精英可额外获得稳定增长的精准、闪避、物理伤害与伤害减免。

当前精准/闪避/伤害加成：%1$d%%
当前伤害减免：%2$d%%

source: charmed
target: 魅惑

source: You are charmed!
target: 你被魅惑了！

source: You are charmed by that enemy and can't attack them.
target: 你被目标敌人魅惑了，因此无法对其发起攻击。

source:
A charm is manipulative magic that can make enemies temporarily adore each other.

Characters affected by charm are unable to directly attack the enemy they are charmed by. Attacking other targets is still possible however. The shock of pain will lessen the duration of charm.

Turns of charm remaining: %s.
target:
魅惑是一种能让一对夙敌暂时陷入互相倾慕的控制类魔法。

被魅惑的单位将无法对魅惑施行者进行直接攻击，但依然可以攻击其他敌人。伤痛会激醒被魅惑单位，减少魅惑状态的持续时间。

魅惑效果剩余时间：%s回合

source: chilled
target: 冻伤

source: %s freezes!
target: %s冻住了！

source:
Not quite frozen, but still much too cold.

Chilled targets perform all actions more slowly, depending on how many turns are left in the effect. At its worst, this is equivalent to being slowed.

Turns of chill remaining: %1$s.
Speed is reduced by: %2$s%%
target:
还没有完全冻住，不过已经非常冷了。

冻伤的目标所有行动都会更加缓慢，减速程度取决于剩余的冻伤效果时间。最严重的冻伤情况等同于迟缓效果。

冻伤效果剩余时长：%1$s回合
当前减少的速度：%2$s%%

source: combo
target: 连击

source: combo attack
target: 连击

source: %d hit combo!
target: %d连击！

source: You must target an enemy in attack range.
target: 你的目标必须是攻击距离以内的敌人。

source: Select a target to attack.
target: 选择一个攻击目标

source:
The gladiator builds momentum as he lands successful blows. Each attack increases the combo counter by one, but taking too long between hits will reset the combo counter to 0. While the gladiator has combo any shielding he has from his broken seal will not start to fade.

Building combo unlocks special combo attacks that cannot miss! A different attack is unlocked at 2, 4, 6, 8, and 10 combo count. Some moves reset combo and some do not, but each move can only be used once per combo session.

Current combo: %1$d.

Turns until Combo is lost: %2$s.
target:
角斗士在成功击中对手时会积累战斗气势。每次攻击命中都会增加1次连击，但长时间不进行攻击，连击数就会归零。只要角斗士仍在积攒连击，其破碎纹章提供的护盾就不会衰减。
积攒连击可以激活必定命中的连击战技！当连击数到达2、4、6、8、10时可分别激活不同的连击战技。部分连击战技会重置连击数，部分则不会，但每种连击战技在每次连击中只能使用一次。

当前连击：%1$d

连击归零剩余回合：%2$s

source: clobber
target: 冲击

source: Knocks an enemy back 2 tiles, but deals no damage and cannot knock into pits. Increments combo by 1.
target: 将一名敌人击退2格，但不造成伤害，也不能将其击落深渊。提升1点连击数。

source: Knocks an enemy back _3 tiles, inflicts vertigo, and can knock into pits,_ but deals no damage. Increments combo by 1.
target: 将一名敌人_击退3格，施加眩晕，并且可以将其击落深渊_，但不造成伤害。提升1点连击数。

source: slam
target: 撞击

source: Deals %d%% (combo*20%%) of your damage blocking power as bonus damage. Resets combo when used.
target: 造成等同于自身防御%d%%(连击数x20%%)的额外伤害。使用后重置连击数。

source: _Leaps up to %1$d tile(s)_ and deals %2$d%% (combo*20%%) of your damage blocking power as bonus damage. Resets combo when used.
target: _跳跃最多%1$d格以接近目标_，并对其造成等同于自身防御%2$d%%(连击数x20%%)的额外伤害。使用后重置连击数。

source: parry
target: 招架

source: Blocks the next attack within 1 turn when activated, and instantly retaliates to it. Resets combo if nothing is parried.
target: 使用后，招架下一回合内受到的首次攻击，并立即进行反击。若未触发招架，则重置连击数。

source: Blocks _all attacks_ within 1 turn when activated, and instantly retaliates to them. Resets combo if nothing is parried.
target: 使用后，招架下一回合内受到的_所有攻击_，并立即进行反击。若未触发招架，则重置连击数。

source: crush
target: 横扫

source: Deals %d%% (combo*25%%) damage to the primary target, and half that damage to all other enemies in a 7x7 AOE. Resets combo when used.
target: 对目标造成%d%%(连击数x25%%)的伤害，并对7x7范围内的其它敌人造成一半伤害。使用后重置连击数。

source: _Leaps up to %1$d tile(s)_ and deals %2$d%% (combo*25%%) damage to the primary target, and half that damage to all other enemies in a 7x7 AOE. Resets combo when used.
target: _跳跃最多%1$d格以接近目标_，对主要目标造成%2$d%%（连击数x25%%）的伤害，并对7x7范围内的其它敌人造成一半伤害。使用后重置连击数。

source: fury
target: 暴雨

source: Hits an enemy once for each combo you have, each hit deals 60% damage and can trigger enchantments. Resets combo when used.
target: 你每有1点连击数便对一个敌人攻击一次，每次攻击造成60%伤害，并可触发武器附魔。使用后重置连击数。

source: _Leaps up to %d tile(s)_ and hits an enemy once for each combo you have, each hit deals 60%% damage and can trigger enchantments. Resets combo when used.
target: _跳跃最多%d格以接近目标_，并根据你当前的连击数对敌人发动同等次数的攻击，每次攻击造成60%%的伤害并可触发附魔效果。使用后重置连击数。

source: corrupted
target: 腐化

source:
Corruption seeps into the essence of a being, twisting them against their former nature.

Corrupted creatures will attack their allies, and ignore their former enemies. Corruption is damaging as well, and will slowly cause its target to succumb.

Corruption is permanent, its effects only end in death.
target:
腐化魔法会侵入生物体的生命本质，扭转他们原有的天性。

被腐化的生物会攻击他们的盟友，还会忽视其原先的敌人。腐化效果同时也是有伤害性的，会导致其目标缓慢走向死亡。

腐化是永久性的，死后才能解脱。

source: crippled
target: 残废

source: You are crippled!
target: 你残废了！

source:
You're pretty sure legs aren't meant to bend that way.

Crippled halves movement speed, making moving a tile usually take two turns instead of one.

Turns of cripple remaining: %s.
target:
你很确定自己的腿不该折成那样。

残废会减半移动速度，移动一格会消耗二回合而不是正常情况下的一回合。

残废效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: dazed
target: 恍惚

source: You are dazed!
target: 你感到头晕目眩！

source:
Ringing ears and blurred vision make it difficult to fight.

While dazed, accuracy and evasion are reduced by 50%%, making both landing and evading blows much harder.

Turns of daze remaining: %s.
target:
耳畔嗡鸣，视野模糊，战斗因此变得十分困难。

在恍惚状态下，精准和闪避都会减少50%%，使得命中和躲避都变得更加困难。

剩余回合数：%s

source: degraded
target: 降级

source: Your equipment feels weaker!
target: 你的装备被暂时弱化了！

source:
Powerful dark magic is sapping the strength that scrolls of upgrade have applied to your equipment!

While degraded, upgraded gear will be treated as if it is a lower level than it actually is. _Every upgrade after +3 becomes exponentially weaker than the last one._ The descriptions of your items will change to reflect their reduced power level.

Degradation does not affect strength requirements, wand charges, durability of thrown weapons, or artifacts.

Turns of degradation remaining: %s. Using a scroll of upgrade or remove curse will end degradation immediately.
target:
强大的黑暗魔法正在吞噬升级卷轴注入你装备的魔力！

降级状态下的装备会被视作比起原有等级更低的状态。_超过3级的每次升级都会遭受愈加严重的反噬。_物品的描述也会根据降级的影响而改变。

不过，降级不会影响装备的力量需求，法杖充能，投武耐久以及神器。

降级效果剩余时长：%s回合

使用一张升级卷轴或祛邪卷轴可以立即驱散这种黑暗魔法。

source: doomed
target: 定命

source:
It's hard to keep going when it seems like the universe wants you dead.

Doomed characters will receive +67% damage from all sources.

Doom is permanent, its effects only end in death.
target:
当整个宇宙都看起来想置你于死地时，继续斗争还有什么意义呢？

被定命的角色受到的任何伤害都会提升67%。

定命是永久性的，死后才能解脱。

source: dread
target: 魂飞魄散

source:
A terror so great that it will cause its target to flee the dungeon entirely!

Creatures affected by dread will run from their opponent at high speed, and will disappear from the dungeon entirely once they are out of sight. Enemies that are defeated this way award half experience and drop no items. The shock of pain will lessen the duration of dread.

Turns of dread remaining: %d.
target:
令人魂飞魄散的恐慌正在驱使目标尝试逃出这座地牢！

魂飞魄散状态下的生物将快速逃离它们的敌人，并且会在脱离敌人视野后立即消失在整座地牢中。逃离的敌人不会掉落道具，只会给予玩家减半的经验值奖励。伤害所造成的痛楚将促使其镇定下来。

魂飞魄散效果剩余时长：%d回合

source: drowsy
target: 催眠

source:
A magical force is making it difficult to stay awake, after a few turns, the target will fall into a deep magical sleep.

The hero can resist drowsiness by taking damage or by being at full health.

Turns until sleep: %s.
target:
一股魔法力量使目标很难保持清醒，几个回合后，目标将会深陷魔法睡眠。

对于英雄，若在本应睡着的那一回合为满生命值或在这个过程中受到了伤害，魔法睡眠则不会生效。

入睡所需回合数：%s回合

source: imbued with earth
target: 大地之力

source:
You are imbued with the power of earth!

All physical attacks will shift the earth under the enemy, crippling them for a short time.

Turns of earth imbue remaining: %s.
target:
你被灌注了大地的力量！

直到该效果结束前，你所有的物理攻击都会使敌人脚下的地面发生变化，使它们残废一段时间。

大地之力剩余时长：%s回合

source: enhanced rings
target: 戒指强化

source: The Rogue's recently used artifact is empowering his rings, granting them +1 level.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
target: 盗贼在使用神器时强化了他的戒指，使它们获得+1升级。\n\n剩余回合数：%s

source: imbued with fire
target: 烈焰之力

source:
You are imbued with the power of fire!

All physical attacks will have a chance to light enemies ablaze. Additionally, you are completely immune to the effects of fire.

Turns of fire imbue remaining: %s.
target:
你被灌注了烈焰的力量！

所有物理攻击都有机会使敌人燃烧。与此同时你对火焰完全免疫。

烈焰之力剩余时长：%s回合

source: foresight
target: 危险预知

source:
You are somehow able to see the layout of surrounding terrain with your mind.

While under the effect of foresight all tiles in a wide radius are revealed to you, including any secret traps or doors.

Turns of foresight remaining: %s.
target:
不知为何，你的脑海中映射出了周遭的地形。

危险预知状态持续时，你周遭大范围的地格都会被揭示，包括隐藏门与陷阱。

危险预知效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: frozen
target: 冻结

source: %s freezes!
target: %s冻住了！

source:
Not to be confused with freezing solid, this more benign freezing simply encases the target in ice.

Freezing acts similarly to paralysis, making it impossible for the target to act. Unlike paralysis, freezing is immediately cancelled if the target takes damage, as the ice will shatter.

Turns of freeze remaining: %s.
target:
不要与冻成冰雕混淆，这种温和的冰冻只是把目标包裹在冰里。

冻结效果类似于麻痹，使目标不能行动。与麻痹不同的是，冻结效果会在目标受到伤害时立即消失，因为冰会碎。

剩余的冻结效果时长：%s回合

source: imbued with frost
target: 寒霜之力

source:
You are imbued with icy power!

All physical attacks will steadily stack chill on enemies. Additionally, you are completely immune to the cold.

Turns of frost imbue remaining: %s.
target:
你被灌注了寒霜的力量！

所有的物理攻击都会在敌人身上累加冻伤效果。与此同时你对寒冷完全免疫。

寒霜之力剩余时长：%s回合

source: furious
target: 愤怒

source: You become furious!
target: 你陷入了暴怒之中！

source:
You are angry, enemies won't like you when you're angry.

A great rage burns within you, increasing the damage you deal with physical attacks by 50%%.

This rage will last as long as you are injured below 50%% health.
target:
你非常暴怒，很明显敌人并不喜欢这样的你。

一股猛烈的怒火在你体内燃烧，增加你50%%的物理攻击伤害。

只要你的生命还低于上限的50%%，该效果就会存在。

source: purification barrier
target: 净化屏障

source:
Some strange force is encasing you in a thin protective barrier, blocking out all harmful airborne effects.

You are immune to all area-bound effects while this barrier lasts.

Turns of immunity remaining: %s.
target:
一种奇怪的能量环绕在你的周围，为你阻挡有害的环境效果。

在净化屏障的持续时间内，你将免疫所有负面环境效果。

免疫效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: gravity chaos
target: 重力混乱

source: Every few turns all characters on the current dungeon floor will be thrown in a random direction.
target: 每经几回合，当前楼层的所有单位都会被抛向某个随机方向。

source: You and your allies seem to be immune though.
target: 然而你和你的盟友似乎对此免疫。

source: It's not clear how long the effect will last for, but it can't last forever.
target: 重力混乱会持续多久不得而知，但其不会一直持续下去。

source: greater haste
target: 飞影

source:
An incredible boost of speed, for a moment it feels as if everything else is standing still.

While under the effects of greater haste moving actions take no time at all, but other actions are still performed at normal speed. Each step of movement consumes a turn of greater haste.

Turns of greater haste remaining: %d.
target:
惊人的速度加成效果使得一切都好像在此刻静止了。

在飞影的效果下，移动完全不消耗回合，但其它行动的速度仍旧。每一格移动都会消耗一回合飞影。

飞影剩余回合数：%d

source: haste
target: 极速

source:
Energy courses through your muscles, allowing you to run at incredible speeds!

While under the effects of haste you will run at 3x speed, but will perform all other actions at normal speed.

Turns of haste remaining: %s.
target:
强大的能量灌入到你的双腿肌肉上，允许你以不可思议的速度移动！

在极速状态下，你将拥有3倍的移动速度，但是其他行动速度仍然和原来一样。

极速效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: healing
target: 治疗

source:
A magical remedy is causing wounds to close and flesh to knit.

Every turn health will steadily regenerate until the healing effect expires. The amount of healing may fade over time.

Next heal: %d.

Healing remaining: %d.
target:
一股治愈魔力让你的伤口开始愈合。

你的生命将逐回合稳定回复，直到治疗效果终止。治疗量将随着时间逐渐减少。

下一回合治疗量：%d

剩余治疗量：%d。

source: disguise
target: 伪装

source: Illusory magic has altered your physical appearance! The effect is purely cosmetic, but feels very strange regardless.\n\nTurns of disguise remaining: %s.
target: 幻术魔法改变了你的外貌！虽然此效果是完全装饰性的，但无论如何感觉起来还是很奇怪。\n\n伪装效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: hexed
target: 幻惑

source: You have been hexed!
target: 你的精神受到了魔法的干扰！

source:
Dark magic which saps focus, making the target slightly disoriented.

Hexing reduces accuracy and evasion by 20%%, making the target less effective in combat.

Turns of hex remaining: %s.
target:
干扰集中力的黑暗魔法，使目标无法准确地判断方位。

幻惑状态会降低目标20%%的精准与闪避属性，使其在战斗中更容易处于下风。

幻惑效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: hold fast
target: 不动如山

source: The Warrior is holding his position, increasing his armor by %1$d-%2$d and slowing the decay rate of some buffs by %3$d%%. This will last until he moves.
target: 战士正在据守此处，提升他%1$d~%2$d点护甲并将连击与护盾的衰减速度减缓%3$d%%，直至他移动为止。

source: hungry
target: 饥饿

source: starving
target: 极度饥饿

source: You are hungry.
target: 你有点饿了。

source: You are starving!
target: 你已经饥肠辘辘！

source: You starved to death...
target: 你活活饿死了...

source: The cursed horn steals some of the food energy as you eat.
target: 就在你吃东西的时候被诅咒的号角偷走了一部分食物的能量。

source: Starved to Death
target: 饥饿致死

source: You can feel your stomach calling out for food, but it's not too urgent yet.
target: 你能感受到自己的肚子在不断寻求食物，不过还不算那么严重。

source: You're so hungry it hurts.
target: 你的饥饿程度已经危及生命了。

source:
Hunger slowly increases as you spend time in the dungeon, eventually you will begin to starve. While starving you will slowly lose health instead of regenerating it.

Rationing is important! If you have health to spare starving isn't a bad idea if it means there will be more food later. Effective rationing can make food last a lot longer!
target:
饥饿会在你在地牢里花费时间的同时缓慢累计，直到你饿得难以忍受。在你极度饥饿时生命值会停止回复并且开始缓慢减少。

合理利用食物非常重要！如果你有足够的生命值来维持饥饿，你就该等到一会儿食物更多的时候再吃。正确的配给可以让食物更有效地发挥作用！

source: invisible
target: 隐形

source:
You are completely blended into the surrounding terrain, making you impossible to see.

While you are invisible enemies are unable to attack or follow you. Physical attacks and magical effects (such as scrolls and wands) will immediately cancel invisibility.

Turns of invisibility remaining: %s.
target:
你和周围的地形完全融为一体，使你不可能被看到。

当你在隐形时敌人无法追踪或攻击你。大部分物理攻击和魔法(比如卷轴和法杖)会立即解除隐形效果。

隐形效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: invulnerable
target: 无敌

source: This character is suffused with great protective power, granting them a brief period of invulnerability!\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
target: 这个单位充满了金刚不坏之力，获得了短暂的无敌效果！\n\n剩余回合数：%s回合

source: levitating
target: 飘浮

source:
A magical force is levitating you over the ground, making you feel weightless.

Levitating characters move silently and ignore all ground-based effects. Traps won't trigger, water won't put out fire, plants won't be trampled, roots will miss, and pits will be hovered over. Be careful, as all these things can come into effect the second the levitation ends!

Turns of levitation remaining: %s.
target:
一股魔力把你从地面托起，让你觉得自己身轻如燕。

飘浮中的角色能够悄无声息地移动，并会无视所有以地面为基础的效果。陷阱不会被触发、火焰不会被水扑灭、植物不会被踩踏、根系无法缠绕你、并且深渊能被跨越。小心，在效果结束时上述效果都会失效！

飘浮效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: life link
target: 生命联结

source: The life linked damage killed you...
target: 你因生命联结的共享伤害而亡...

source:
This character's life force is linked to another character nearby. Any damage taken is shared between them.

Whenever this character takes damage, half of it will be dealt to the life link target instead.

Turns of life link remaining: %s.
target:
该单位的生命力与附近的另一个单位相连。双方会共同承担所有所受伤害。

每当该单位受伤时，半数伤害会转移到与该单位有生命联结的单位上。

生命联结剩余回合数：%s

source: illuminated
target: 发光

source:
Even in the Darkest Dungeon, a steady light at your side is always comforting.

Light helps keep darkness at bay, allowing you to see a reasonable distance despite the environment.

Turns of illumination remaining: %s.
target:
即使是在最黑暗的地牢中，身边有一个稳定的光源也总是令人欣慰。 

光照能驱散黑暗，使你能够无视周遭的黑暗环境并拥有一个合理的视野范围。 

发光效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: floor is locked
target: 背水一战

source:
The current floor is locked, and you are unable to leave it!

While a floor is locked, you will not gain hunger or take damage from starving. In addition, if you do not work towards defeating this floor's boss, passive regeneration effects will also stop.

Additionally, if you are revived by an unblessed ankh while the floor is locked, then it will reset.

Kill this floor's boss to break the lock.
target:
当前楼层被彻底封锁，你无法离开这里！

封锁持续期间，你不会更加饥饿，或因极度饥饿减少生命值。此外，如果你没有在与Boss战斗，所有的被动回复都会停止。

另外，如果你在楼层封锁时被未祝福的重生十字架复活了，封锁效果将被重置。

击杀本层Boss以解除封锁。

source: lost inventory
target: 遗落行囊

source: Your inventory has been lost somewhere in the dungeon! You won't be able to pick up or use most items until you retrieve it.
target: 你的行囊被遗落在了地牢中的某处！\n在找回你的行囊之前，你将无法拾起或使用绝大多数道具。

source: magical sight
target: 魔能透视

source:
Somehow you are able to see with your mind, rather than your eyes.

While magical sight is active you will be able to see through all terrain in a 12 tile radius.

Turns of magical sight remaining: %s.
target:
不知为何，即使闭上眼睛你也可以用心灵洞察到周围发生的一切。

当处于魔能透视状态时，你的视线将透过墙体与地形，并且视距的半径也会扩展为 12 格。

魔能透视剩余时长：%s 回合

source: magical sleep
target: 魔法睡眠

source: You are too healthy, and resist the urge to sleep.
target: 你十分健康，因此抵抗住了强烈的嗜睡感。

source: You fall into a deep magical sleep.
target: 你深深地陷入了魔法睡眠。

source: You wake up feeling refreshed and healthy.
target: 你醒来后，感觉浑身清爽并且十分健康。

source:
This character has fallen into a deep magical sleep which they will not wake from naturally.

Magical sleep is similar to regular sleep, except that only damage will cause the target to wake up.

For the hero and their allies, magical sleep has some restorative properties, allowing them to rapidly heal while resting.
target:
目标已深深陷入了魔法睡眠，不会自然醒来。

魔法睡眠与一般的睡眠基本一样，但只有受伤会致使目标醒来。

对于英雄和他们的盟友，魔法睡眠有一些恢复性的效果，使他们能够在睡眠中迅速愈合伤口。

source: immune to magic
target: 魔法免疫

source:
All magical effects have lost their hold on you, you are completely impervious to them.

While magic immune all harmful and helpful magical effects will not apply to you, including curses, enchants, wands, scrolls, rings, artifacts, etc. Heroic armor abilities are strong enough to work regardless of this effect.

Turns of magic immunity remaining: %s.
target:
任何魔法都奈何不了你，你对魔法完全免疫。

在魔法免疫状态下，所有魔法效果无论益害都无法影响你，包括但不限于诅咒、附魔、刻印、法杖、卷轴、戒指、神器等。但英雄护甲的能力足够强大，能够不受这种效果影响，正常发挥作用。

魔法免疫剩余时长：%s回合

source: mind vision
target: 灵视

source:
Somehow you are able to see all creatures on this floor through your mind. It's a weird feeling.

All characters on this floor are visible to you as long as you have mind vision. Seeing a creature through mind vision counts as it being seen or nearby for the purposes of many magical effects.

Turns of mind vision remaining: %s.
target:
你可以在脑海中以某种方式看到这一层的所有生物。这种感觉非常奇异。

只要灵视效果依然存在，这层的所有生物都会在你的视野当中。通过灵视看到的生物同样算作视野中的目标，可以被很多魔法效果影响。

灵视效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: building momentum
target: 动量积蓄

source: freerunning
target: 逸动

source: recovering
target: 恢复

source: freerun
target: 逸动

source:
As he moves, the Freerunner builds momentum, which he can spend to start freerunning.

Each charge of momentum grants two turns of freerunning, and the Freerunner can build up to 10 charges. Momentum is rapidly lost when the Freerunner stops moving.

Current momentum charge: %d.
target:
移动的时候，疾行者会逐渐积蓄动量。疾行者可以消耗动量以开启逸动状态。

每一点动量可以支持两个回合的逸动，最多可以储存10点动量。当疾行者停止移动时动量会快速消散。

现存的动量：%d

source:
As he moves, the Freerunner builds momentum, which he can spend to start freerunning.

While freerunning, the Freerunner moves at double speed and gains bonus evasion based on his level.

Turns remaining: %d.
target:
移动的时候，疾行者会逐渐积蓄动量。疾行者可以消耗动量以开启逸动状态。

处于逸动状态时，疾行者能够以两倍速移动，并且基于自身等级获得额外的闪避属性。

效果剩余时长：%d回合

source:
As he moves, the Freerunner builds momentum, which he can spend to start freerunning.

The Freerunner needs time to regain his stamina before building momentum again.

Turns remaining: %d.
target:
移动的时候，疾行者会逐渐积蓄动量。疾行者可以消耗动量以开启逸动状态。

疾行者现在需要休息一会恢复体力才能重新积蓄动量。

还需要休息%d回合。

source: energy
target: 内力

source: Monk Abilities
target: 武功

source: As she defeats enemies, the Monk gains energy that she can use on a variety of abilities. Most enemies grant 1 energy when defeated, and the Monk does not lose energy over time.\n\nCurrent energy: %1$d/%2$d.
target: 每当武僧击败一个敌人，她都会获得可用于施展多门武功的内力。击败大多数种类的敌人时只会获得1点内力，并且武僧不会随时间流失内力。\n\n现有内力：%1$d/%2$d

source: The Monk has recently used an ability, and must wait before using another.\n\nCurrent cooldown: %d turns.
target: 武僧刚刚才施展过一次武功，再次施展前必须等待。\n\n剩余冷却时间：%d回合

source: flurry of blows
target: 空振

source: Two instant strikes that deal %1$d-%2$d damage and ignore armor. This ability cannot be used repeatedly.
target: 两次不耗回合的攻击，每次造成%1$d~%2$d点伤害并且忽略护甲。这门武功不能被重复使用。

source: Two instant strikes that deal %1$d-%2$d damage, ignore armor, _and use your weapon's enchantment._ This ability cannot be used repeatedly.
target: 两次不耗回合的攻击，每次造成%1$d~%2$d点伤害，_可触发武器上的附魔_并且忽略护甲。如果武僧刚刚成功命中过敌人，这门武功不能被重复使用。

source: focus
target: 凝神

source: The Monk takes a turn to focus, letting her parry the next attack made against her.
target: 武僧消耗一回合来进入凝神状态，招架下一次受到的攻击。

source: The Monk _instantly focuses,_ letting her parry the next attack made against her.
target: 武僧_立即进入凝神状态_，招架下一次受到的攻击。

source: focused
target: 凝神

source: The Monk is focused on her surroundings, anticipating the next attack made against her. While focused, she is guaranteed to parry the next incoming attack.
target: 武僧正专注于她周遭的一切，可以预料到对她发起的下一次攻击。当处于凝神状态时，她将必定招架下一次来袭的攻击。

source: dash
target: 登云

source: Choose a Location
target: 选择一个地点

source: An instant dash up to 4 tiles away. This ability can go over hazards, but not through enemies or solid terrain.
target: 立刻冲向一个最多4格远的位置。这一武功可以越过危险地形，但不能穿过敌人或者坚实墙壁。

source: An instant dash up to _8 tiles_ away. This ability can go over hazards, but not through enemies or solid terrain.
target: 立刻冲向一个最多_8格_远的位置。这一武功可以越过危险地形，但不能穿过敌人或者坚实墙壁。

source: dragon kick
target: 盘龙

source: A devastating kick that deals %1$d-%2$d damage and ignores armor. The kick knocks the target away and paralyzes them for each tile they travel.
target: 一次致命的踢击，造成%1$d~%2$d点伤害，无视护甲，并将敌人击退，还会对敌人施加与击退距离相等回合数的麻痹。

source: A devastating kick that deals _%1$d-%2$d damage_ and ignores armor. The kick knocks _all adjacent targets_ away and paralyzes them for each tile they travel.
target: 一次致命的踢击，造成_%1$d~%2$d点伤害_，无视护甲，并将_所有邻近目标_击退，还会对敌人施加与击退距离相等回合数的麻痹。

source: meditate
target: 冥思

source: The Monk focuses energy into her body for 5 turns. This clears most negative effects and grants her 8 turns of wand and artifact recharging.
target: 武僧消耗5回合来运转内力，将大部分的负面效果逼出体外，并获得8回合的法杖和神器充能。

source: The Monk focuses energy into her body for 5 turns. This clears most negative effects and grants her 8 turns of wand and artifact recharging. _She also gains 80% damage resistance while meditating, and slowly heals for 20% of her missing HP._
target: 武僧消耗5回合来运转内力，将大部分的负面效果逼出体外，并获得8回合的法杖和神器充能。_冥思期间还会获得80%伤害抗性，并缓慢恢复共20%已损失生命值。_

source: caustic ooze
target: 腐蚀淤泥

source: Caustic ooze eats your flesh. Wash it away!
target: 淤泥在腐蚀你的身体。洗掉它！

source: You melt away...
target: 你被彻底融化掉了...

source: Dissolved
target: 被溶解

source:
This sticky acid clings to flesh, slowly melting it away.

Ooze will deal consistent damage over time, but can be immediately washed off in water.

Turns of ooze remaining: %s.
target:
这种粘稠的酸性淤泥正在紧贴你的骨肉，并缓慢地将它们腐蚀融化。

腐蚀淤泥会对受害者持续造成伤害，不过能够立刻在水中洗掉。

腐蚀淤泥剩余时长：%s回合

source: paralysed
target: 麻痹

source: You are paralysed!
target: 你被麻痹了！

source: resisted paralysis
target: 解脱麻痹

source:
Oftentimes the worst thing to do is nothing at all.

Paralysis completely halts all actions, forcing the target to wait until the effect wears off. The pain from taking damage can cause characters to resist paralysis, breaking them out of the effect.

Turns of paralysis remaining: %s.
target:
通常最坏的事就是什么事都做不出来。

麻痹会制止目标的一切行动，迫使目标静等到效果消失。受伤导致的疼痛也有助于目标摆脱麻痹。

麻痹效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: physically empowered
target: 体能增幅

source:
Your blows have been empowered, increasing the amount of damage you can deal when you hit enemies with physical attacks.

Bonus damage: %1$d.
Hits remaining: %2$d.
target:
你的攻击已被强化，接下来的几次物理攻击击中敌人时将会造成额外伤害。

额外伤害：%1$d
剩余次数：%2$d

source: pincushion
target: 中矢

source: The thrown weapons you have used against this character are currently stuck to them and will fall to the floor after they are defeated.\n\nThe following items are currently attached:
target: 你击中这个角色的投掷武器正卡在他们身上，打败他们后投掷武器将会掉在地上。\n\n被卡住的物品如下：

source: poisoned
target: 中毒

source: You are poisoned!
target: 你中毒了！

source: You died from poison...
target: 你被毒死了...

source: Succumbed to Poison
target: 毒发身亡

source:
Poison works its way through the body, slowly impairing its internal functioning.

Poison deals damage each turn proportional to how long until it expires.

Turns of poison remaining: %s.
target:
毒素传遍全身，缓慢地损伤着各个脏器。

毒素每回合造成的伤害与其剩余的回合数成正比。

中毒效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: preparation
target: 准备阶段

source: prepared strike
target: 蓄意打击

source: The Assassin is waiting patiently, preparing to strike from the shadows.
target: 刺客正耐心地等待着，准备从暗影中给出致命一击。

source: His next attack will deal _%1$d%% bonus damage_, and will execute regular enemies below _%2$d%% health_, or bosses below _%3$d%% health_.
target: 他的下一次攻击会造成_%1$d%%的额外伤害_，并斩杀生命低于_%2$d%%_的普通敌人，或生命低于_%3$d%%_的Boss。

source: The attack will also be more likely to deal a larger amount of damage.
target: 这一击也更有可能造成偏高的伤害。

source: He is able to blink towards an enemy before striking them, with a max distance of _%d._
target: 他可以瞬间冲刺到敌人身边再攻击，最大冲刺距离为%d格。

source: Turns spent invisible: _%d._
target: 刺客已经隐形了_%d_回合。

source: Turns for stronger attack: _%d._
target: 这一击在_%d_回合后会变得更强。

source: Select a target to attack!\nMax blink distance: %d
target: 选择一个攻击的目标！\n最大冲刺距离：%d格

source: There's nothing to attack there.
target: 这里没有可攻击的目标。

source: That target is out of reach.
target: 你无法冲刺到目标距离。

source: assassinated
target: 斩杀

source: prismatic Guard
target: 虹光守卫

source:
You are being guarded by a prismatic image which is currently inactive. When enemies are present the prismatic image will spring to action and protect you!

While inactive, the prismatic image will steadily recover from any damage it has taken.

Current HP: %d/%d.
target:
你正在被一个目前看不见的虹光守卫所保护。当有敌人出现时这个虹光守卫将出现并为你战斗！

当虹光守卫未激活时，它将逐渐恢复所有所受到的伤害。

当前生命值：%d/%d

source: This prismatic image is also benefitting from Power of Many. Turns Remaining: %d.
target: 该虹光幻像已被万物一心强化。剩余回合数：%d

source: recharging
target: 充能

source:
Energy is coursing through you, improving the rate that your wands and staffs charge.

Each turn this buff will increase current charge by one quarter, in addition to regular recharge.

Turns of recharging remaining: %s.
target:
魔力在你体内奔腾而过，提高你的法杖与魔杖的充能速率。

此效果将会在正常充能速率的基础上每回合为你额外回复0.25点法杖充能。

充能效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: revealed area
target: 区域揭示

source: An area of the dungeon has been temporarily revealed to the hero, They will see it no matter where they are.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
target: 揭示地牢中一片区域的视野，无论你身处这层中的何处都能对那里一览无遗。\n\n效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: revealed
target: 已揭示

source: This character is revealed to the hero, They will be visible no matter where they are.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
target: 这个单位已被揭示，无论它在哪里都将是可见的。\n\n效果剩余时长：%s回合。

source: rooted
target: 缠绕

source: You can't move!
target: 你不能移动了！

source:
Roots (magical or natural) grab at the feet, forcing them down to the ground.

Roots lock a target in place, making movement and most movement abilities impossible. Other actions are not affected, including teleportation effects.

Turns of root remaining: %s.
target:
一些根系(不论是自然或魔法产生)缠到了脚上，牢牢将其缚在地面。

根系会让目标被困在当前区域，使其不能移动或使用大部分移动技能。其他行动不受干扰，包括传送效果。

缠绕效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: scroll empower
target: 卷轴赋能

source:
The energy from the Mage's recently read scroll is empowering his wands!

Level Boost: +%1$d.
Zaps remaining: %2$d.
target:
法师阅读卷轴时产生的能量会暂时强化他的法杖！

法杖强化：+%1$d级
剩余有效施法次数：%2$d

source: shadowmelded
target: 暗影融合

source:
You are blended into the shadows around you, granting you invisibility and slowing your metabolism.

While you are invisible enemies are unable to attack or follow you. Most physical attacks and magical effects (such as scrolls and wands) will immediately cancel invisibility. Additionally, while shadowmelded, your rate of hunger is slowed.

You will remain shadowmelded until you leave the shadows or an enemy comes into contact with you.
target:
你和周围的阴影融为一体，使你隐形并减缓你的新陈代谢。

当你在隐形时敌人无法追踪或攻击你。大部分物理攻击和魔法(比如卷轴和法杖)会立即解除隐形效果。此外，当你处于暗影融合状态下时，饥饿值增加的速率会降低。

暗影融合状态会一直持续直到你离开阴影或与敌人直接接触。

source: slowed
target: 迟缓

source:
Slowing magic affects the target's rate of time, to them everything is moving super-fast.

A slowed character performs all actions in twice the amount of time they would normally take.

Turns of slow remaining: %s.
target:
减速魔法影响了目标的时间流速，在目标眼中所有的事物都移动得飞快。

迟缓下的角色执行所有行动花费的时间是正常状态下的两倍。

迟缓效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: sniper's mark
target: 狙击标记

source: snapshot
target: 速射

source: volley
target: 连射

source: sniper shot
target: 狙杀

source:
The Sniper is honed in on the target she most recently attacked. She is able to perform a special attack with her bow which will vary based on how the bow is augmented.

An unaugmented bow will fire a _snapshot,_ which deals reduced damage but does not take any time to fire.

A bow augmented for speed will fire a _volley_ of three arrows. Each arrow will deal reduced damage, but can still activate enchantment. This volley takes 1 turn to shoot.

A bow augmented for damage will fire a _sniper shot._ This shot is guaranteed to hit, deals bonus damage based on distance from the target, and takes 2 turns to fire.

Turns remaining: %s.
target:
狙击手专注于最近射击的目标。她能够用灵能弓进行一次特殊攻击，攻击方式取决于弓的强化方式。

未被强化的弓可以施展_速射_，进行一次低伤害但不消耗回合的射击。

强化速度的弓可以施展三箭_连射_。每支箭矢伤害虽低，但仍能触发附魔效果。连射消耗1回合。

强化伤害的弓可以施展_狙杀_。这支箭矢必定命中，根据目标距离造成额外伤害。狙杀消耗2回合。

效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: soul marked
target: 灵魂标记

source: The warlock has tapped into the soul of this creature, allowing him to heal as it takes physical damage.\n\nTurns of soul mark remaining: %s.
target: 术士已经击穿了目标的灵魂。其在受到物理伤害时将会恢复术士的生命。\n\n灵魂标记剩余时长：%s回合

source: stamina
target: 体力充沛

source:
You have unending stamina, allowing for faster movement!

While under the effects of stamina you will run at +50%% speed, but will perform all other actions at normal speed.

Turns of stamina remaining: %s.
target:
你感受到了体内无尽的精力，让你可以以更快的速度移动！

当你处于体力充沛状态下你的移动速度将提升50%%，但是此效果不影响其他行动的耗时。

体力充沛剩余时长：%s回合

source: vulnerable
target: 易伤

source: You feel fragile!
target: 你感到外界的伤害愈加疼痛！

source: Vulnerability magic increases all physical damage that a character takes by 33%%, after that damage has been reduced by armor.\n\nTurns of vulnerable remaining: %s.
target: 易伤魔法会使得目标受到所有被护甲减免过的物理伤害增加33%%。\n\n易伤效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: terrified
target: 恐惧

source:
Terror is manipulative magic which forces its target into an uncontrollable panic.

Terrified characters are forced to run away from their opponent, trying to put as many doors and walls between them as possible. The shock of pain will lessen the duration of terror, however.

Turns of terror remaining: %s.
target:
恐惧是使敌人陷入不可控制的恐慌的操纵性魔法。

恐惧中的角色会远离自己的敌人，试图和敌人隔开尽可能多的门或墙。然而疼痛的刺激会减少恐惧的持续时间。

恐惧效果剩余时长：%s

source: imbued with toxicity
target: 毒素之力

source:
You are imbued with poisonous energy!

As you move around toxic gas will constantly billow forth from you, damaging your enemies. You are immune to toxic gas and poison for the duration of the effect, as well as for a few turns afterward.

Turns of toxic imbue remaining: %s.
target:
你被灌注了毒素的力量！

在你移动时毒气会从你的身体中翻腾而出，伤害你的敌人。持续期间，甚至直到效果结束后的数回合内，你都免疫毒气和中毒效果。

毒素之力剩余时长：%s回合

source: corrosion
target: 酸蚀

source: You are melting!
target: 你正在被强酸溶解！

source: You melt away...
target: 你被彻底溶解掉了...

source: Dissolved
target: 被溶解

source:
Powerful acid melts away flesh, metal, and bone at an alarming rate.

Corrosion damage increases over time, as the target continues to melt away.

Turns of corrosion remaining: %1$s.
Current corrosion damage: %2$d.
target:
强酸能以惊人的速度腐蚀掉血肉、金属和骨头。

目标被腐蚀的时间越长，酸蚀伤害越高。

酸蚀效果剩余时长：%1$s回合
当前酸蚀伤害：%2$d

source: vertigo
target: 眩晕

source:
Walking in a straight line can be difficult when the whole world is spinning.

While under the effects of vertigo, characters who attempt to move will go in a random direction, instead of the one they intended to go in.

Turns of vertigo remaining: %s.
target:
如果整个世界都在旋转的话，想走直线会变得十分困难。 

眩晕效果持续时，目标的移动将会向一个随机区域进行，而不是目标原本想到达的地方。

眩晕效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: wands empowered
target: 盈能法杖

source:
Your damage-dealing wands have been empowered, increasing the amount of damage they deal for a few hits.

Bonus damage: %1$d.
Hits remaining: %2$d.
target:
你的伤害型法杖已被强化，接下来的几次攻击会造成额外伤害。

额外伤害：%1$d
剩余攻击次数：%2$d

source: weakened
target: 虚弱

source: You feel weakened!
target: 你感到力量正在被抽走！

source:
Everything suddenly seems much heavier.

Weakening magic reduces a character's physical strength, causing them to deal 33%% reduced damage.

Turns of weakness remaining: %s.
target:
你感觉自己的装备突然变得沉重起来。

虚弱魔法会减弱角色的肉体力量，使其造成的伤害减少33%%。

虚弱效果剩余时长：%s回合

source: well fed
target: 饱腹

source:
You feel quite satisfied and full.

While well fed, your hunger will not increase, and you will heal an additional amount of health over time.

Turns remaining: %d.
target:
你感觉自己吃的非常饱。

当你处于饱腹状态时，你的饥饿值不会增加，并且会随着时间的推移恢复额外的生命值。

状态剩余时长：%d回合

source: You can't target yourself!
target: 你不能瞄准你自己！

source: There's nothing to target there!
target: 这里没有任何目标！

source: Choose a location to target
target: 选择释放能力的位置

source: Charge cost: _%d_
target: 充能消耗：_%d_

source: heroic leap
target: 英勇之跃

source: Choose direction to leap
target: 选择要飞跃到的地方

source: The Warrior performs a _Heroic Leap_ towards a targeted location, sailing above enemies and hazards.
target: 战士能向指定地点使用_英勇之跃_，越过所有的敌人与危险地形。

source: The Warrior leaps toward a targeted location, going over any enemies or hazards in the way. He cannot leap over walls or other solid terrain however.
target: 战士向指定地点跳跃，越过路径上的所有敌人与危险地形。不过战士无法越过墙壁或是其它实体地形。

source: shockwave
target: 震地冲击

source: The Warrior releases a _Shockwave_ in a conical AOE by slamming the ground. Enemies caught in the shockwave are damaged and crippled.
target: 战士大力锤击地面，向一个锥形区域施以_震地冲击_。被冲击波击中的敌人会受到一定伤害并陷入残废。

source: The Warrior slams the ground, producing a shockwave that travels up to 5 tiles in a 60 degree cone.\n\nEnemies caught in this shockwave are crippled for 5 turns. They also take 5-10 damage, plus an additional 1-2 damage for every point of strength the Warrior has above 10.
target: 战士大力锤击地面产生冲击波，震击前方60度扇形范围5格距离内的区域。\n\n被冲击波击中的敌人会陷入5回合残废并受到5~10点伤害。战士每点超过10的力量会使得该伤害增加1~2点。

source: endure
target: 苦痛坚忍

source: endurance
target: 苦痛之怒

source:
The Warrior is now dealing bonus damage based on the damage he endured.

Bonus Damage: %1$d
Hits Left: %2$d
target:
战士将忍受的原始伤害织成愤怒，将大量的额外伤害倾泻给敌人。

额外伤害：%1$d
剩余攻击次数：%2$d

source: The Warrior _Endures_, skipping several turns but gaining high damage resistance. He then deals bonus damage based on what he endured.
target: 战士_苦痛坚忍_，跳过若干回合并大幅抵抗伤害。接下来战士会根据忍受的原始伤害造成额外伤害。

source:
The Warrior endures for 3 turns, taking half damage from all sources. This reduction is applied before damage resisting effects like armor.

After enduring, the warrior's next hit within 10 turns gains bonus damage. This bonus damage is equal to half of all the damage inflicted on him while enduring, before any damage reduction effects!

If the Warrior has any combo, using this ability increases its remaining time by 3 turns.
target:
战士首先忍耐3回合，将任何受到的伤害减少一半。此减伤效果优先于其它减伤计算。

在此之后，战士在10回合内的下一次攻击将造成额外伤害。额外伤害等同于在忍耐期间所有受到的原始伤害的一半。

如果战士处于连击状态，此能力将补偿3回合连击时间。

source: elemental blast
target: 元素风暴

source: You can't use this ability without your staff.
target: 你不能在没有魔杖的情况下使用这个能力。

source: The Mage emits an _Elemental Blast_ from his staff, covering a large area around him in an effect that varies based on the wand in his staff.
target: 法师从魔杖中释放_元素风暴_，席卷以自身为中心的一大片圆形区域，基于灌注的法杖引发不同的效果。

source: The Mage emits a blast of magic, which covers a circular region up to 4 tiles away and deals up to 15-25 damage. The specific effect of elemental blast will vary by the wand imbued in the Mage's staff.
target: 法师释放出风暴般的魔力，席卷半径为4的圆形区域，对其中的目标造成15~25点伤害。元素风暴引发的特效随魔杖灌注的法杖而变。

source: The effect of elemental blast will be similar to the effect of the wand when zapped at an enemy or ally.
target: 元素风暴引发的效果与法杖向目标施法的效果类似。

source: wild magic
target: 狂野魔法

source: You have no wands to zap with!
target: 你没有法杖可供施法！

source: The Mage unleashes the _Wild Magic_ contained in his wands, randomly firing them multiple times at a chosen target over a single turn.
target: 法师引导出法杖中的_狂野魔法_，在单回合内对指定目标随机释放这些法杖多次。

source: The Mage unleashes the power in his wands, randomly firing them up to 4 times in a single turn. The Mage's staff is not included in this effect.\n\nEach wand also has its level boosted by 2, up to +3. This ability uses half a wand charge for each zap, and no one wand can be fired more than 2 times.
target: 法师引导出法杖的魔力，在一回合内随机释放法杖至多4次。该能力不会释放法师魔杖。\n\n以这个能力使用法杖时，法杖视为上升2级，最高可至+3。用该能力释放法术只消耗一半的充能，每根法杖最多随机释放两次。

source: warp beacon
target: 空间信标

source: You can't warp between depths!
target: 你无法传送到其它楼层！

source: You cannot leave a locked floor!
target: 楼层被封锁了，你无法离开！

source: That location is too far!
target: 这个位置太远了！

source: You can't place a beacon there!
target: 你不能将信标放在那里！

source: Your beacon is currently placed on floor %d.
target: 你的信标目前设置在了第%d层。

source: teleport to beacon
target: 返回信标位置

source: clear beacon
target: 移除信标

source: cancel
target: 取消

source: The Mage places a _Warping Beacon_ at his current location, which he can instantly teleport back to.
target: 法师在当前位置设置了一个_空间信标_，他能瞬间传送回信标所在位置。

source: The Mage places a beacon, which can then be warped to at will. Placing the beacon takes 1 turn, but warping to it is instantaneous.\n\nThe Mage cannot warp between floors by default, or use the beacon to reach inaccessible places such as locked rooms. The Mage can teleport into enemies, which will push them aside.
target: 法师设置了一个可以随时返回的信标。信标设置需要1回合，但传送回不消耗时间。\n\n法师在初始条件下无法传送至别的楼层，不能将其放入不可达的区域如上锁的房间。法师返回时若是目标地点有敌人，则会将其弹开。

source: smoke bomb
target: 烟幕爆炸

source: You can only jump to an empty location in your field of view.
target: 你只能跳到视野范围内的空格子里。

source: Choose a location to jump to
target: 选择要跳到的位置

source: wooden decoy
target: 木桩替身

source: Somehow, enemies are easily convinced that this wooden decoy is the real Rogue!
target: 不知为何敌人坚信这就是盗贼本身。

source: You can find this character with a specific hero armor ability.
target: 你可通过某个英雄护甲技能遇到该单位。

source: The Rogue throws down a _Smoke Bomb_ while blinking away. He blinds enemies near his old location.
target: 盗贼在原地制造一场_烟幕爆炸_后闪现离去，并使原点周围的敌人失明。

source: The Rogue throws down a smoke bomb and blinks up to 6 tiles away. He can blink through hazards and enemies, but not through solid terrain like walls.\n\nEnemies that are adjacent to the Rogue's old position will be blinded for 5 turns.
target: 盗贼在原地制造一场烟幕爆炸，并闪现最多6格的距离。闪现无视敌人与危险地形，但仍会被实体地形如墙壁阻挡。\n\n邻近盗贼原位置的敌人将失明5回合。

source: death mark
target: 夺命印记

source: You can only mark enemies
target: 你只能标记敌人

source: The Rogue places a _Death Mark_ on a chosen enemy. Marked enemies take bonus damage, but cannot die until the mark ends.
target: 盗贼向选中的敌人施加_夺命印记_。被标记的敌人将受到额外伤害，但不会在标记期间死亡。

source: The Rogue places a mark on a chosen enemy, causing them to take 25% extra damage. The mark is applied instantly and lasts for 5 turns.\n\nMarked enemies take bonus damage but are unable to die until the mark expires. If an enemy has 0 HP when the mark ends, they will immediately die.
target: 盗贼标记选中的敌人，使其受到额外25%的伤害。标记不耗费时间且持续5回合。\n\n被标记的敌人受到额外伤害，但并不会在标记期间死亡。当标记结束时，生命值为0的敌人会立即死亡。

source: marked for death
target: 夺命印记

source: This enemy has been marked, causing them to take 25%% bonus damage, but also rendering them unable to die until the mark ends.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
target: 这名被标记的敌人受到25%%的额外伤害，但不会在标记期间死亡。\n\n标记剩余时长：%s回合

source: shadow clone
target: 暗影映像

source: The Rogue summons a _Shadow Clone_, which can be directed to aid him in combat.
target: 盗贼召唤一个_暗影映像_，并能使唤其帮助自己战斗。

source: The Rogue summons a shadowy mimic of himself, which can be directed to aid him in combat. Directing the shadow clone does not cost any charge.\n\nThe clone has 80 HP, no armor, and deals 10-20 damage. All of these traits can be improved with talents, such that the clone benefits from weapons and armor the hero has.
target: 盗贼召唤一个暗影映像，并可以指使它作战。指使映像不会消耗充能。\n\n映像拥有80点生命与10~20点近战伤害，没有护甲。在激活天赋后这些属性可受到其主人武器与护甲的增益。

source: shadow rogue
target: 暗影映像

source: Your clone moves to that position.
target: 你的映像去了那个位置。

source: Your clone moves to follow you.
target: 你的映像正在跟随你。

source: Your clone moves to attack!
target: 你的映像正在发动攻击！

source: A copy of the Rogue, made from shadowy darkness. It stands stock still, with empty eyes and tiny wisps of darkness rising from it like steam.\n\nThe clone is not a perfect copy of the Rogue, but is still a decent fighter, and can benefit from the Rogue's equipment with the right talents.
target: 一具无形暗影塑造出的盗贼复制体，它一动不动双目空空，烟雾般的黑暗在周围缓缓升腾。\n\n它虽说不上是个完美的复制体，但也是个合格的杀手，并且在特定天赋加持下能从其主人的装备中获益。

source: You can find this character with a specific hero armor ability.
target: 你可通过某个英雄护甲技能遇到该单位。

source: spectral blades
target: 灵魂飞刃

source: The Huntress throws _Spectral Blades_ at a target, inflicting damage depending on her currently equipped melee weapon.
target: 女猎手向一个目标掷出_灵魂飞刃_，根据装备的近战武器造成伤害。

source: The Huntress throws out a spectral blade at an enemy, which acts like a ranged strike from her melee weapon. All of the normal effects of a melee weapon will activate, including enchantments.
target: 女猎手向一名敌人掷出灵能飞刃，就像用近战武器进行远程攻击。该攻击保留包括附魔的所有近战攻击效果。

source: nature's power
target: 自然之力

source: The Huntress calls upon _Nature's Power_, increasing her movement speed and her bow's rate of fire for a short time.
target: 女猎手呼唤_自然之力_的协助，在短时间内增加其移动速度与灵能弓射击速度。

source: The Huntress temporarily empowers herself and her bow with the power of nature! This lasts for 8 turns.\n\nDuring this time, the Huntress moves at 2x speed, and attacks 33% faster with her bow. The bonus bow effects do not trigger if the Sniper is using her special attacks.
target: 女猎手与她的弓注入了自然的力量！这种力量持续8回合。\n\n在自然之力的加持下，女猎手拥有双倍的移动速度与+33%的灵能弓射击速度。这种力量不影响狙击手专精的追加攻击。

source: nature's power
target: 自然之力

source: The Huntress is briefly empowered, increasing her movement speed and attack speed with her bow.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
target: 女猎手拥有了暂时的自然之力，增加其移动速度与灵能弓射击速度。\n\n剩余回合数：%s

source: spirit hawk
target: 灵能飞鹰

source: There is no free space near you.
target: 你附近没有可用于召唤的空地。

source: The Huntress summons a _Spirit Hawk_ familiar, which can help her scout locations and distract enemies.
target: 女猎手召唤一只_灵能飞鹰_使魔，协助侦查并吸引敌人注意。

source: The Huntress summons a spirit hawk familiar, which can be directed by using the ability again while it is summoned. The hawk lasts for 100 turns, directing the hawk does not cost any charge.\n\nThe hawk has minimal health and attacking power, but is fast, evasive, and accurate. It shares its entire field of vision with the Huntress at all times. It is immune to all area-bound effects, such as fire and poison gas. It will not attack unless specifically directed to.
target: 女猎手召唤一只灵能飞鹰，飞鹰存在时使用此能力可指引其行动。飞鹰将存在100回合，指引飞鹰不消耗任何充能。\n\n灵能飞鹰脆弱且缺乏攻击力，但其迅捷的移动、灵敏的躲避与精准的攻击对这些缺点有所弥补。飞鹰与女猎手共享视野，免疫所有环境效果，例如火焰、毒气等。飞鹰只在女猎手指引下发起攻击。

source: spirit hawk
target: 灵能飞鹰

source: Your hawk moves to that position.
target: 你的灵能飞鹰移动到了那个位置。

source: Your hawk moves to follow you.
target: 你的飞鹰正在跟随你。

source: Your hawk moves to attack!
target: 你的飞鹰正在发动攻击！

source: A magical hawk, summoned by the Huntress. It glows a bright ethereal blue, its head constantly shifts around as it surveys the area.\n\nWhile it isn't much of a fighter its speed and vision make it excellent for scouting and distracting enemies.
target: 一只女猎手召唤的灵能飞鹰，全身散发着明亮而空灵的蓝光。它不断扭头探查着周围环境。\n\n飞鹰并不适合武力战斗，但其速度与视距使其能够胜任高效的侦查与危险的诱敌任务。

source: Turns remaining: %d.
target: 剩余回合数：%d回合

source: Guaranteed dodges remaining: %d.
target: 飞鹰将必定闪避接下来的%d次攻击。

source: You can find this character with a specific hero armor ability.
target: 你可通过某个英雄护甲技能遇到该单位。

source: challenge
target: 公平决斗

source: Choose an enemy to challenge
target: 选择一名敌人以发起决斗

source: You can only be in one duel at a time.
target: 你在同一时间里只能进行一场决斗。

source: You can only challenge enemies.
target: 你只能向敌人发起决斗。

source: You must be able to reach your target.
target: 你不能选择无法接近的目标。

source: That enemy is too far away to challenge.
target: 那个敌人离得太远，无法发起决斗。

source: The Duelist _Challenges_ a nearby enemy to a duel, temporarily freezing all other enemies.
target: 决斗家向一名附近的敌人发起_公平决斗_，在短时间内停止所有其它敌人的时间。

source:
The Duelist challenges a nearby enemy to a duel. That enemy is compelled to fight her while all other enemies are temporarily frozen in time.

The target must be reachable and within 5 tiles of the Duelist. The duel lasts until 10 turns pass, the enemy dies, or the Duelist is more than 5 tiles away from the enemy.

Frozen enemies are invulnerable. The Duelist's allies are not frozen by this ability, but if a boss is targeted its minions will not be frozen either.
target:
决斗家向一名附近的敌人发起决斗。被选中的敌人会被迫应战，而其它敌人暂时陷入时间冻结。

决斗家只能向5格范围内且可接近的敌人发起决斗。如果出现以下情况的任意一种：决斗进行10回合、敌人死亡或决斗家与敌人的距离超过5格，决斗就会终止。

时间被冻结的敌人处于无敌状态。决斗家的友方单位不会被此能力冻结，但同理，如果对一名头目使用此能力，它的随从亦不会被冻结。

source: duel participant
target: 决斗之中

source:
This character is participating in a duel. They, and any of their allies or minions, are allowed to act normally while others are frozen.

The duel will last for a set amount of time, until one participant dies, or until the participants move more than 5 tiles away from eachother.

Turns remaining: %d.
target:
这个角色正处于一场决斗之中。决斗双方及它们的友方单位或随从能够正常活动，其它角色的时间则被冻结，无法行动。

如果出现以下情况：决斗超过一定时间、决斗双方之一死亡、决斗双方距离超过5格，决斗就会终止。

剩余回合数：%d

source: elemental strike
target: 元素打击

source: The Duelist performs an _Elemental Strike_, spreading an effect in a conical AOE based on her weapon enchantment.
target: 决斗家施展一次_元素打击_，基于所持武器的附魔在扇形范围内施加效果。

source: The Duelist strikes an enemy or location, performing a regular attack that's guaranteed to hit and spreading a magical effect that travels up to 4 tiles in a 65 degree cone. This magical effect varies based on the enchantment on the Duelist's primary weapon.
target: 决斗家打击一名敌人或一个地点，进行一次必定命中的普通攻击，并在65度角4格半径的扇形范围内制造一次魔法效果。魔法的具体效果取决于决斗家主武器的附魔。

source: An elemental strike with no enchantment will release a small burst of magic, dealing 6-12 damage to all enemies in range.
target: 不带有附魔的元素打击将会造成一次小型的魔力爆发，对范围内的所有敌人造成6~12点伤害。

source: feint
target: 虚晃一招

source: Choose a location to dash to
target: 选择要冲到的位置

source: That location is not adjacent to you.
target: 那个位置不与你相邻。

source: You can't move to that location.
target: 你无法移动到那个位置。

source: The Duelist _Feints_, faking an attack while dashing to an adjacent tile. Enemies will attack her afterimage, leaving them open to a counterattack.
target: 决斗家_虚晃一招_，在假装进行攻击的同时冲向一个邻近位置。诱导敌人攻击她的残影，致使敌人露出破绽。

source: The Duelist fakes an attack while dashing to an adjacent tile, leaving behind a momentary afterimage of herself. Enemies that were attacking the Duelist will attack her afterimage instead.\n\nEnemies that attack the afterimage become confused, which cancels their next action and leaves them open to a surprise attack.
target: 决斗家在假装进行攻击的同时冲向一个邻近位置，在原位留下一个残影。正在攻击决斗家的敌人会攻击到残影。\n\n攻击了残影的敌人会被迷惑，取消原本的下一个动作，并且可以被伏击。

source: ascended form
target: 超凡升天

source: The Cleric assumes an _Ascended Form_, gaining new spells, attack range, and shielding.
target: 牧师_超凡升天_，进入神格以获得新法术，攻击距离与护盾。

source: The Cleric projects holy energy from themselves, assuming an extended radiant form for 10 turns. While in this form the Cleric can cast new spells, gains 2 attack range, 30 shielding, and any additional spells they cast will grant 10 shielding per holy tome charge used.\n\nThe shielding from ascended form and its spells does not decay normally, but will immediately fade once ascended form ends. The ability can be re-used to refresh ascended form's duration.
target: 牧师释放神圣能量，进入持续10回合的神格。在此形态下，牧师可施放新法术，增加2格攻击距离与30点护盾。且每消耗1点圣典充能进行施法都能使牧师获得10点护盾。\n\n通过超凡升天及其法术赋予的护盾不会自然衰减，但在超凡升天结束时这种护盾会立即消失。重新使用该技能可刷新超凡升天的持续时间。

source: ascended form
target: 超凡升天

source:
Radiant energy is emanating from the Cleric's body. While in this form the Cleric gains 2 attack range (from the holy energy projecting from them), and 10 shielding whenever they spend a holy tome charge. They are also able to cast the spells which are unlocked via ascended form's talents.

The shield granted by ascended form and its spells will not decay normally, but will instantly fade when ascended form ends.

Current shielding: %1$d.
Turns remaining: %2$d.
target:
神圣能量自牧师周身流转。进入神格时，牧师可通过其神圣能量索敌以获得2格攻击距离，并且每使用一点圣书充能牧师都能获得10点护盾。此外，牧师还可以施放通过超凡升天相关天赋解锁的法术。

通过超凡升天及其法术获得的护盾不会正常衰减，但在超凡升天结束时这种护盾会立即消失。

当前护盾值: %1$d
剩余回合数: %2$d

source: trinity
target: 三位一体

source: Trinity has no effect set for any of its forms currently, use one of its spells!
target: 三位一体当前尚未获得任何位格的效果集，使用位格法术以使其获得效果集！

source: Trinity cannot duplicate an effect that you already have equipped!
target: 三位一体无法复制你已经装备的装备效果！

source: Trinity will apply this effect for _%1$d turns_ at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以获得该附魔或刻印的效果_%1$d回合_。

source: Trinity will apply this _powerful_ effect for _%1$d turns_ at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以获得该_强力_附魔或刻印的效果_%1$d回合_。

source: Trinity will zap this wand at _+%1$d_ at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该法杖的_%1$d级_效果。

source: Trinity will zap this _multi-charge_ wand at _+%1$d_ at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该_复充能_法杖的_%1$d级_效果。

source: Trinity will throw this weapon at _+%1$d_ at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该投武的_%1$d级_效果。

source: Trinity will apply this ring's effect at _+%1$d_ for 20 turns, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以获得20回合_%1$d等级_该戒指的效果。

source: Trinity will apply this artifact's remote alchemy effect, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该神器的远端炼金效果。

source: Trinity will apply this artifact's passive health regen effect at _+%1$d_ for 20 turns, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以获得该神器的_%1$d级_被动生命回复效果20回合。

source: Trinity will use this artifact's effect to summon a corrupted friendly wraith with the HP of a _+%1$d_ ghost, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该神器召唤_%1$d级_幽灵生命值的友好腐化怨灵的效果。

source: Trinity will apply this artifact's chain-casting effect with reach at _+%1$d_, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该神器_%1$d格_范围的锁链施放效果。

source: Trinity will apply this artifact's snacking effect, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该神器的小吃一口效果。

source: Trinity will apply this artifact's enemy robbing effect at _+%1$d_, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该神器的_%1$d级_敌人窃取效果。

source: Trinity will apply this artifact's root effect with a random harmful seed, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该神器的随机有害种子扎根效果。

source: Trinity will apply this artifact's insert effect, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该神器的插入效果。

source: Trinity will apply this artifact's scry effect at _+%1$d_, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该神器的_%1$d级_探查效果。

source: Trinity will apply this artifact's time freeze effect with a _%1$d_ turn duration, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以获得该神器持续_%1$d_回合的时间冻结效果。

source: Trinity will apply this artifact's random scroll effect with a _%1$d/10_ chance to offer the exotic version at no additional cost, at the cost of _%2$s charge._
target: 三位一体会消耗_%2$s充能_以使用该神器_%1$d/10_无额外消耗使用秘卷概率的随机卷轴效果。

source: The charge cost of this ability varies, but is most often _%d._
target: 该护甲技能充能消耗不定，但通常为_%d_。

source: The Cleric gains a _Trinity_ of abilities, which emulate equipment they have seen and can be assigned by using new spells.
target: 牧师获得一套_三位一体_的护甲技能，统率神力通晓万物，通过使用新法术选择并幻化其已鉴定的装备。

source: The Cleric gains a _Trinity_ of armor abilities, which can be assigned to various item effects by using three new spells. Each of these spells focuses on emulating the effects of different kinds of equipment that the Cleric has identified during this run: body form (weapons and armor), mind form (wands and thrown weapons), and spirit form (rings and artifacts).\n\nEach Trinity form can be imbued with one effect at a time, and the Cleric chooses which one to activate when using Trinity. Trinity will not duplicate the effect of something you already have equipped.
target: 牧师获得一套_三位一体_的护甲技能，通过使用三种新法术选择并使用各式各样的物品效果。每种位格法术都专用于幻化牧师本局已鉴定的不同种类装备效果：体之位格(武器与护甲)、智之位格(法杖与投武)、魂之位格(戒指与神器)。\n\n每种位格法术同时只能幻化一种效果，而牧师使用三位一体时可以选择使用哪种位格法术的效果。三位一体无法复制你已经装备的装备效果。

source: Select which form of Trinity to use. The effects of different forms can be active simultaneously.
target: 选择三位一体所使用的位格法术。不同位格的效果可同时生效。

source: _Body Form: %s._
target: _体之位格：%s_

source: _Mind Form: %s._
target: _智之位格：%s_

source: _Spirit Form: %s._
target: _魂之位格：%s_

source: Select an effect to be imbued into Trinity. Additional info will be shown before confirmation.
target: 选择三位一体所幻化的物品效果。附加信息将在确认之前显示。

source: Assign to body form
target: 选择体之位格效果

source: Assign to mind form
target: 选择智之位格效果

source: Assign to spirit form
target: 选择魂之位格效果

source: power of many
target: 万物一心

source: Choose an ally or location
target: 选择一个盟友或位置

source: Direct your light ally
target: 指挥你的圣天誓盟

source: You already have an empowered ally.
target: 你已经有一位强化盟友了。

source: You can't target a location you can't see.
target: 你无法以视野外的位置为目标。

source: You can only empower allies.
target: 你只能强化盟友。

source: The Cleric channels the _Power of Many_, empowering an existing ally or creating a new one.
target: 牧师引导_万物一心_之力，赋能已有盟友以为其进行强化，或创造圣天誓盟。

source:
The Cleric channels the _Power of Many_, which either empowers an existing ally or creates a new empowered one for 100 turns. Targeting an empty space creates a new ally.

While empowered by Power of Many, any ally deals +25% damage, takes -25% damage, and shares their vision with the Cleric. They also gain 25 shielding when the ability is used.

The Cleric also gains three new spells that can only be cast with an empowered ally. Power of Many won't end while one of these spells is active.
target:
牧师引导_万物一心_之力，赋能已有盟友以为其进行强化，或创造持续100回合的圣天誓盟。牧师对空位置施放该护甲技能即可创造圣天誓盟。

被万物一心强化时，任何盟友都会获得25%伤害加成与25%伤害减免，并与牧师共享视野。使用护甲能力时盟友还会获得25点护盾。

牧师还会获得三种仅能对赋能盟友施放的新法术。万物一心不会在上述法术生效时结束。

source: power of many
target: 万物一心

source:
This ally has been empowered by Power of Many, granting them +25%% damage dealt and -25%% damage taken. They will also share their vision range with the Cleric, and can benefit from power of many spells.

Power of Many will persist when allies such as prismatic images hide away, but its duration will still count down.

Turns Remaining: %s.
target:
该盟友已被万物一心强化，获得25%%伤害加成与25%%伤害减免。盟友还会与牧师共享视野，并可获益于万物一心咒语。

诸如虹卫此类盟友消散时，万物一心效果会持续存在，但效果持续时间仍会倒计时。

剩余回合数：%s

source: light ally
target: 圣天誓盟

source: Your ally moves to that position.
target: 你的盟友移动到了那个位置。

source: Your ally moves to follow you.
target: 你的盟友正在跟随你。

source: Your ally moves to attack!
target: 你的盟友正在发动攻击！

source: A copy of one of the Cleric's adventuring companions, made out of solid light. While it has the shape of another hero, it does not have any of their unique abilities. This ally will persist for as long as Power of Many is applied to them.\n\nThis ally can be directed at no cost by re-using the Power of Many armor ability.
target: 一位牧师冒险伙伴的克隆人，通体由凝聚态圣光制成。即使圣天誓盟具有另一位英雄的外形，却不具有他们的任何独特能力。只要该盟友的万物一心效果依旧存在，该盟友就会持续存在。\n\n该盟友无需消耗充能即可通过再次使用万物一心护甲技能指挥。

source: You can find this character with a specific hero armor ability.
target: 你可通过某个英雄护甲技能遇到该单位。

source: ratmogrify
target: 鼠化术

source: You can't ratmogrify that!
target: 这个目标无法被鼠化！

source: That enemy is too strong to ratmogrify!
target: 这名敌人过于强大，鼠化术无效！

source: The hero _Ratmogrifies_ an enemy! This temporarily turns them into a rat with no abilities.
target: 你可以施展_鼠化术_将目标敌人变形！敌人会暂时变为失去所有特殊能力的老鼠。

source: The hero transforms an enemy into a rat for 6 turns! Bosses, allies, and rats cannot be ratmogrified.\n\nRatmogrified enemies retain their original stats, but do not have any abilities.
target: 你能将敌人变为老鼠6回合！不过你无法变形Boss，盟友或是老鼠本身。\n\n鼠化的敌人会继承原属性值，但失去所有特殊能力。

source: ratmogrified %s
target: 鼠化%s

source: This enemy has been transformed into a rat. A big improvement, if you ask me! - Rat King
target: 这名敌人被变成了一只老鼠。对我来说的话，都是好事！——鼠王

source: Slain by: ratmogrified enemy
target: 死于：鼠化敌人

source: aura of protection
target: 守御灵光

source: Boosts defence for Paladin and nearby allies.
target: 强化圣骑士与附近盟友的防御。

source: The Paladin begins radiating protective energy in a sparkling aura around themselves for 20 turns. Any ally within 2 tiles of the Paladin (including themselves) takes %1$d%% less damage, and gains the effect of the Paladin's armor glyph at +%2$d%% power.\n\nThis damage reduction takes place before other damage-reducing effects (e.g. armor). The glyph power boost will always apply, but this spell cannot cause the Paladin's glyph to apply more than once if a character is already benefitting from it (e.g. the Paladin themselves, or a prismatic image).
target: 圣骑士开始辐射出保护性能量，在自身周围形成一片持续20回合的守御灵光。在圣骑士2格范围内的任何盟友(包括圣骑士自身)都会获得%1$d%%的伤害减免与%2$d%%的圣骑士护甲刻印强化。\n\n该伤害减免优先于其他减伤效果(例如护甲)生效。刻印强化会始终生效，但如果某单位(例如圣骑士自身、虹卫)已从圣骑士的刻印中获得效益，则该法术无法使其再次从中获得效益。

source: aura of protection
target: 守御灵光

source:
The Paladin is radiating protective energy around themselves.

Any nearby ally (including the Paladin themselves) takes reduced damage and gains the effect of the Paladin's armor glyph with boosted power.

Turns Remaining: %s.
target:
圣骑士正在自身周围辐射出保护性能量。

附近的任何盟友(包括圣骑士自身)都会获得伤害减免与圣骑士护甲刻印强化。

剩余回合数：%s

source: beaming ray
target: 光灵召唤

source: There's no space for your ally to appear there.
target: 那里没有空间让你的盟友出现。

source: That location is out of range.
target: 那个位置超出了范围。

source: Teleports your ally and grants bonus damage.
target: 传送你的盟友并使其获得伤害加成。

source: The Cleric channels the power on their ally into a ray of light that beams them to a location. If the ray collides with an enemy it will place the ally nearby and direct them towards the enemy.\n\nThe ray has a maximum range of %1$d tiles, and will increase Power of Many's bonus damage to +%2$d%% for 10 turns against the closest enemy within 4 tiles. Beaming ray can even teleport normally immobile allies, but its ranged is halved in these cases.
target: 牧师引导其盟友的力量为可将传送盟友至某个位置的光束。若光束投射到敌人上，传送光束会将盟友传送至敌人附近并将其作为攻击目标。\n\n传送光束的最大范围为%1$d格，并使万物一心对4格范围内最近敌人的伤害加成提升至%2$d%%，持续10回合。该法术还可以传送通常情况下无法移动的盟友，但若如此则传送光束范围减半。

source: beaming ray
target: 光灵召唤

source: This ally was recently teleported by Beaming Ray, giving them bonus damage against the nearest enemy after the teleport. Power of Many also won't expire when this buff is active.\n\nTurns Remaining: %s.
target: 该盟友刚被光灵召唤传送，在位移后可对最近敌人造成额外伤害。万物一心的增益不会在该效果生效时结束。\n\n剩余回合数：%s

source: bless
target: 神圣祝福

source: Blesses & shields Cleric, blesses & heals others.
target: 使牧师获得祝福和护盾，使其他单位获得祝福和治疗。

source:
The Cleric places a holy blessing on themselves or another character they can see.

When cast on themselves the effect is weaker, granting %1$d turns of bless and %2$d barrier.

When cast on other characters the spell is more powerful, granting %3$d turns of bless and %4$d healing. Excess healing is converted into barrier.
target:
牧师赐自身或视野内一个单位神圣祝福。

当神圣祝福以牧师自身为目标时效果更弱，使其获得%1$d回合赐福与%2$d点护盾。

当神圣祝福以其他单位为目标时效果更强，使其获得%3$d回合赐福与%4$d点治疗。溢出治疗将被转化为护盾。

source: body form
target: 体之位格

source: Assigns Trinity to an enchant or glyph.
target: 为三位一体选择附魔或刻印。

source:
The Cleric chooses an enchantment or glyph that they have identified this run and imbues Trinity with its effect.

When Trinity is used, The Cleric gains the effect of the chosen enchantment or glyph for %d turns. This temporary enchant or glyph will work with any effect that a regular enchantment or glyph would.

This spell replaces any other body effect that Trinity is currently imbued with.
target:
牧师选择一个本局已鉴定的附魔或刻印并使三位一体幻化其效果。

使用三位一体时，牧师会获得所选附魔或刻印的效果%d回合。该临时附魔或刻印具有正常附魔或刻印本应具有的任何效果。

该法术会刷新三位一体当前已幻化的任何体之位格效果。

source: body form
target: 体之位格

source:
Trinity's body form is currently granting you the power of an enchantment or glyph, as if you had it equipped on your current weapon or armor.

Note that body form cannot provide another copy of an effect that you're already benefitting from.

Current Effect: %1$s.

Turns Remaining: %2$s.
target:
位格法术体之位格正使你获得附魔或刻印的效果，仿佛你已将其装备于当前的武器或护甲。

注意，体之位格无法复制你已经装备的装备效果。

当前的效果：%1$s

剩余回合数：%2$s

source: cleanse
target: 神圣净化

source: Clears debuffs and grants shielding.
target: 清除减益并获得护盾。

source: The Cleric clears all harmful status effects on themselves and visible allies. After the spell ends all characters affected also gain %1$d turns of debuff immunity, and %2$d barrier.
target: 牧师清除自身和视野内盟友的所有减益效果。此后所有受影响的单位还将获得%1$d回合的减益免疫和%2$d点护盾。

source: Choose a target
target: 选择一个目标

source: There is no target there.
target: 那里没有任何目标。

source: You can't target that location.
target: 你无法以那个位置为目标。

source: You can't target that enemy.
target: 你无法以那个敌人为目标。

source: Charge cost: %d
target: 充能消耗：%d

source: divine sense
target: 神圣感知

source: Gain temporary mind vision in a wide range.
target: 短时间内获得大范围的灵视感知。

source: The Cleric focuses their senses on their surroundings, gaining mind vision with a %d tile range for 50 turns. This spell takes no time to cast.
target: 牧师将其感知集中在周遭环境上，获得持续50回合，%d格范围的灵视感知。该法术施法不耗时。

source: divine sense
target: 神圣感知

source: This character is temporarily able to see other nearby creatures with their mind!\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
target: 该单位暂时能以其灵视感知看到附近其他生物！\n\n剩余回合数：%s

source: divine intervention
target: 神圣干预

source: Massive shield boost to Cleric and allies.
target: 大幅强化牧师与盟友的护盾。

source: The Cleric pours a tremendous amount of power from their tome into themselves and allies, boosting everyone to %1$d shielding and extending Ascended Form by %2$d turns. This spell's incredible defensive power is weighed against its very high charge cost.\n\nJust like other shielding granted by ascended form, this shielding does not decay normally, but will immediately expire when ascended form ends.
target: 牧师借助圣典向自身与盟友体内注入无懈可击的神力，提升全体护盾至%1$d点并延长%2$d回合超凡升天。该法术无可匹敌的防御力与其极高的充能消耗相匹配。\n\n与超凡升天提供的其他护盾一样，这种护盾不会正常衰减，但在超凡升天结束时会立即消失。

source: flash
target: 天堂阶梯

source: Choose a location
target: 选择一个位置

source: Teleport to a nearby location.
target: 传送至附近一个位置。

source: The Cleric channels their ascended form at a nearby location and teleports there. Flash can teleport the Cleric to any discovered location that is in range and unoccupied. This spell costs more tome charges every time it is used in the same ascended form.
target: 牧师在附近的位置引导出超凡升天的神力并传送到那里。天堂阶梯可以将牧师传送至任何在范围内且未被占据的已探索区域。在同次超凡升天中，每次使用该法术时都会消耗更多的圣典充能。

source: guiding light
target: 神导之光

source: Deals ranged magic damage and guarantees a hit.
target: 造成远程魔法必中伤害。

source: The Cleric fires a bolt of magical energy which strikes a target, dealing 2-8 damage and illuminating them. The next non-encumbered physical attack made against an illuminated enemy is guaranteed to hit them.
target: 牧师发射一束魔能光矢攻击目标，造成2~8点伤害并施加圣辉。对圣辉敌人的下一次不超力的物理攻击必定命中。

source: _This spell is more powerful when cast by the Priest._ The first cast of the spell every 50 turns costs no tome charges, and illumination will be consumed by radiance, wands, other characters, and artifacts that directly affect enemies. When illuminated is used in this way, it deals bonus magic damage equal to the Priest's level + 5.
target: _祭司施放该法术时效果更强。_ 每50回合首次施放该法术不消耗圣典充能，并且圣辉可以被辐光、法杖、其他单位和直接作用于敌人的神器消耗。如此使用圣辉时，可造成等同于祭司等级+5的额外魔法伤害。

source: Guiding Light
target: 神导之光

source: The Priest will be able to cast Guiding Light for free again after 50 turns elapse.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
target: 祭司每经50回合可以免费施放一次神导之光。\n\n剩余回合数：%s

source: Illuminated
target: 圣辉

source: This character is glowing as a result of being struck by guiding light. While the glow isn't strong enough to brighten the surrounding area, the magical effect will make landing blows on them much easier for the Cleric.
target: 该单位因被神导之光击中而获得圣辉。圣辉的照度不足以照亮周围区域，但其魔法会使牧师对敌人的攻击更容易命中。

source: The Priest can additionally consume illuminated with radiance, a wand zap, strike from an ally, or effects from some artifacts. Using illuminated in this way will deal bonus magic damage equal to the Priest's level + 5.
target: 祭司可通过破晓辐光、法杖施法、盟友攻击或某些神器效果触发消耗圣辉。如此使用圣辉可造成等同于祭司等级+5的额外魔法伤害。

source: Other heroes can still use illuminated to benefit from the searing light talent, but will not gain any accuracy.
target: 其他英雄仍可通过炽热之光天赋对敌人造成额外伤害，但无法从中获得任何精准加成。

source: hallowed ground
target: 神圣领域

source: Choose a location
target: 选择一个位置

source: Heals allies, slows enemies, and spreads grass in an AOE.
target: 治疗盟友，减速敌人并在范围内扩散植被。

source:
The Priest focuses their divine magic into the ground nearby, creating a %1$dx%1$d area of hallowed terrain for 20 turns.

When it is cast, this spell heals all allies for 15 HP (healthy allies and the Priest get shielding), briefly roots enemies, and spreads short grass.

The hallowed terrain heals allies for 1 HP per turn (healthy allies and the Priest get shielding), cripples enemies, and randomly causes tall grass to grow.

Hallowed terrain is destroyed by fire, and will produce furrowed grass if passive regen effects are disabled or the Priest has not gained exp in a while.
target:
祭司将其神圣魔法聚集在附近的地面上，创造一片%1$dx%1$d范围，持续20回合的神圣领域。

施法时，法术会立即治疗所有盟友15点生命值(未受伤的的盟友和祭司会获得护盾)，短暂缠绕敌人并扩散矮草。

神圣领域每回合会治疗盟友1点生命值(未受伤的的盟友和祭司会获得护盾)，残疾敌人并随机催生高草。

神圣领域会被火焰摧毁。并且如果被动恢复效果被禁用或祭司长时间未获得经验值，神圣领域将只会产生枯草。

source: The ground has been hallowed here. Hallowed ground slows enemies, heals allies, and causes grass to spread.
target: 此处已经化为神圣领域。神圣领域会减速敌人、治疗盟友并扩散植被。

source: holy intuition
target: 神圣预知

source: choose an item
target: 选择一个物品

source: You sense malevolent magic lurking within this item.
target: 你感觉到这件物品里潜伏着一股充满恶意的魔力。

source: This item is free of malevolent magic.
target: 这个物品没有被诅咒。

source: identifies whether an item is cursed or not.
target: 鉴定一个物品有无诅咒。

source: The Cleric focuses their senses on an item and determines whether it is cursed or not without having to equip it.
target: 牧师将其感知集中在一个物品上，不必装备物品就能判断其诅咒有无。

source: holy lance
target: 神圣标枪

source: Deals heavy ranged magic damage.
target: 造成高额远程魔法伤害。

source: The Priest concentrates a large amount of energy into a devastating thrown lance made of light. This lance deals %1$d-%2$d damage and always deals maximum damage to undead and demonic targets.\n\nThis spell is very expensive, and has a cooldown of 30 turns.
target: 祭司将大量能量聚集为一柄致命的投掷用圣枪。圣枪造成%1$d~%2$d点伤害，并且必定对亡灵和恶魔目标造成最大伤害。\n\n该法术充能消耗极高，还有30回合的冷却。

source: holy lance cooldown
target: 神圣标枪-冷却

source: The Priest has recently cast Holy Lance, and must wait before casting it again.\n\nTurns remaining: %s.
target: 祭司近期施放了神圣标枪，必须等待一段时间才能再次施放。\n\n剩余回合数：%s

source: holy ward
target: 神圣护甲

source: %s of light
target: 神圣%s

source: This glyph slightly increases the amount of damage armor can block.
target: 这个刻印略微增加了护甲可防御的伤害量。

source: Temporarily overrides glyphs to boost armor blocking.
target: 临时覆盖刻印以强化护甲防御。

source: The Cleric imbues their worn armor with glyphs of holy light, increasing the armor's damage blocking by 1. This spell takes no time to cast.\n\nThis glyph lasts for 50 turns, and will override any beneficial glyph the armor has for the duration. The Cleric will benefit from this effect even if they have no armor.
target: 牧师赋予其身穿护甲神圣刻印，增加护甲1点防御。该法术施法不耗时。\n\n该刻印持续50回合，并会在持续时间内覆盖任何护甲已有的正面刻印。牧师即使没有护甲也能触发神圣刻印效果。
