source: _This spell is more powerful when cast by the Paladin._ The additional damage blocking is increased to 3, the spell no longer overrides existing glyphs, and casting other spells while holy ward is active will extend its duration by 10 turns per charge used.
target: _圣骑士施放该法术时效果更强。_神圣护甲的额外伤害防御提升至3点并不再覆盖已有的附魔，而在神圣护甲生效时施放其他法术所使用的每点充能都会延长10回合的法术效果。

source: holy ward
target: 神圣护甲

source: The Cleric has imbued their worn armor with holy energy, temporarily overriding any existing glyph and causing the armor to block an extra 1 point of damage.\n\nTurns Remaining: %s.
target: 牧师已赋予其身穿护甲神圣刻印，临时覆盖任何已有刻印并使护甲额外防御1点伤害。\n\n剩余回合数：%s

source:
The Paladin has imbued their worn armor with holy energy, causing the armor to block an extra 3 points of damage.

Casting other spells while holy ward is active will extend its duration by 10 turns per charge spent.

Turns Remaining: %s.
target:
圣骑士已赋予其身穿护甲神圣刻印，使护甲额外防御3点伤害。

神圣护甲生效时施放其他法术所消耗的每点充能都会延长法术效果10回合。

剩余回合数：%s

source: holy weapon
target: 神圣武器

source: holy %s
target: 神圣%s

source: Enemies struck by a holy weapon will take extra magical damage.
target: 被神圣武器攻击的敌人会受到额外魔法伤害。

source: Temporarily overrides enchantments to boost damage.
target: 临时覆盖附魔以强化武器伤害。

source: The Cleric enchants their worn weapon with holy energy, causing the weapon to deal an additional 2 magical damage any time they strike an enemy with it. This spell takes no time to cast.\n\nThis enchantment lasts for 50 turns, and will override any beneficial enchantment the weapon has for the duration. Unarmed strikes can also benefit from this effect.
target: 牧师赋予其手持武器神圣附魔，使武器每次攻击敌人额外造成2点魔法伤害。该法术施法不耗时。\n\n该附魔持续50回合，并会在持续时间内覆盖任何武器已有的正面附魔。赤手空拳攻击敌人也能触发神圣附魔效果。

source: _This spell is more powerful when cast by the Paladin._ The additional magical damage is increased to 6, the spell no longer overrides existing enchantments, and casting other spells while holy weapon is active will extend its duration by 10 turns per charge used.
target: _圣骑士施放该法术时效果更强。_神圣武器的额外魔法伤害提升至6点并不再覆盖已有的附魔，而在神圣武器生效时施放其他法术所使用的每点充能都会延长10回合的法术效果。

source: holy weapon
target: 神圣武器

source: The Cleric has imbued their worn weapon with holy energy, temporarily overriding any existing enchantment and causing the weapon to deal an extra 2 magical damage on each attack.\n\nTurns Remaining: %s.
target: 牧师已赋予其手持武器神圣附魔，临时覆盖任何已有附魔并使武器每次攻击额外造成2点魔法伤害。\n\n剩余回合数：%s

source:
The Paladin has imbued their worn weapon with holy energy, causing their attacks to deal an extra 6 magical damage.

Casting other spells while holy weapon is active will extend its duration by 10 turns per charge spent.

Turns Remaining: %s.
target:
圣骑士已赋予其手持武器神圣附魔，使其攻击额外造成6点魔法伤害。

神圣武器生效时施放其他法术所消耗的每点充能都会延长10回合的法术效果。

剩余回合数：%s

source: judgement
target: 终末天启

source: Damages all visible enemies.
target: 对视野内所有敌人造成伤害。

source: The Cleric slams their fist onto the ground, causing an eruption of light that deals damage to all enemies they can see. This deals %1$d-%2$d damage at base, but also deals an additional 33%% damage for each spell the Cleric has cast since entering ascended form (or since they last cast Judgement).\n\nCurrently Judgement will deal %3$d-%4$d damage.
target: 牧师撕裂苍穹，以圣光之名审判视野内所有敌人。法术会在造成%1$d~%2$d点伤害的基础之上，再根据牧师自进入超凡升天以来(或自上次施放终末天启以来)的每次施法额外造成33%%伤害。\n\n当前终末天启会造成%3$d~%4$d点伤害。

source: lay on hands
target: 圣疗之触

source: Instantly heals an adjacent character or shields the Paladin.
target: 立即治疗附近一个单位或使圣骑士获得护盾。

source:
The Paladin channels holy energy through their hands, healing or protecting whatever they touch.

The Paladin can cast this spell on any adjacent character to give them %1$d healing, or on themselves to gain %1$d shielding. Excess healing from this spell is converted into shielding.

This spell is cast instantaneously and can be cast repeatedly, but cannot grant more than three casts worth of shielding at a time.
target:
圣骑士以其双手引导出神圣能量，治疗或保护其所触的任何单位。

圣骑士可施放该法术使附近任何单位获得%1$d点治疗，或使自身获得%1$d点护盾。该法术的溢出治疗将被转化为护盾。

该法术可被立即施放、重复施放，但无法立即施加超过三次施法数值的护盾。

source: life link
target: 血色羁绊

source: Shares damage with an ally, and reduces their damage taken.
target: 与盟友共享所受伤害，并使其获得伤害减免。

source: The Cleric strengthens the link between themselves and their empowered ally. With this empowered link, any damage taken will be shared between both the hero and their ally for %1$d turns, and Power of Many's defensive boost will be increased to -%2$d%% damage taken. Note that the damage is shared after armor, but before Power of Many's damage reduction.\n\nWhile this effect is active, beneficial Cleric spells of T3 or below will apply to both the Cleric and their ally if they would have just applied to one of them.
target: 牧师强化自身与其强化盟友之间的生命联结。该强化版生命联结持续%1$d回合，会使英雄与其盟友共享任何所受伤害，并使万物一心的伤害减免提升至%2$d%%。注意，伤害共享的优先级低于护甲，但高于万物一心的伤害减免。\n\n生命联结效果生效时，对任何一方施放3阶及以下的增益型牧师法术对双方均有效果。

source: life link protection
target: 血色羁绊

source:
The Cleric recently cast Life Link on this ally.

In addition to Life Link's regular benefits, this character also takes reduced damage, any positive Cleric spells are applied to both the Cleric and this ally instead of just one, and Power of Many won't expire while this buff is active.

Turns Remaining: %s.
target:
牧师近期对该盟友施放了血色羁绊以建立生命联结。

除生命联结的通常效果外，该单位还会获得伤害减免，任何增益型牧师法术对牧师与该盟友施放时对双方均生效，并且万物一心不会在该效果生效时结束。

剩余回合数：%s

source: mind form
target: 智之位格

source: Assigns Trinity to a wand or thrown weapon.
target: 为三位一体选择法杖或投武。

source:
The Cleric chooses a wand or thrown weapons that they have identified this run and imbues Trinity with its effect.

When Trinity is used, The Cleric can make a single attack as if they were using the chosen item at +%d. This will trigger all effects that using that type of item would normally trigger.

This spell replaces any other mind effect that Trinity is currently imbued with.
target:
牧师选择一个本局已鉴定的法杖或投武并使三位一体幻化其效果。

使用三位一体时，牧师会使用所选物品单次攻击的%d级效果。该次攻击触发正常使用该物品本应触发的所有效果。

该法术会刷新三位一体当前已有的任何智之位格效果。

source: mnemonic prayer
target: 祈愿诗篇

source: Extends buffs/debuffs on an ally/enemy, & re-applies illuminated.
target: 延长盟友/敌人的增益/减益效果， 并重新施加圣辉。

source: The Priest utters a prayer that extends the duration of all buffs or debuffs on a specific target by %1$d turns. This spell takes no time to cast. Positive effects will last longer on allies (including the Priest themselves), and harmful effects will last longer on enemies.\n\nMnemonic Prayer can only extend a specific instance of a buff or debuff once, and cannot extend buffs granted from armor abilities.
target: 祭司念诵出延长%1$d回合特定目标所有增益或减益效果的经文。该法术施法不耗时。增益对盟友(包括祭司自身)持续时间更久，减益对敌人持续时间更久。\n\n祈愿诗篇只能延长一次特定目标的增益或减益效果，并且不能延长来自护甲技能的增益效果。

source: radiance
target: 破晓辐光

source: Illuminates and briefly stuns visible enemies.
target: 为视野内敌人触发并施加圣辉而将其暂时击晕。

source: The Priest erupts in holy light, stunning all visible enemies for 3 turns. If an enemy is already illuminated, Radiance will trigger illuminate's bonus damage and then apply the illuminated debuff. Radiance will also cause the Priest to glow for 100 turns if the current floor is dark.
target: 祭司通体迸出圣光，击晕所有视野内敌人3回合。若敌人已获得圣辉，法术会触发圣辉的额外伤害并在此之后施加圣辉。若本层视野较暗，法术还会使祭司发光100回合。

source: recall inscription
target: 符文复制

source: Repeats a recently used runestone or scroll.
target: 重复最近使用的符石或卷轴效果。

source: The Cleric uses holy magic to re-cast the effect of a magical rune found on a runestone or scroll they used in the last %s turns.\n\nRecall Inscription cannot be used to replicate scrolls of upgrade. This spell's charge cost varies based on which item was used recently: 2 for a runestone, 3 for a scroll, 4 for an exotic scroll. This charge cost is also doubled when replicating a scroll of transmutation, or alchemy items that must be crafted using transmutation or upgrade.
target: 牧师使用神圣魔法复制最近使用的符文以再次触发%s回合前使用的卷轴或符石的魔法效果。\n\n符文复制不能复制升级卷轴，充能消耗根据最近一次使用的物品变化而变化：符石2点充能、卷轴3点充能、秘卷4点充能。复制嬗变卷轴或嬗变/升级卷轴的符石/秘卷时，充能消耗还会翻倍。

source: recently used rune
target: 近期已使用符文

source:
The Cleric has recently used an item that works with the inscribed recall spell. The Cleric can cast the spell to repeat the item's effect.

Item Used: %1$s.

Turns Remaining: %2$s.
target:
牧师近期已使用一个兼容符文复制法术效果的物品，可以通过施法再次触发物品效果。

已使用物品：%1$s

剩余回合数：%2$s

source: shield of light
target: 神圣护盾

source: Grants temporary armor against a target.
target: 获得仅对单个目标生效的临时护甲。

source: The Cleric creates a thin barrier of light between themselves and an enemy, increasing their armor's block power against that enemy by %1$d-%2$d for 5 turns.\n\nThis spell takes no time to cast, but cannot be used against multiple targets simultaneously.
target: 牧师在自身与敌人间创造了一面薄弱的圣盾，增加其护甲对该敌人持续5回合的%1$d~%2$d点防御。\n\n该法术施法不耗时，但不能同时对多个目标使用。

source: shield of light
target: 神圣护盾

source: A thin shield of light is standing between this character and an enemy. It's not strong enough to outright block attacks, but will soften them.\n\nTurns Remaining: %s
target: 一面薄弱的圣盾立于该单位与敌人之间。圣盾的强度不足以完全防御攻击，但能将其减弱。\n\n剩余回合数：%s

source: spirit form
target: 魂之位格

source: Assigns Trinity to a ring or artifact.
target: 为三位一体选择戒指或神器。

source:
The Cleric chooses a ring or artifact that they have identified this run (except the holy tome) and imbues Trinity with its effect.

If a ring is chosen, then Trinity grants that ring's effect at +%1$d for 20 turns.

If an artifact is chosen, then Trinity replicates that Artifact's effect at +%2$d. Each artifact has different specific behaviors and armor charge costs when used with Trinity.

This spell replaces any other spirit effect that Trinity is currently imbued with.
target:
牧师选择本局已鉴定的戒指或神器(神圣法典除外)并使三位一体幻化其效果。

如果所选物品为戒指，三位一体会获得所选戒指的%1$d级效果20回合。

如果所选物品为神器，三位一体会复制所选神器的%2$d级效果。三位一体使用神器时的具体效果与护甲充能消耗因神器而异。

该法术会刷新三位一体当前已幻化的任何魂之位格效果。

source: spirit form
target: 魂之位格

source:
Trinity's spirit form is currently granting you the power of an item, as if you had it equipped.

Note that spirit form cannot provide another copy of an effect that you're already benefitting from.

Current Effect: %1$s.

Turns Remaining: %2$s.
target:
位格法术魂之位格正使你获得物品的效果，仿佛你已将其装备于装备栏。

注意，魂之位格无法复制你已经装备的装备效果。

当前的效果：%1$s

剩余回合数：%2$s

source: smite
target: 至圣斩击

source: Guarantees a hit with bonus damage and enchant power.
target: 一次带有额外伤害与附魔强化的必中攻击。

source:
The Paladin infuses a melee strike with righteous destructive power.

In addition to dealing normal melee damage, Smite makes non-encumbered attacks guaranteed to hit, has +300%% enchantment power, and deals %1$d - %2$d bonus magic damage.

Smite's bonus magic damage scales with the Paladin's level, and it will always deal maximum bonus magic damage against undead or demonic foes.
target:
圣骑士为一次致命的近战攻击注入正义之力。

在造成正常近战伤害的基础上，至圣斩使不超力的攻击必定命中，附有300%%的附魔强化并造成%1$d~%2$d点额外魔法伤害。

至圣斩的额外魔法伤害随圣骑士的等级成长而成长，并且至圣斩必定对恶魔和亡灵敌人造成最大额外魔法伤害。

source: stasis
target: 星界投射

source: Removes ally from dungeon and preserves them.
target: 将盟友移出地牢并凝滞其状态。

source: The Cleric focuses their connection with their ally toward themselves, causing the ally to be temporarily held in a sort of energy stasis within the Cleric. The ally will be preserved for up to %d turns, with all positive effects on them being unaffected by their time in stasis.\n\nThe ally will appear next to the Cleric when stasis ends naturally or they can instantly re-cast the spell at no cost to end the effect early. Stasis can even move immobile allies, but cannot transfer them between floors.
target: 牧师将其与盟友的联系集中于自身，使盟友暂时化为牧师体内的某种凝滞状态的能量。盟友最多会被凝滞%d回合，而在凝滞状态下，其所有的正面效果均不受时间影响。\n\n法术效果自然结束时盟友会出现在牧师附近，牧师也可无消耗地立即再次施放该法术以提前结束法术效果。星界投射还可移动无法移动的盟友，但无法将其跨层移动。

source: ally in stasis
target: 星界投射

source: Your immobile ally is left behind.
target: 你无法移动的盟友被落在了后面。

source:
The Cleric currently has an ally stored in stasis. All positive effects on this ally are preserved, including Power of Many, and they will reappear next to the Cleric when the effect ends. The effect can also be ended early by re-casting Stasis.

Ally in stasis: %1$s.
Turns Remaining: %2$s.
target:
牧师当前已有盟友被星界投射凝滞状态。该盟友包括万物一心在内的所有正面效果都会被凝滞，并且法术效果结束时盟友会在牧师附近再次出现。法术效果还可被再次施放星界投射提前结束。

已凝滞盟友：%1$s
剩余回合数：%2$s

source: sunray
target: 日耀射线

source: Deals ranged magic damage and blinds a target once.
target: 造成远程魔法伤害并致盲目标一次。

source: The Cleric fires a ray of blinding light at a target, dealing %1$d-%2$d damage and blinding them for %3$d turns. Sunray always deals maximum damage to undead and demonic targets.\n\nAfter being struck with this spell an enemy's vision will adjust, preventing them from being blinded by it again. However, if they are struck again while blinded by this spell, then the light is overwhelming and paralyses them instead.
target: 牧师向目标发射致盲光束，造成%1$d~%2$d伤害并使其失明%3$d回合。日耀射线必定对亡灵和恶魔目标造成最大伤害。\n\n被该法术击中后敌人会调节其视觉，以防被射线再次致盲。然而，如果在被该法术致盲后再次被该法术击中，那么压倒性的强光会将其麻痹而非致盲。

source: wall of light
target: 神圣屏障

source: Creates a wall that blocks enemies.
target: 创造一面阻挡敌人的屏障。

source:
The Paladin creates a wall made out of panels of solid light directly in front of themselves which is 1 tile thick, %1$d tiles wide, and lasts for 20 turns.

This wall acts just like a regular one, except it can be seen through. Enemies that are caught in the wall when its created will be momentarily stunned and pushed back if possible. Anything stuck in the wall will be able to move out of it.

The wall can be cast in any of the four cardinal or four diagonal directions. If a wall is already active, the spell can be re-used for free to instantly clear the wall.
target:
圣骑士将圣光凝聚为墙壁，在自身面前创造一面1格厚，%1$d格宽，持续20回合的神圣屏障。

神圣屏障除不遮挡视野外与正常墙壁无异。在屏障被创造时，屏障所困住的敌人会被短暂击晕并在条件允许的情况下被击退。屏障所卡住的任何东西都可被取出。

神圣屏障可被正向或斜向施放。如果已有屏障存在，则该法术可被免费再次使用以立即驱散屏障。

source: You dispel the wall of light.
target: 你驱散了神圣屏障。

source: Shimmering panels of light are blocking passage here.
target: 神圣屏障阻挡了此处的通路。

source: you
target: 你

source: You can't leave yet, the rest of the dungeon awaits below!
target: 现在还不能离去，埋藏在地牢之下的名利正呼唤着你！

source: Level up!
target: 升级！

source: Level up! +Accuracy, +Evasion, +5 HP!
target: 升级！精准+，闪避+，最大生命值+5！

source: +1 Talent Point!
target: 天赋点+1！

source: You have unspent talent points!
target: 你还有尚未使用的天赋点！

source: You cannot grow stronger, but your experiences do give you a surge of power!
target: 你不能变得更强了，不过你的经验给了你一股力量！

source: you picked up: %s.
target: 你获得了：%s。

source: you can't carry: %s.
target: 你无法携带：%s。

source: This chest is locked and you don't have a matching key.
target: 箱子锁着而你没有对应的钥匙。

source: You don't have a matching key.
target: 你没有对应的钥匙。

source: You noticed something.
target: 你注意到了些什么。

source: search
target: 搜索

source: It's hard to concentrate, searching is exhausting.
target: 你没办法集中精力，探索周边异常费力。

source: You fiddle with the lock but can't quite open it this time.
target: 你摆弄了一下这把锁，却无法打开它。

source: The pain helps you resist the urge to sleep.
target: 疼痛使你得以抵抗睡意。

source: The ankh explodes with life-giving energy!
target: 重生十字章迸裂出苏生的能量！

source: warrior
target: 战士

source: The Warrior endures extra damage with shielding granted by his _broken seal._ The seal can be moved between armors and _transfers a single upgrade._
target: 战士用他的_破损纹章_生成护盾以额外减免伤害。纹章可以在护甲之间转移，并且可以_携带一级升级_。

source:
The Warrior starts with a _unique broken seal_ that grants him a burst of shielding when he is below half health. The seal can be moved between armors, and can _transfer a single upgrade_ with it.

The Warrior also starts with a _worn shortsword_, _three throwing stones_, cloth armor, a waterskin, and a velvet pouch.

The Warrior automatically identifies:
_-_ Scrolls of Identify
_-_ Potions of Healing
_-_ Scrolls of Rage
target:
战士初始携带一枚_独特的破损纹章_，可使他在生命值半数以下时获得爆发性护盾。纹章可以在护甲之间转移，并且可以携带一级升级。

同时，战士初始携带一柄_破旧的短剑_，_三块投石_，布甲，水袋与绒布包。

战士开局鉴定的物品有：
_-_鉴定卷轴
_-_治疗药剂
_-_盛怒卷轴

source: The Warrior is automatically unlocked.
target: 战士开局即解锁。

source: mage
target: 法师

source: The Mage is an arcane expert and carries a _magical staff_ that's stronger than a wand. The staff can be _imbued with any wand_ the Mage finds.
target: 法师是一位奥术专家，开局持有一根强于法杖的_魔杖_。魔杖可以灌注法师找到的_任何魔杖_。

source:
The Mage starts with a _unique staff_, which recharges significantly faster than a wand and has 1 more charge. The staff _can be imbued with any wand_ the Mage finds in the dungeon.

The Mage also starts with a _wand of magic missile_ imbued in his staff, cloth armor, a waterskin, and a velvet pouch.

The Mage automatically identifies:
_-_ Scrolls of Identify
_-_ Potions of Liquid Flame
_-_ Scrolls of Upgrade
target:
法师初始携带一根_独特的魔杖_。魔杖的自动充能速度显著快于一般法杖，并且有1点额外最大充能数。法师可以将地牢中找到的各式法杖灌注到魔杖中。

同时，法师初始携带一根已灌注于魔杖中的_魔弹法杖_、布甲、水袋与绒布包。

法师开局鉴定的物品有：
_-_鉴定卷轴
_-_液火药剂
_-_升级卷轴

source: To unlock the Mage _use a scroll of upgrade to make an item stronger._
target: _使用一张升级卷轴强化一个物品_以解锁法师。

source: rogue
target: 盗贼

source: The Rogue can evade enemies and strike from invisibility using his _cloak of shadows._ He also _detects secrets and traps_ from a greater distance.
target: 盗贼能借助他的_暗影斗篷_来躲避和偷袭敌人。他还可以从更远的距离_探测秘密与陷阱_。

source:
The Rogue starts with a _unique Cloak of Shadows_, which he can use to become invisible at will.

The Rogue can _detect secrets and traps_ from a greater distance.

The Rogue also starts with _a dagger_, _three throwing knives_, cloth armor, a waterskin, and a velvet pouch.

The Rogue automatically identifies:
_-_ Scrolls of Identify
_-_ Potions of Invisibility
_-_ Scrolls of Magic Mapping
target:
盗贼初始携带一件_独特的暗影斗篷_。披上后，盗贼可以随时隐形。

盗贼能从更远的距离_探测秘密与陷阱_。

同时，盗贼初始携带_一柄匕首_，_三把飞刀_，布甲，水袋与绒布包。

盗贼开局鉴定的物品有：
_-_鉴定卷轴
_-_隐形药剂
_-_探地卷轴

source: To unlock the Rogue _perform 10 surprise attacks in one game._
target: _在一场游戏中进行十次伏击_以解锁盗贼。

source: huntress
target: 女猎手

source: The Huntress is a master of thrown weapons and has a _magical bow_ with infinite arrows. She also travels through tall grass _without trampling it._
target: 女猎手精通投掷武器，并且具有一把能无限射击的_灵能弓_。女猎手可以穿过高草丛而_不将其践踏成草地_。

source:
The Huntress starts with a _unique spirit bow_, which can fire an infinite number of conjured arrows.

The Huntress can travel through tall grass _without trampling it_.

The Huntress also starts with _studded gloves_, cloth armor, a waterskin, and a velvet pouch.

The Huntress automatically identifies:
_-_ Scrolls of Identify
_-_ Potions of Mind Vision
_-_ Scrolls of Lullaby
target:
女猎手初始携带一把_独特的灵能弓_，可以无限发射魔法箭矢。

女猎手可以穿过高草而_不会践踏高草_。

同时，女猎手初始携带一副_镶钉手套_，布甲，水袋与绒布包。

女猎手开局鉴定的道具有：
_-_鉴定卷轴
_-_灵视药剂
_-_催眠卷轴

source: To unlock the Huntress _hit enemies with thrown weapons 10 times in one game._
target: _在一场游戏中使用投掷武器命中十次敌人_以解锁女猎手。

source: duelist
target: 决斗家

source: The Duelist is a weapons master who can use her weapon to trigger a _special weapon ability._ This special ability is _different for every weapon._
target: 决斗家是一名武器大师，她能够用武器使出_独特的武技_。使出的武技_依不同武器而异_。

source:
The Duelist starts with a _unique rapier_ with a special ability that recharges over time.

Every weapon in the game has a _different special ability_ that the Duelist can use.

The Duelist also starts with _two throwing spikes_, cloth armor, a waterskin, and a velvet pouch.

The Duelist automatically identifies:
_-_ Scrolls of Identify
_-_ Potions of Strength
_-_ Scrolls of Mirror Image
target:
决斗家初始携带一柄_独特的刺剑_，拥有随时间自然充能的特殊武技。

决斗家持有地牢中的任何武器时都将拥有_不同的武技_。

决斗家初始还携带有_两根飞刺_、布甲、水袋以及绒布袋。

决斗家开局鉴定的物品有：
_-_鉴定卷轴
_-_力量药剂
_-_镜像卷轴

source: To unlock the Duelist _equip a tier 2 or higher weapon with no strength penalty._
target: _在力量达到需求的情况下装备一把2阶或更高阶的武器_以解锁决斗家。

source: cleric
target: 牧师

source: The Cleric is a divine spellcaster who uses their unique _holy tome_ to channel divine magic. They can _learn and upgrade spells_ via talents.
target: 牧师是一名使用其独特的_神圣法典_引导神圣魔法的神圣施法者。其能通过天赋_学习并升级法术_。

source:
The Cleric starts with a _unique holy tome_, which they can use to cast various spells.

Most of the Cleric's talents are focused around learning or upgrading spells.

The Cleric also starts with _a cudgel_, cloth armor, a waterskin, and a velvet pouch.

The Cleric automatically identifies:
_-_ Scrolls of Identify
_-_ Potions of Purity
_-_ Scrolls of Remove Curse
target:
牧师初始携带一本_独特的神圣法典_，可以使其施放各种各样的法术。

牧师的大多数天赋专注于学习或升级法术上。

牧师初始还携带有_一柄权杖_、布甲、水袋以及绒布袋。

牧师开局鉴定的物品有：
_-_鉴定卷轴
_-_净化药剂
_-_祛邪卷轴

source: To unlock the Cleric _fully cleanse the curse on any piece of cursed equipment._
target: _完全净化任何一件被诅咒装备的诅咒_以解锁牧师

source: berserker
target: 狂战士

source: The _Berserker_ builds rage as he takes damage. Rage increases his damage and can be activated at 100% for bonus shielding.
target: _狂战士_在受到伤害的时候会积累怒气，怒气能提高狂战士的攻击力，并可在其达到100%时激活以获得额外护盾。

source: The Berserker gains rage as he takes physical damage, including damage that gets blocked by his armor! Rage steadily fades away over time, but fades more slowly if he is at low HP.\n\nRage can cause the Berserker to deal up to +50% damage. At max rage he can go berserk, gaining a burst of shielding and keeping his rage as long as he has shielding left. The shielding scales with the level of the berserker's armor, and can be massively boosted if he is at low health. The Berserker needs time to recover after he goes berserk.
target: 狂战士会在他受到物理伤害时获得怒气，甚至包括被其护甲所格挡的伤害！怒气会随时间稳定流逝，但会在狂战士生命值较低时流逝更慢。\n\n怒气可使狂战士造成最多50%额外伤害。怒气为满时，狂战士可以进行狂暴，获得爆发性护盾，而只要狂战士仍有护盾剩余，其怒气也会保持不变。护盾会随狂战士护甲等级的增长而增长，并且在其生命值较低时护盾可被大幅强化。在他进行狂暴之后，狂战士需要时间稍作休息。

source: gladiator
target: 角斗士

source: The _Gladiator_ builds combo when he makes successful attacks. He can spend combo to use unique abilities.
target: _角斗士_会在成功进行攻击时积累连击数。角斗士可以消耗连击数以使用特殊战技。

source:
The Gladiator builds one point of combo every time he makes a successful attack with a melee or thrown weapon. If the Gladiator does not make a successful attack within 5 turns (15 turns after a kill), his combo is reset.

As he builds combo the Gladiator can use a variety of abilities that are guaranteed to hit:
2 Combo: knock enemy back, preserves combo
4 Combo: deal damage based on armor
6 Combo: parry, preserves combo
8 Combo: damage target and nearby enemies
10 Combo: attack once for each combo
target:
每当角斗士以近战武器或投掷武器成功击中目标时，他都会积累一点连击。如果角斗士在5回合之内(击杀后15回合之内)未能成功命中目标，那么其连击会被重置。

随着角斗士积累连击，他可以使用一系列必中的连击战技：
2连击：击退敌人，保留连击
4连击：造成基于护甲的伤害
6连击：招架攻击，保留连击
8连击：攻击目标与附近敌人
10连击：每连击一次就攻击一次

source: battlemage
target: 战斗法师

source: The _Battlemage_ conjures bonus effects when fighting in melee with his staff. These effects depend on the wand his staff is imbued with.
target: _战斗法师_在使用魔杖近战攻击时会附带额外的法术效果。这些效果取决于魔杖内灌注的法杖种类。

source: The Battlemage gains a bonus effect whenever he strikes in melee with his staff, as if his staff had an additional enchantment. These effects depend on the wand his staff is imbued with, every wand has its own effect. In addition to the wand effects, the Battlemage's staff will also gain 0.5 charges when he strikes with it.
target: 战斗法师使用魔杖近战时会附带类似附魔的额外效果，效果取决于魔杖所灌注的法杖种类，每种法杖各不相同。用魔杖近战打击还会为其恢复0.5点充能。

source: warlock
target: 术士

source: The _Warlock_ has a chance to soul mark enemies with his wands. He will heal whenever he deals physical damage to marked enemies.
target: _术士_在使用法杖时有概率标记敌人的灵魂。每当术士对被标记的敌人造成物理伤害，自身就会恢复生命值。

source: The Warlock has a chance to inflict a soul mark on characters when he uses wands on them. The chance to apply a soul mark and its duration increase with wand level.\n\nWhen an enemy is soul marked, the Warlock will heal 2 hp for every 5 damage he deals to them, but only with attacks from melee or thrown weapons, not from wands!
target: 术士在对角色使用法杖时有概率为其施加灵魂标记。施加灵魂标记的概率与标记的持续时间随法杖等级增加而上升。\n\n术士攻击被标记的敌人时，每造成5点伤害，就恢复2点生命值。此效果只对物理攻击有效，对法杖施法的伤害无效！

source: assassin
target: 刺客

source: The _Assassin_ can prepare a deadly strike while he is invisible. The longer he waits, the more powerful the attack will be.
target: 隐形时，_刺客_会准备一次致命的攻击。耐心等得越久，这一击的威力越强。

source: The Assassin prepares his next strike when he becomes invisible. The longer he prepares for, the more powerful his next attack will be. Preparation builds for up to 9 turns.\n\nAfter preparing, the Assassin deals bonus damage on his next attack, can blink to his target, and can even instantly kill enemies who are weak enough.
target: 刺客会在隐形时准备强力的一击。他准备的时间越长，下次攻击就越致命。准备阶段最多累计9回合。\n\n准备充分后，刺客的下一次攻击会造成额外伤害，能闪现向目标，甚至还能直接斩杀足够虚弱的敌人。

source: freerunner
target: 疾行者

source: The _Freerunner_ builds momentum as he runs, which can be used to start freerunning. This grants him bonus speed and evasion for a short while.
target: _疾行者_在奔跑时会累积动量。动量可以用于开启逸动效果，使他在短时间内获得速度和闪避加成。

source: As the Freerunner moves he builds stacks of momentum. He can gain up to 10 momentum after running for 10 turns, but rapidly loses it if he stops moving. The freerunner can use up his momentum to start freerunning, for 2 turns per point of momentum.\n\nWhen freerunning the Freerunner moves at 2x speed, and gains bonus evasion in proportion to his level. Once freerunning ends there is a cooldown before momentum can be built again.
target: _疾行者_在奔跑时会累积动量。他每次移动获得1点动量，最多累积10点，在不移动时动量会迅速衰减。动量可用于开启逸动状态，每点动量获取2回合逸动。\n\n逸动状态下的疾行者以双倍速度跑动，并获得正比于自身等级的额外闪避。逸动状态结束后，疾行者需休息一会以重新积累动量。

source: sniper
target: 狙击手

source: The _Sniper_ can pierce armor with her ranged attacks. After striking with a thrown weapon she can follow up with a special attack from her bow.
target: _狙击手_的远程攻击能穿透护甲。用投掷武器击中目标后，狙击手能以灵能弓进行一次特殊追击。

source: The Sniper is a master of ranged combat, whose ranged attacks pierce enemy armor. When she attacks an enemy with a thrown weapon, she places a sniper's mark on them, which lets her follow up with a special attack from her bow. This special attack varies based on how her bow is augmented.\n\nAn unaugmented bow will fire a snapshot which deals reduced damage but fires instantly. A speed bow will fire a volley of three arrows which deal reduced damage, can still activate enchantments, and take 1 turn to fire. A damage bow will fire a sniper shot which is guaranteed to hit, deals bonus damage based on distance, and takes 2 turns to fire.
target: 狙击手是远程战斗大师，她的远程攻击无视敌人护甲。使用投掷武器击中敌人后，女猎手能对目标施以狙击标记，以使用灵能弓对此敌人发射一次追击。追击的形式取决于弓的强化方式。\n\n未强化的弓会射出一支伤害稍低的速射箭矢，但射击不耗时。强化速度的弓会连射出三箭，每支箭的伤害较低但能触发附魔，射击耗时1回合。强化伤害的弓会射出一支必中的狙杀箭矢，造成基于距离的额外伤害，射击耗时2回合。

source: warden
target: 守望者

source: The _Warden_ can see through tall grass and gains bonus effects when she plants seeds and tramples plants.
target: _守望者_具有穿透高草的视野，而且在种植和踩踏植物时会获得额外效果。

source: The Warden has a strong connection to nature which grants her a variety of bonus effects relating to grass and plants. She is able to see through tall and furrowed grass as if it were empty space.\n\nThe Warden causes grass to sprout up around any seed she throws or plants, and gains special effects when trampling plants. These special effects replace the regular plant effects, meaning that no plant is harmful for her to step on.
target: 守望者与自然之力有强大的联结，这赋予了她多项有关植物的能力。守望者具有穿透高草与枯草的视野。\n\n守望者种下的种子周围会生出草，在踩踏植物时会获得额外效果取代原本效果，使得所有植株对其完全无害。

source: champion
target: 勇士

source: The _Champion_ can wield two weapons and gets more weapon charges. Her regular attacks use her primary weapon, but she can swap weapons and use either weapon's ability.
target: _勇士_可以双持武器，并拥有更多武技充能。她用主武器进行普通攻击，但她也可以自如地切换主、副武器，并施展两武器各自的武技。

source: The Champion is a master of melee weapons who can equip a secondary weapon in addition to her primary one. Her regular attacks use her primary weapon, but she can swap her primary weapon instantly and use either weapon's ability.\n\nShe also gains 2 more max weapon ability charges and +50% weapon ability recharge speed.
target: 勇士善使近战武器，除了主武器，她还能再装备一件副武器。勇士用主武器进行普通攻击，但她可以不耗时地切换主、副武器，也能施放两武器各自的武技。\n\n她还额外有2点武技充能上限，且武技充能回复速率提升50%。

source: monk
target: 武僧

source: The _Monk_ builds energy while fighting. This energy can be spent on a variety of unique abilities.
target: _武僧_在战斗时能够积蓄内力，这些内力可用于施展诸多武功。

source:
The Monk is a master of physical technique. As she defeats enemies, she gains energy which can be used on a variety of defensive and utility-focused abilities. This energy does not fade over time, but has a cap based on the Monk's level.

1 Energy: quickly strike with fists
2 Energy: focus to dodge next attack
3 Energy: instantly dash nearby
4 Energy: kick an enemy away
5 Energy: meditate to clear statuses and restore wand & artifact charge
target:
武僧的武术造诣十分深厚。她在击败敌人时能够积蓄内力，并用于施放诸多防御性和功能性的能力。内力不会随时间流失，但具有基于武僧等级的存储上限。

1点内力：快速出拳打击
2点内力：凝神以闪避下次攻击
3点内力：瞬间闪现至周边
4点内力：将敌人踢开
5点内力：冥思以清除减益效果并回复法杖与神器充能

source: priest
target: 祭司

source: The _Priest_ gains new long-range spells and an empowered version of guiding light.
target: _祭司_会获得全新的远程法术和强化版神导之光。

source:
The Priest gains a variety of new and upgraded spells that emphasize ranged combat and synergy with magical items.

The Priest can cast _Guiding Light_ for free once every 50 turns, illuminates enemies directly targeted by any of their spells, and can consume the illumination debuff with allies, wands, and some artifacts for bonus damage equal to their level + 5.

The Priest also gains the _Radiance_ spell, which dispels darkness and affects all visible enemies, triggering and applying illuminate and briefly stunning them at the cost of 2 charges.
target:
祭司获得一系列全新升级的法术，其主要强调远程攻击与魔法物品兼容。

祭司每经50回合可以免费施放一次_神导之光_，可通过其任何直接作用于敌人的法术施加圣辉，并可通过盟友、法杖和某些神器消耗圣辉以造成等同于祭司等级+5的额外伤害。

祭司还会获得法术_破晓辐光_，消耗2点充能以驱散黑暗，为视野内所有敌人触发并施加圣辉，并将其短暂击晕。

source: paladin
target: 圣骑士

source: The _Paladin_ gains new short-range spells and empowered versions of holy weapon and ward.
target: _圣骑士_会获得全新的近程法术和强化版神圣武器、神圣护甲。

source:
The Paladin gains a variety of new and upgraded spells that emphasize melee combat and synergy with weapons and armor.

The Paladin's _Holy Weapon_ and _Holy Ward_ spells grant larger bonuses, no longer override existing enchantments and glyphs, and can be extended by casting other spells.

The Paladin also gains the _Smite_ spell, which lets them perform a guaranteed melee hit with bonus damage and enchantment power.
target:
圣骑士获得一系列全新升级的法术，其主要强调近战攻击与武器护甲兼容。

圣骑士的法术_神圣武器_与_神圣护甲_的攻防加成获得大幅强化，其不再覆盖已有的附魔与刻印，并可通过施放其他法术延长其时效。

圣骑士还会获得法术_至圣斩击_，进行一次带有额外伤害与附魔强度的必中近战攻击。

source: hearty meal
target: 丰盛一餐

source: _+1:_ Eating food heals the Warrior for _4 HP_ when he is at or below 33% health.\n\n_+2:_ Eating food heals the Warrior for _6 HP_ when he is at or below 33% health.
target: _+1：_ 战士在生命值不高于33%时进食将恢复_4点生命_。\n\n_+2：_ 战士在生命值不高于33%时进食将恢复_6点生命_。

source: veteran's intuition
target: 老兵直觉

source: _+1:_ The Warrior identifies weapons _1.75x faster_ and armor _2.5x faster_.\n\n_+2:_ The Warrior identifies weapons _2.5x faster_ and armor _when he equips it_.
target: _+1：_战士鉴定武器的速度提升至原来的_1.75倍_，鉴定护甲的速度提升至原来的_2.5倍_。\n\n_+2：_战士鉴定武器的速度提升至原来的_2.5倍_，且能在_装备护甲时_将其直接鉴定。

source: provoked anger
target: 受衅怒火

source: _+1:_ When any shielding buff applied to the Warrior is broken by damage, his next physical attack will deal _3 bonus damage_.\n\n_+2:_ When any shielding buff applied to the Warrior is broken by damage, his next physical attack will deal _5 bonus damage_.
target: _+1：_当 战士所获的任何护盾效果被伤害击碎时，他的下一次物理攻击将造成_3点额外伤害_。\n\n_+2：_当战士所获的任何护盾效果被伤害击碎时，他的下一次物理攻击将造成_5点额外伤害_。

source: iron will
target: 钢铁意志

source: _+1:_ The shield provided by the Warrior's seal is _increased by 1_.\n\n_+2:_ The shield provided by the Warrior's seal is _increased by 2_.
target: _+1：_战士的纹章所提供的护盾_增加1点_。\n\n_+2：_战士的纹章所提供的护盾_增加2点_。

source: _If this talent is gained by a different hero_ it will passively grant a 1 or 2 max shield version of the Warrior's broken seal effect.
target: _如果这个天赋被其它英雄获得_，那么它会提供1或2点最大护盾版本的战士的破损纹章效果。

source: iron stomach
target: 钢铁之胃

source: _+1:_ Eating food takes the Warrior 1 turn and grants him _75% damage resistance_ while eating.\n\n_+2:_ Eating food takes the Warrior 1 turn and grants him _100% damage resistance_ while eating.
target: _+1：_战士进食只花费1回合，并在进食过程中获得_75%的伤害抗性_。\n\n_+2：_战士进食只花费1回合，并在进食过程中获得_100%的伤害抗性_。

source: liquid willpower
target: 液蕴意志

source:
_+1:_ The Warrior gains _6.5% of his max HP in shielding_ when drinking or throwing a potion, brew, or elixir.

_+2:_ The Warrior gains _10% of his max HP in shielding_ when drinking or throwing a potion, brew, or elixir.

The shield amount is doubled when using potions of strength, experience, or alchemy items that must be crafted using those potions.

For alchemy items with higher output quantities (e.g. aqua brew), this talent has a chance to trigger based on how many of that item is produced.
target:
_+1：_当战士饮用或投掷一瓶药剂、魔药或秘药时，他会获得他_最大生命值6.5%的护盾_。

_+2：_当战士饮用或投掷一瓶药剂、魔药或秘药时，他会获得他_最大生命值10%的护盾_。

如果使用的是力量药剂、经验药剂或须用前述药剂炼制的炼金物品，则获得的护盾量翻倍。

对产量较高的炼金物品(如水爆魔药)，这项天赋会基于该物品的单次产出数量概率触发。

source: runic transference
target: 刻印转移

source:
_+1:_ The Warrior's broken seal can transfer _regular glyphs_ in the same way it transfers an upgrade.

_+2:_ The Warrior's broken seal can transfer _regular, powerful, and curse glyphs_ in the same way it transfers an upgrade.

The seal can only transfer glyphs if they were applied to the armor when the seal was attached.
target:
_+1：_战士的破损纹章可以像携带一层升级一样携带_常见刻印_。

_+2：_战士的破损纹章可以像携带一层升级一样携带_常见、强力或诅咒刻印_。

破损纹章只能携带护甲贴附有纹章时刻在上面的刻印。

source: _If this talent is gained by a different hero_ it will instead help glyphs on your armor resist being removed by scrolls of upgrade. Glyphs will begin to be lost when upgrading from level 6(up from 4) at +1, or level 7(up from 4) at +2. The level where glyphs are guaranteed to be lost is unchanged at +8.
target: _如果这个天赋被其它英雄获得_，那么它会使护甲刻印必定不会被升级卷轴消除的上限等级提高。天赋+1时，护甲在+6开始有概率消除刻印(原来在+4)，天赋+2时则为+7(原来在+4)。+8时仍然必定消除。

source: lethal momentum
target: 手起刀落

source: _+1:_ When the Warrior lands a killing blow on an enemy with a physical weapon, it has a _67% chance_ to take 0 turns.\n\n_+2:_ When the Warrior lands a killing blow on an enemy with a physical weapon, it has a _100% chance_ to take 0 turns.
target: _+1：_战士使用物理武器击杀敌人的一击有_67%的概率_不消耗回合数。\n\n_+2：_战士使用物理武器击杀敌人的一击有_100%的概率_不消耗回合数。

source: improvised projectiles
target: 即兴投掷

source: _+1:_ The Warrior can blind an enemy for _2 turns_ by throwing any item that isnâ€™t a thrown weapon at them. This has a 50 turn cooldown.\n\n_+2:_ The Warrior can blind an enemy for _3 turns_ by throwing any item that isnâ€™t a thrown weapon at them. This has a 50 turn cooldown.
target: _+1：_战士向敌人扔出非投掷武器的物品时会对其造成_2回合_的致盲效果。这个天赋有50回合的冷却时间。\n\n_+2：_战士向敌人扔出非投掷武器的物品时会对其造成_3回合_的致盲效果。这个天赋有50回合的冷却时间。

source: hold fast
target: 不动如山

source:
_+1:_ When the Warrior waits he gains _1-2 armor_ and slows the decay of combo and shielding buffs by _50%_ until he moves.

_+2:_ When the Warrior waits he gains _2-4 armor_ and slows the decay of combo and shielding buffs by _75%_ until he moves.

_+3:_ When the Warrior waits he gains _3-6 armor_ and slows the decay of combo and shielding buffs by _100%_ until he moves.
target:
_+1：_当战士等待时，他可获得_1~2点护甲_并将连击和护盾的衰减速度减缓_50%_，直至他移动为止。

_+2：_当战士等待时，他可获得_2~4点护甲_并将连击和护盾的衰减速度减缓_75%_，直至他移动为止。

_+3：_当战士等待时，他可获得_3~6点护甲_并将连击和护盾的衰减速度减缓_100%_，直至他移动为止。

source: strongman
target: 力大无穷

source:
_+1:_ The Warrior's strength is _increased by 8%_, rounded down.

_+2:_ The Warrior's strength is _increased by 13%_, rounded down.

_+3:_ The Warrior's strength is _increased by 18%_, rounded down.
target:
_+1：_战士的力量提升_8%_，向下取整。

_+2：_战士的力量提升_13%_，向下取整。

_+3：_战士的力量提升_18%_，向下取整。

source: endless rage
target: 洪荒之怒

source:
_+1:_ The Berserker can reach a max of _116% rage_.

_+2:_ The Berserker can reach a max of _133% rage_.

_+3:_ The Berserker can reach a max of _150% rage_.

Each point of rage above 100% increases berserk shielding by 1% and reduces cooldown by 1%, but does not increase the damage bonus beyond +50%.
target:
_+1：_狂战士的怒气上限提升至_116%_。

_+2：_狂战士的怒气上限提升至_133%_。

_+3：_狂战士的怒气上限提升至_150%_。

怒气值超过100%时，每1%额外怒气将会提升1%护盾，并降低1%的狂暴冷却，但伤害提升效果不会超过50%。

source: deathless fury
target: 不朽骤雨

source:
_+1:_ Berserk automatically triggers if the Berserker is about to die and rage is at or above 100%, but it has a cooldown of _3 hero levels_ when this happens.

_+2:_ Berserk automatically triggers if the Berserker is about to die and rage is at or above 100%, but it has a cooldown of _2 hero levels_ when this happens.

_+3:_ Berserk automatically triggers if the Berserker is about to die and rage is at or above 100%, but it has a cooldown of _1 hero level_ when this happens.

Note that the Berserker will still die if he has 0 HP when berserking ends.
target:
_+1：_当狂战士即将死亡，且怒气值至少达到100%时，将自动狂暴化。触发后该效果需要_3个英雄等级_来冷却。

_+2：_当狂战士即将死亡，且怒气值至少达到100%时，将自动狂暴化。触发后该效果需要_2个英雄等级_来冷却。

_+3：_当狂战士即将死亡，且怒气值至少达到100%时，将自动狂暴化。触发后该效果需要_1个英雄等级_来冷却。

注意，当狂暴结束时，若狂战士的生命为0，则仍会死亡。

source: enraged catalyst
target: 怒气导魔

source:
_+1:_ Enchantments and curses on the Berserker's weapon trigger more often the more rage he has, to a maximum of _15% more often_ at 100% rage.

_+2:_ Enchantments and curses on the Berserker's weapon trigger more often the more rage he has, to a maximum of _30% more often_ at 100% rage.

_+3:_ Enchantments and curses on the Berserker's weapon trigger more often the more rage he has, to a maximum of _45% more often_ at 100% rage.
target:
_+1：_狂战士拥有越多怒气，他武器上的附魔或诅咒触发的概率越高，在100%怒气达到最大效果，触发概率_提升至1.15倍_。

_+2：_狂战士拥有越多怒气，他武器上的附魔或诅咒触发的概率越高，在100%怒气达到最大效果，触发概率_提升至1.30倍_。

_+3：_狂战士拥有越多怒气，他武器上的附魔或诅咒触发的概率越高，在100%怒气达到最大效果，触发概率_提升至1.45倍_。

source: cleave
target: 连战热忱

source:
_+1:_ The extra time the Gladiator gets on a kill is increased to _30 turns_, from 15.

_+2:_ The extra time the Gladiator gets on a kill is increased to _45 turns_, from 15.

_+3:_ The extra time the Gladiator gets on a kill is increased to _60 turns_, from 15.
target:
_+1：_当角斗士击杀一名敌人时，_30回合_内再次攻击仍继承连击数。

_+2：_当角斗士击杀一名敌人时，_45回合_内再次攻击仍继承连击数。

_+3：_当角斗士击杀一名敌人时，_60回合_内再次攻击仍继承连击数。

source: lethal defense
target: 以战养战

source:
_+1:_ When the Gladiator kills an enemy with a combo move, the cooldown on his broken seal shielding is _reduced by 50 turns_.

_+2:_ When the Gladiator kills an enemy with a combo move, the cooldown on his broken seal shielding is _reduced by 100 turns_.

_+3:_ When the Gladiator kills an enemy with a combo move, the cooldown on his broken seal shielding is _reduced by 150 turns_.

The shield cooldown can be reduced to as low as -150 turns by this talent, which means it will immediately be available again once it is activated.
target:
_+1：_当角斗士使用连击战技击杀一名敌人时，破损纹章护盾的剩余冷却时间会减少_50回合_。

_+2：_当角斗士使用连击战技击杀一名敌人时，破损纹章护盾的剩余冷却时间会减少_100回合_。

_+3：_当角斗士使用连击战技击杀一名敌人时，破损纹章护盾的剩余冷却时间会减少_150回合_。

该天赋可将护盾剩余冷却时间减至最低-150回合，意味着护盾可在生效之后再生效一次。

source: enhanced combo
target: 战技强化

source:
_+1:_ When the Gladiator's combo is 7 or higher, Clobber's knockback range increases to 3, it inflicts vertigo, and it can knock enemies into pits.

_+2:_ In addition to the benefits of +1, when the Gladiator's combo is 9 or higher Parry works on multiple attacks.

_+3:_ In addition to the benefits of +1 and +2, the Gladiator can leap up to combo/3 tiles when using Slam, Crush, or Fury.
target:
_+1：_当角斗士的连击数达到7或以上时，冲击的击退距离提升至3且附带眩晕，并可将敌人击落深渊。

_+2：_除+1的增益外，当角斗士的连击数达到9或以上时，招架反击对一回合内的多次攻击有效。

_+3：_除+1和+2的增益外，角斗士在使用撞击，横扫和暴雨时可跃过 连击数/3 格的地格来接近敌人。

source: body slam
target: 肉弹冲击

source:
_+1:_ When the Warrior lands after jumping, all adjacent enemies take damage equal to _1-4 plus 25%_ of his damage blocking power.

_+2:_ When the Warrior lands after jumping, all adjacent enemies take damage equal to _2-8 plus 50%_ of his damage blocking power.

_+3:_ When the Warrior lands after jumping, all adjacent enemies take damage equal to _3-12 plus 75%_ of his damage blocking power.

_+4:_ When the Warrior lands after jumping, all adjacent enemies take damage equal to _4-16 plus 100%_ of his damage blocking power.
target:
_+1：_战士英勇之跃落地时，对所有相邻敌人造成_1~4+25%护甲_的伤害。

_+2：_战士英勇之跃落地时，对所有相邻敌人造成_2~8+50%护甲_的伤害。

_+3：_战士英勇之跃落地时，对所有相邻敌人造成_3~12+75%护甲_的伤害。

_+4：_战士英勇之跃落地时，对所有相邻敌人造成_4~16+100%护甲_的伤害。

source: impact wave
target: 堕天一击

source:
_+1:_ When the Warrior lands after jumping, all adjacent enemies are knocked _2 tiles_ back and have a _25% chance_ of becoming vulnerable for 5 turns.

_+2:_ When the Warrior lands after jumping, all adjacent enemies are knocked _3 tiles_ back and have a _50% chance_ of becoming vulnerable for 5 turns.

_+3:_ When the Warrior lands after jumping, all adjacent enemies are knocked _4 tiles_ back and have a _75% chance_ of becoming vulnerable for 5 turns.

_+4:_ When the Warrior lands after jumping, all adjacent enemies are knocked _5 tiles_ back and have a _100% chance_ of becoming vulnerable for 5 turns.
target:
_+1：_战士英勇之跃落地时，击退所有相邻敌人_2格_，有_25%概率_使其获得5回合易伤。

_+2：_战士英勇之跃落地时，击退所有相邻敌人_3格_，有_50%概率_使其获得5回合易伤。

_+3：_战士英勇之跃落地时，击退所有相邻敌人_4格_，有_75%概率_使其获得5回合易伤。

_+4：_战士英勇之跃落地时，击退所有相邻敌人_5格_，有_100%概率_使其获得5回合易伤。

source: double jump
target: 二段跳跃

source:
_+1:_ If the Warrior performs a second leap within 3 turns, that leap has a _16% reduced_ charge cost.

_+2:_ If the Warrior performs a second leap within 3 turns, that leap has a _30% reduced_ charge cost.

_+3:_ If the Warrior performs a second leap within 3 turns, that leap has a _40% reduced_ charge cost.

_+4:_ If the Warrior performs a second leap within 3 turns, that leap has a _50% reduced_ charge cost.
target:
_+1：_战士使用英勇跳跃后，3回合内下一次使用充能消耗减少_16%_。

_+2：_战士使用英勇跳跃后，3回合内下一次使用充能消耗减少_30%_。

_+3：_战士使用英勇跳跃后，3回合内下一次使用充能消耗减少_40%_。

_+4：_战士使用英勇跳跃后，3回合内下一次使用充能消耗减少_50%_。

source: expanding wave
target: 广域冲击

source:
_+1:_ Shockwave's range is increased to _6 tiles_ from 5, and its width is increased to _75 degrees_ from 60.

_+2:_ Shockwave's range is increased to _7 tiles_ from 5, and its width is increased to _90 degrees_ from 60.

_+3:_ Shockwave's range is increased to _8 tiles_ from 5, and its width is increased to _105 degrees_ from 60.

_+4:_ Shockwave's range is increased to _9 tiles_ from 5, and its width is increased to _120 degrees_ from 60.
target:
_+1：_震地冲击的射程由5格扩大至_6格_，角度由60度展宽至_75度_。

_+2：_震地冲击的射程由5格扩大至_7格_，角度由60度展宽至_90度_。

_+3：_震地冲击的射程由5格扩大至_8格_，角度由60度展宽至_105度_。

_+2:_ When the Mage reads a scroll or uses a spell item, his _next 3 wand zaps_ get +2 levels.

The number of enhanced wand zaps is doubled when using a scroll of upgrade, transmutation, or alchemy items that must be crafted using those scrolls.

For alchemy items with higher output quantities (e.g. most spells), this talent has a chance to trigger based on how many of that item is produced.
target:
_+1：_当法师阅读卷轴或使用法术结晶后，他接下来的_2次法杖施法_提升2级。

对产量较高的炼金物品(如大多数结晶)，这项天赋会基于该物品的单次产出数量概率触发。

_+1：_狂野魔法每次释放法杖消耗的充能由0.5点下降至_0.33点_，并且狂野魔法有_25%概率_不花费时间。

_+2：_狂野魔法每次释放法杖消耗的充能由0.5点下降至_0.225点_，并且狂野魔法有_50%概率_不花费时间。

_+3：_狂野魔法每次释放法杖消耗的充能由0.5点下降至_0.15点_，并且狂野魔法有_75%概率_不花费时间。

_+4：_狂野魔法每次释放法杖消耗的充能由0.5点下降至_0.1点_，并且狂野魔法有_100%概率_不花费时间。

source: Telefrag
target: 传送挤压

source:
_+1:_ If the Mage warps into another character he deals _10-15 damage_ to it, but also takes _5 damage_.

_+2:_ If the Mage warps into another character he deals _20-30 damage_ to it, but also takes _10 damage_.

_+3:_ If the Mage warps into another character he deals _30-45 damage_ to it, but also takes _15 damage_.

_+4:_ If the Mage warps into another character he deals _40-60 damage_ to it, but also takes _20 damage_.

The hero cannot be killed by this talent, the self damage can be reduced by magic resisting effects.
target:
_+1：_当法师传送回信标与另一角色发生碰撞时，法师对其造成_10~15点_伤害，但自己会受到_5点伤害_。

_+2：_当法师传送回信标与另一角色发生碰撞时，法师对其造成_20~30点_伤害，但自己会受到_10点伤害_。

_+3：_当法师传送回信标与另一角色发生碰撞时，法师对其造成_30~45点_伤害，但自己会受到_15点伤害_。

_+4：_当法师传送回信标与另一角色发生碰撞时，法师对其造成_40~60点_伤害，但自己会受到_20点伤害_。

玩家不会死于自伤，且该伤害可由魔法抵抗效果减免。

source: Remote Beacon
target: 彼方信标

source:
_+1:_ The Mage can place a beacon at any location within _4 tiles_.

_+2:_ The Mage can place a beacon at any location within _8 tiles_.

_+3:_ The Mage can place a beacon at any location within _12 tiles_.

_+4:_ The Mage can place a beacon at any location within _16 tiles_.

The Mage cannot place beacons in locations that are inaccessible.
target:
_+1：_法师可以在_4格_内的任意一处放置一个信标。

_+2：_法师可以在_8格_内的任意一处放置一个信标。

_+3：_法师可以在_12格_内的任意一处放置一个信标。

_+4：_法师可以在_16格_内的任意一处放置一个信标。

法师无法在其不可抵达的位置放置信标。

source: Longrange Warp
target: 长途传送

source:
_+1:_ The Mage can now warp between floors, at _150% charge cost_.

_+2:_ The Mage can now warp between floors, at _117% charge cost_.

_+3:_ The Mage can now warp between floors, at _83% charge cost_.

_+4:_ The Mage can now warp between floors, at _50% charge cost_.

The Mage cannot use longrange warp to leave a locked floor.
target:
_+1：_法师能够跨层传送，但消耗_150%的充能_。

_+2：_法师能够跨层传送，但消耗_117%的充能_。

_+3：_法师能够跨层传送，且仅消耗_83%的充能_。

_+4：_法师能够跨层传送，且仅消耗_50%的充能_。

法师不能借助此能力离开封锁的楼层。

source: cached rations
target: 备用口粮

source:
_+1:_ The Rogue can find _2 supply rations_ placed in chests while he explores the next few floors of the dungeon.

_+2:_ The Rogue can find _3 supply rations_ placed in chests while he explores the next few floors of the dungeon.

Supply rations are eaten quickly, restore a moderate amount of satiety, heal 5 hp, and restore 1 charge to the cloak of shadows.
target:
_+1：_盗贼在探索后续几层地牢时，可以于箱子中找出_2包备用口粮_。

_+2：_盗贼在探索后续几层地牢时，可以于箱子中找出_3包备用口粮_。

备用口粮可快速食用，能回复中等饱食度、恢复5点生命值，并为暗影斗篷回复1点充能。

source: thief's intuition
target: 窃贼直觉

source: _+1:_ The Rogue identifies rings _2x faster_, and identifies the type of a ring _when he equips it_.\n\n_+2:_ The Rogue identifies rings _when he equips them_, and identifies the type of a ring _when he picks it up_.
target: _+1：_盗贼鉴定戒指的速度提升至原来的_2倍_，且能在_装备戒指时_鉴定其种类。\n\n_+2：_盗贼能在_装备戒指时_将其直接鉴定，且能在_拾取戒指时_鉴定其种类。

source: sucker punch
target: 阴险打击

source: _+1:_ The Rogue deals _1-2 bonus damage_ the first time he surprise attacks an enemy.\n\n_+2:_ The Rogue deals _2 bonus damage_ the first time he surprise attacks an enemy.
target: _+1：_初次伏击一名敌人时盗贼将造成_1~2点额外伤害_。\n\n_+2：_初次伏击一名敌人时盗贼将造成_2点额外伤害_。

source: protective shadows
target: 暗影庇护

source: _+1:_ The Rogue gains one shielding _every other turn_ he is invisible, _to a max of 3_.\n\n_+2:_ The Rogue gains one shielding _every turn_ he is invisible, _to a max of 5_.
target: _+1：_盗贼在隐形时，每_2回合_获得一点护盾，最多积累_3点_。\n\n_+2：_盗贼在隐形时，每_1回合_获得一点护盾，最多积累_5点_。

source: mystical meal
target: 秘术祭食

source:
_+1:_ Eating food takes the Rogue 1 turn (supply rations are eaten instantly) and grants him _3 turns of artifact recharging_.

_+2:_ Eating food takes the Rogue 1 turn (supply rations are eaten instantly) and grants him _5 turns of artifact recharging_.

This talent cannot be used to let the horn of plenty recharge itself.
target:
_+1：_盗贼进食只花费1回合(食用备用口粮不花费回合)，并获得_3回合的神器充能_。

_+2：_盗贼进食只花费1回合(食用备用口粮不花费回合)，并获得_5回合的神器充能_。

这项天赋不能使丰饶之角对其本身充能。

source: inscribed stealth
target: 卷藏匿影

source:
_+1:_ The Rogue gains _3 turns_ of invisibility after reading a scroll or using a spell item.

_+2:_ The Rogue gains _5 turns_ of invisibility after reading a scroll or using a spell item.

The invisibility duration is doubled when using a scroll of upgrade, scroll of transmutation, or alchemy items that must be crafted using those scrolls.

For alchemy items with higher output quantities (e.g. most spells), this talent has a chance to trigger based on how many of that item is produced.
target:
_+1：_盗贼阅读卷轴或使用法术结晶后会获得_3回合_的隐形。

_+2：_盗贼阅读卷轴或使用法术结晶后会获得_5回合_的隐形。

如果使用的是升级卷轴、嬗变卷轴或须用前述卷轴炼制的炼金物品，则获得的隐形效果时长翻倍。

对产量较高的炼金物品(如大多数结晶)，这项天赋会基于该物品的单次产出数量概率触发。

source: wide search
target: 广域搜索

source: _+1:_ The Rogueâ€™s search radius is increased from a 5x5 square to a _7x7 circle_.\n\n_+2:_ The Rogueâ€™s search radius is increased from a 5x5 square to a _7x7 square_.
target: _+1：_盗贼的搜索范围由方形5x5增幅至_圆形7x7_。\n\n_+2：_盗贼的搜索范围由方形5x5增幅至_方形7x7_。

source: _If this talent is gained by a different hero_ it will instead increase their search radius from a 3x3 square to a 5x5 circle at +1, or a 5x5 square at +2.
target: _如果这个天赋被其它英雄获得_，那么它会在+1时增幅搜索范围至5x5的圆形，+2时增幅至5x5的方形。

source: silent steps
target: 无声步伐

source: _+1:_ The Rogue will not wake sleeping enemies while he is _3 or more tiles away from them_.\n\n_+2:_ The Rogue will not wake sleeping enemies while he is _not adjacent to them_.
target: _+1：_盗贼不会惊醒_距其3格或更远的敌人_。\n\n_+2：_盗贼不会惊醒_未与其相邻的敌人_。

source: rogue's foresight
target: 盗贼直觉

source: _+1:_ When the Rogue is on a level with a secret room, he has a _75% chance to notice_ that the level contains a secret.\n\n_+2:_ When the Rogue is on a level with a secret room, he has a _100% chance to notice_ that the level contains a secret.
target: _+1：_当盗贼进入有隐藏房间的新楼层时，有_75%的概率察觉_该层有隐藏房间。\n\n_+2：_当盗贼进入有隐藏房间的新楼层时，有_100%的概率察觉_该层有隐藏房间。

source: light cloak
target: 轻便斗篷

source:
_+1:_ The Rogue can use his cloak of shadows when it is not equipped, but it recharges at _25% speed_ when unequipped.

_+2:_ The Rogue can use his cloak of shadows when it is not equipped, but it recharges at _50% speed_ when unequipped.

_+3:_ The Rogue can use his cloak of shadows when it is not equipped, but it recharges at _75% speed_ when unequipped.
target:
_+1：_盗贼不装备暗影斗篷也能使用其功能，但未装备时斗篷的充能速率会降至_25%_。

_+2：_盗贼不装备暗影斗篷也能使用其功能，但未装备时斗篷的充能速率会降至_50%_。

_+3：_盗贼不装备暗影斗篷也能使用其功能，但未装备时斗篷的充能速率会降至_75%_。

source: _If this talent is gained by a different hero_ it will instead increase the charging speed of all artifacts by 7/13/20% at +1/+2/+3.
target: _如果这个天赋被其它英雄获得_，那么它会在+1/+2/+3等级时提高7/13/20%的所有神器充能速度。

source: enhanced rings
target: 戒指强化

source:
_+1:_ When the Rogue uses an artifact, his rings gain +1 upgrade for _3 turns_.

_+2:_ When the Rogue uses an artifact, his rings gain +1 upgrade for _6 turns_.

_+3:_ When the Rogue uses an artifact, his rings gain +1 upgrade for _9 turns_.
target:
_+1：_使用神器后的_3回合_内，盗贼的所有戒指都会提升1级。

_+2：_使用神器后的_6回合_内，盗贼的所有戒指都会提升1级。

_+3：_使用神器后的_9回合_内，盗贼的所有戒指都会提升1级。

source: enhanced lethality
target: 直击要害

source:
_+1:_ The Assassin can assassinate enemies left at below _4/13/27/67% health_ per level of preparation, up from 3/10/20/50%.

_+2:_ The Assassin can assassinate enemies left at below _5/17/33/83% health_ per level of preparation, up from 3/10/20/50%.

_+3:_ The Assassin can assassinate enemies left at below _6/20/40/100% health_ per level of preparation, up from 3/10/20/50%.
target:
_+1：_刺客每级阶段准备可以直接斩杀敌人的生命值阈值由3/10/20/50%提升至_4/13/27/67%_。

_+2：_刺客每级阶段准备可以直接斩杀敌人的生命值阈值由3/10/20/50%提升至_5/17/33/83%_。

_+3：_刺客每级阶段准备可以直接斩杀敌人的生命值阈值由3/10/20/50%提升至_6/20/40/100%_。

source: assassin's reach
target: 超距索命

source:
_+1:_ The Assassin's blink range per level of preparation is increased to _1/3/4/6 tiles_, from 1/2/3/4.

_+2:_ The Assassin's blink range per level of preparation is increased to _2/4/6/8 tiles_, from 1/2/3/4.

_+3:_ The Assassin's blink range per level of preparation is increased to _2/5/7/10 tiles_, from 1/2/3/4.

This blink can go through hazards and enemies, but not through solid terrain like walls.
target:
_+1：_刺客每级阶段准备的闪现距离由1/2/3/4格延长至_1/3/4/6格_。

_+2：_刺客每级阶段准备的闪现距离由1/2/3/4格延长至_2/4/6/8格_。

_+3：_刺客每级阶段准备的闪现距离由1/2/3/4格延长至_2/5/7/10格_。

这种闪现可以越过危险地形或敌人，但不能穿透墙壁等坚固地形。

source: bounty hunter
target: 赏金猎手

source:
_+1:_ When the Assassin kills an enemy with a prepared strike their item drop chance is increased by _2/4/8/16%_, per level of preparation.

_+2:_ When the Assassin kills an enemy with a prepared strike their item drop chance is increased by _4/8/16/32%_, per level of preparation.

_+3:_ When the Assassin kills an enemy with a prepared strike their item drop chance is increased by _6/12/24/48%_, per level of preparation.
target:
_+1：_被刺客用技能斩杀的敌人，依据准备阶段的等级，其战利品掉落概率提升_2/4/8/16%_。

_+2：_被刺客用技能斩杀的敌人，依据准备阶段的等级，其战利品掉落概率提升_4/8/16/32%_。

_+3：_被刺客用技能斩杀的敌人，依据准备阶段的等级，其战利品掉落概率提升_6/12/24/48%_。

source: evasive armor
target: 灵猴之护

source:
_+1:_ While freerunning, the Freerunner gains an additional _+1 evasion_ per excess point of strength on his armor.

_+2:_ While freerunning, the Freerunner gains an additional _+2 evasion_ per excess point of strength on his armor.

_+3:_ While freerunning, the Freerunner gains an additional _+3 evasion_ per excess point of strength on his armor.
target:
_+1：_处于逸动状态时，每点超出护甲需求的力量使疾行者额外获得_1点闪避_。

_+2：_处于逸动状态时，每点超出护甲需求的力量使疾行者额外获得_2点闪避_。

_+3：_处于逸动状态时，每点超出护甲需求的力量使疾行者额外获得_3点闪避_。

source: projectile momentum
target: 飞速投掷

source:
_+1:_ While freerunning, the Freerunner gains _+50% accuracy and +15% damage_ with thrown weapons.

_+2:_ While freerunning, the Freerunner gains _+100% accuracy and +30% damage_ with thrown weapons.

_+3:_ While freerunning, the Freerunner gains _+150% accuracy and +45% damage_ with thrown weapons.
target:
_+1：_处于逸动状态时，疾行者的投掷武器具有额外的_50%精准与15%伤害_。

_+2：_处于逸动状态时，疾行者的投掷武器具有额外的_100%精准与30%伤害_。

_+3：_处于逸动状态时，疾行者的投掷武器具有额外的_150%精准与45%伤害_。

source: speedy stealth
target: 无人之境

source:
_+1:_ The Freerunner gains 2 stacks of momentum per turn while he is invisible.

_+2:_ In addition to the benefits of +1, freerunning no longer counts down while the Freerunner is invisible.

_+3:_ In addition to the benefits of +1 and +2, the Freerunner moves at 2x speed while invisible, regardless of whether he is freerunning or not.
target:
_+1：_疾行者在隐形时，每回合获得2层动量。

_+2：_除获得+1的增益外，当疾行者隐形时，逸动效果持续的回合数不会下降。

_+3：_除获得+1，+2的增益外，当疾行者隐形时，不论其是否处于逸动状态，他的移动速度都会翻倍。

source: hasty retreat
target: 猜我在哪

source:
_+1:_ After blinking the Rogue gains _1 turn_ of haste and invisibility.

_+2:_ After blinking the Rogue gains _2 turns_ of haste and invisibility.

_+3:_ After blinking the Rogue gains _3 turns_ of haste and invisibility.

_+4:_ After blinking the Rogue gains _4 turns_ of haste and invisibility.
target:
_+1：_盗贼在闪现后获得_1回合_的极速与隐形。

_+2：_盗贼在闪现后获得_2回合_的极速与隐形。

_+3：_盗贼在闪现后获得_3回合_的极速与隐形。

_+4：_盗贼在闪现后获得_4回合_的极速与隐形。

source: body replacement
target: 替身掩护

_+1:_ After blinking, the Rogue leaves a wooden decoy behind that has _20 health and 1-3 armor_.

_+2:_ After blinking, the Rogue leaves a wooden decoy behind that has _40 health and 2-6 armor_.

_+3:_ After blinking, the Rogue leaves a wooden decoy behind that has _60 health and 3-9 armor_.

_+4:_ After blinking, the Rogue leaves a wooden decoy behind that has _80 health and 4-12 armor_.

Only one decoy can be active at a time.
target:
_+1：_闪现时，盗贼会留下一个有_20点生命与1~3点护甲_的替身木桩。

_+2：_闪现时，盗贼会留下一个有_40点生命与2~6点护甲_的替身木桩。

同一时间只可存在一个替身木桩。

source: shadow step
target: 烟幕潜行

source:
_+1:_ If the rogue uses smoke bomb while invisible, it occurs instantly and has a _16% reduced_ charge cost, but it also doesn't blind enemies or trigger other talents.

_+2:_ If the rogue uses smoke bomb while invisible, it occurs instantly and has a _30% reduced_ charge cost, but it also doesn't blind enemies or trigger other talents.

_+3:_ If the rogue uses smoke bomb while invisible, it occurs instantly and has a _41% reduced_ charge cost, but it also doesn't blind enemies or trigger other talents.

_+4:_ If the rogue uses smoke bomb while invisible, it occurs instantly and has a _50% reduced_ charge cost, but it also doesn't blind enemies or trigger other talents.
target:
_+1：_盗贼隐形时，烟幕爆炸可以瞬间发动，并且充能花费会_降低16%_。隐形时的烟幕爆炸不会致盲敌人，也不会触发其他天赋。

_+2：_盗贼隐形时，烟幕爆炸可以瞬间发动，并且充能花费会_降低30%_。隐形时的烟幕爆炸不会致盲敌人，也不会触发其他天赋。

_+3：_盗贼隐形时，烟幕爆炸可以瞬间发动，并且充能花费会_降低41%_。隐形时的烟幕爆炸不会致盲敌人，也不会触发其他天赋。

_+4：_盗贼隐形时，烟幕爆炸可以瞬间发动，并且充能花费会_降低50%_。隐形时的烟幕爆炸不会致盲敌人，也不会触发其他天赋。

source: fear the reaper

_+2:_ When a death marked enemy reaches 0 hp, they become _feared and crippled_.

_+3:_ When a death marked enemy reaches 0 hp, they become _feared and crippled_ and enemies within 3 tiles become _crippled_.

_+4:_ When a death marked enemy reaches 0 hp, they become _feared and crippled_ and enemies within 3 tiles become _feared and crippled_.
target:
_+1：_具有夺命印记的敌人在生命值降为0时会获得_残废_效果。

_+2：_具有夺命印记的敌人在生命值降为0时会获得_残废与恐惧_效果。

source: deathly durability

_+2:_ Marking a second target at the same time as the first one has a _50% reduced_ charge cost.

_+3:_ Marking a second target at the same time as the first one has a _65% reduced_ charge cost.

_+4:_ Marking a second target at the same time as the first one has a _75% reduced_ charge cost.
