_+2：_标记一个目标后立即标记另一目标时，标记的充能消耗降低_50%_。

_+3：_标记一个目标后立即标记另一目标时，标记的充能消耗降低_65%_。

_+4：_标记一个目标后立即标记另一目标时，标记的充能消耗降低_75%_。

source: shadow blade
target: 影铸之刃

source:
_+1:_ The shadow clone gains _8%_ of the hero's damage per turn, and has a _25% chance_ to use the enchantment on the hero's weapon.

_+2:_ The shadow clone gains _16%_ of the hero's damage per turn, and has a _50% chance_ to use the enchantment on the hero's weapon.

_+3:_ The shadow clone gains _24%_ of the hero's damage per turn, and has a _75% chance_ to use the enchantment on the hero's weapon.

_+4:_ The shadow clone gains _32%_ of the hero's damage per turn, and has a _100% chance_ to use the enchantment on the hero's weapon.
target:
_+1：_暗影映像获得其主人每回合伤害的_8%_，有_25%_概率使用主人武器的附魔。

_+2：_暗影映像获得其主人每回合伤害的_16%_，有_50%_概率使用主人武器的附魔。

_+3：_暗影映像获得其主人每回合伤害的_24%_，有_75%_概率使用主人武器的附魔。

_+4：_暗影映像获得其主人每回合伤害的_32%_，有_100%_概率使用主人武器的附魔。

source: cloned armor
target: 影塑之甲

source:
_+1:_ The shadow clone gains _12%_ of the hero's armor value, and has a _25% chance_ to use the glyph on the hero's armor.

_+2:_ The shadow clone gains _24%_ of the hero's armor value, and has a _50% chance_ to use the glyph on the hero's armor.

_+3:_ The shadow clone gains _36%_ of the hero's armor value, and has a _75% chance_ to use the glyph on the hero's armor.

_+4:_ The shadow clone gains _48%_ of the hero's armor value, and has a _100% chance_ to use the glyph on the hero's armor.
target:
_+1：_暗影映像获得其主人护甲值的_12%_，有_25%_概率使用主人护甲的刻印。

_+2：_暗影映像获得其主人护甲值的_24%_，有_50%_概率使用主人护甲的刻印。

_+3：_暗影映像获得其主人护甲值的_36%_，有_75%_概率使用主人护甲的刻印。

_+4：_暗影映像获得其主人护甲值的_48%_，有_100%_概率使用主人护甲的刻印。

source: perfect copy
target: 完美克隆

source:
_+1:_ The shadow clone gains _10%_ of the hero's max HP, and can instantly swap places with the hero up to _1 tile_ away.

_+2:_ The shadow clone gains _20%_ of the hero's max HP, and can instantly swap places with the hero up to _2 tiles_ away.

_+3:_ The shadow clone gains _30%_ of the hero's max HP, and can instantly swap places with the hero up to _3 tiles_ away.

_+4:_ The shadow clone gains _40%_ of the hero's max HP, and can instantly swap places with the hero up to _4 tiles_ away.
target:
_+1：_暗影映像额外获得其主人_10%_的最大生命值。并且盗贼可以瞬间与_1格_距离以内的映像交换位置。

_+2：_暗影映像额外获得其主人_20%_的最大生命值，并且盗贼可以瞬间与_2格_距离以内的映像交换位置。

_+3：_暗影映像额外获得其主人_30%_的最大生命值，并且盗贼可以瞬间与_3格_距离以内的映像交换位置。

_+4：_暗影映像额外获得其主人_40%_的最大生命值，并且盗贼可以瞬间与_4格_距离以内的映像交换位置。

source: nature's bounty
target: 自然馈赠

source:
_+1:_ The Huntress can find _4 berries_ hidden in tall grass as she explores the next few floors of the dungeon.

_+2:_ The Huntress can find _6 berries_ hidden in tall grass as she explores the next few floors of the dungeon.

Berries are eaten quickly, restore a small amount of satiety, and might contain a usable seed.
target:
_+1：_女猎手在探索后续几层地牢时，可以于高草丛中找出隐藏的_4颗浆果_。

_+2：_女猎手在探索后续几层地牢时，可以于高草丛中找出隐藏的_6颗浆果_。

浆果可快速食用，能回复少量饱食度，还可能吃出一粒实用的种子。

source: survivalist's intuition
target: 生存直觉

source: _+1:_ The Huntress identifies thrown weapons _3x faster_.\n\n_+2:_ The Huntress identifies thrown weapons _when she hits with them_.
target: _+1：_女猎手鉴定投掷武器的速度提升至原来的_3倍_。\n\n_+2：_女猎手能在_使用投掷武器击中敌人时_将其直接鉴定。

source: followup strike
target: 追加打击

source: _+1:_ When the Huntress hits an enemy with her bow or a thrown weapon, her next melee attack against that enemy deals _2 bonus damage_.\n\n_+2:_ When the Huntress hits an enemy with her bow or a thrown weapon, her next melee attack against that enemy deals _3 bonus damage_.
target: _+1：_当女猎手用她的弓或其它投掷武器击中敌人时，她对该敌人的下一次近战攻击将造成_2点额外伤害_。\n\n_+2：_当女猎手用她的弓或其他投掷武器击中敌人时。她对该敌人的下一次近战攻击将造成_3点额外伤害_。

source: nature's aid
target: 自然助力

source: _+1:_ The Huntress gains 0-2 armor of barkskin, which fades every _3 turns_ when a plant's effect is activated in her vision.\n\n_+2:_ The Huntress gains 0-2 armor of barkskin, which fades every _5 turns_ when a plant's effect is activated in her vision.
target: _+1：_视野内的植物的效果触发时，女猎手会获得_每3回合_衰减一次的0~2点树肤。\n\n_+2：_视野内的植物的效果触发时，女猎手会获得_每5回合_衰减一次的0~2点树肤。

source: invigorating meal
target: 活力一餐

source: _+1:_ Eating food takes the Huntress 1 turn (berries are eaten instantly) and grants her _1 turn of haste_.\n\n_+2:_ Eating food takes the Huntress 1 turn (berries are eaten instantly) and grants her _2 turns of haste_.
target: _+1：_女猎手进食只花费1回合(食用浆果不花费回合)，并获得_1回合的极速_。\n\n_+2：_女猎手进食只花费1回合(食用浆果不花费回合)，并获得_2回合的极速_。

source: liquid nature
target: 液蕴自然

source:
_+1:_ When the Huntress drinks or throws a potion, brew, or elixir, _up to 4 grass tiles_ sprout in the surrounding area, and adjacent enemies are rooted for _1 turn_.

_+2:_ When the Huntress drinks or throws a potion, brew, or elixir, _up to 6 grass tiles_ sprout in the surrounding area, and adjacent enemies are rooted for _2 turns_.

The amount of grass and root duration are doubled when using potions of strength, experience, or alchemy items that must be crafted using those potions.

For alchemy items with higher output quantities (e.g. aqua brew), this talent has a chance to trigger based on how many of that item is produced.
target:
_+1：_当女猎手饮用或投掷一瓶药剂、魔药或秘药时，周围会生出_最多4格高草丛_，且周围的敌人会被缠绕_1回合_。

_+2：_当女猎手饮用或投掷一瓶药剂、魔药或秘药时，周围会生出_最多6格高草丛_，且周围的敌人会被缠绕_2回合_。

如果使用的是力量药剂、经验药剂或须用前述药剂炼制的炼金物品，则高草丛的生长量和缠绕的时长均翻倍。

对产量较高的炼金物品(如水爆魔药)，这项天赋会基于制成该物品的多少而有概率触发。

source: rejuvenating steps
target: 复春步伐

source:
_+1:_ When the Huntress steps on short grass or embers, they spring up into tall grass which the Huntress immediately furrows. This has a _10 turn cooldown_.

_+2:_ When the Huntress steps on short grass or embers, they spring up into tall grass which the Huntress immediately furrows. This has a _5 turn cooldown_.

This talent will produce furrowed grass if passive regeneration effects are disabled or the hero has not gained exp in a long time.
target:
_+1：_当女猎手踏上矮草或余烬时，它们会复生为高草，并立即被女猎手踩踏。这个天赋_有10回合的冷却时间_。

_+2：_当女猎手踏上矮草或余烬时，它们会复生为高草，并立即被女猎手踩踏。这个天赋_有5回合的冷却时间_。

若被动恢复效果被禁用或者英雄长时间内没有获得经验，此天赋只会生出枯草。

source: heightened senses
target: 敏锐感知

source: _+1:_ The Huntress gains mind vision on characters within _2 tiles of her position_.\n\n_+2:_ The Huntress gains mind vision on characters within _3 tiles of her position_.
target: _+1：_女猎手能获得对_她周围2格范围内_所有单位的灵视感知。\n\n_+2：_女猎手能获得对_她周围3格范围内_所有单位的灵视感知。

source: durable projectiles
target: 矢石保养

source: _+1:_ Thrown weapons have _+50% durability_ when used by the Huntress.\n\n_+2:_ Thrown weapons have _+75% durability_ when used by the Huntress.
target: _+1：_女猎手手中的投掷武器获得_50%额外耐久_。\n\n_+2：_女猎手手中的投掷武器获得_75%额外耐久_。

source: point blank
target: 抵近射击

source:
_+1:_ When the Huntress uses her bow or a thrown weapon at melee range it has _-25% accuracy,_ instead of -50%.

_+2:_ When the Huntress uses her bow or a thrown weapon at melee range it has _normal accuracy,_ instead of -50%.

_+3:_ When the Huntress uses her bow or a thrown weapon at melee range it has _+25% accuracy,_ instead of -50%.

Note that thrown weapons or the spirit bow always have +50% accuracy when used at a distance.
target:
_+1：_当女猎手在近战距离使用投掷武器或灵能弓时，精准修正从-50%提升至_-25%_。

_+2：_当女猎手在近战距离使用投掷武器或灵能弓时，精准修正从-50%提升至_正常精准_。

_+3：_当女猎手在近战距离使用投掷武器或灵能弓时，精准修正从-50%提升至_+25%_。

注意，非近战距离使用投掷武器或灵能弓时，总是获得+50%的精准修正。

source: seer shot
target: 探地之矢

source:
_+1:_ When the Huntress fires an arrow at the ground, it grants vision in a 3x3 area around it for _5 turns_. This has a 20 turn cooldown.

_+2:_ When the Huntress fires an arrow at the ground, it grants vision in a 3x3 area around it for _10 turns_. This has a 20 turn cooldown.

_+3:_ When the Huntress fires an arrow at the ground, it grants vision in a 3x3 area around it for _15 turns_. This has a 20 turn cooldown.
target:
_+1：_当女猎手射箭击中地面时，会提供落点周围3x3的视野，_持续5回合_。这个天赋有20回合的冷却时间。

_+2：_当女猎手射箭击中地面时，会提供落点周围3x3的视野，_持续10回合_。这个天赋有20回合的冷却时间。

_+3：_当女猎手射箭击中地面时，会提供落点周围3x3的视野，_持续15回合_。这个天赋有20回合的冷却时间。

source: _If this talent is gained by a different hero_ it will trigger from any thrown weapon.
target: _如果这个天赋被其它英雄获得_，那么它可被任何投掷武器触发。

source: farsight
target: 鹰眼远视

source:
_+1:_ The Sniper's vision range is _increased by 25%_.

_+2:_ The Sniper's vision range is _increased by 50%_.

_+3:_ The Sniper's vision range is _increased by 75%_.
target:
_+1：_狙击手的视野范围_扩大25%_。

_+2：_狙击手的视野范围_扩大50%_。

_+3：_狙击手的视野范围_扩大75%_。

source: shared enchantment
target: 联动附魔

source:
_+1:_ Thrown weapons have a _33% chance_ to use the enchantment on the Sniper's bow.

_+2:_ Thrown weapons have a _67% chance_ to use the enchantment on the Sniper's bow.

_+3:_ Thrown weapons have a _100% chance_ to use the enchantment on the Sniper's bow.

The bow's enchantment can trigger in addition to whatever enchantment the thrown weapon already has.
target:
_+1：_投掷武器_有33%概率_附带狙击手灵能弓上的附魔。

_+2：_投掷武器_有67%概率_附带狙击手灵能弓上的附魔。

_+3：_投掷武器_有100%概率_附带狙击手灵能弓上的附魔。

无论投掷武器附有哪种附魔，均能正常触发灵能弓的附魔。

source: shared upgrades
target: 联动升级

source:
_+1:_ When the Sniper attacks with an upgraded thrown weapon, each level increases the duration of sniper's mark by 1 turn and the damage of her special attack by 16%, to a max of _2 turns and +33% damage at +2_.

_+2:_ When the Sniper attacks with an upgraded thrown weapon, each level increases the duration of sniper's mark by 1 turn and the damage of her special attack by 16%, to a max of _4 turns and +67% damage at +4_.

_+3:_ When the Sniper attacks with an upgraded thrown weapon, each level increases the duration of sniper's mark by 1 turn and the damage of her special attack by 16%, to a max of _6 turns and +100% damage at +6_.
target:
当狙击手以一件已升级的投掷武器攻击时，其每级升级都会延长1回合狙击标记持续时间并增加16%特殊攻击伤害。

_+1：_狙击手的投掷武器被限制为最多提供_2级_加成，以延长_2回合_狙击标记持续时间并增加_33%_特殊攻击伤害。

_+2：_狙击手的投掷武器被限制为最多提供_4级_加成，以延长_4回合_狙击标记持续时间并增加_67%_特殊攻击伤害。

_+3：_狙击手的投掷武器被限制为最多提供_6级_加成，以延长_6回合_狙击标记持续时间并增加_100%_特殊攻击伤害。

source: durable tips
target: 持久药液

source:
_+1:_ Tipped darts have _2x durability_ when the Warden uses them.

_+2:_ Tipped darts have _3x durability_ when the Warden uses them.

_+3:_ Tipped darts have _4x durability_ when the Warden uses them.
target:
_+1：_守望者的涂药飞镖拥有_2倍耐久_。

_+2：_守望者的涂药飞镖拥有_3倍耐久_。

_+3：_守望者的涂药飞镖拥有_4倍耐久_。

source: barkskin
target: 树肤韧甲

source:
_+1:_ When stepping in grass, the Warden gains _0-50% of her level_ in barkskin armor which fades every turn.

_+2:_ When stepping in grass, the Warden gains _0-100% of her level_ in barkskin armor which fades every turn.

_+3:_ When stepping in grass, the Warden gains _0-150% of her level_ in barkskin armor which fades every turn.
target:
_+1：_在草丛中时，守望者获得等同于她的等级_0~50%_的树肤效果，该效果每回合衰减。

_+2：_在草丛中时，守望者获得等同于她的等级_0~100%_的树肤效果，该效果每回合衰减。

_+3：_在草丛中时，守望者获得等同于她的等级_0~150%_的树肤效果，该效果每回合衰减。

source: shielding dew
target: 露水护体

source:
_+1:_ Dewdrops can shield the Warden when her health is full, up to _20% of her max HP_.

_+2:_ Dewdrops can shield the Warden when her health is full, up to _40% of her max HP_.

_+3:_ Dewdrops can shield the Warden when her health is full, up to _60% of her max HP_.
target:
_+1：_当守望者生命值满时，拾取露珠可以为守望者提供护盾，上限为守望者_20%的最大生命值_。

_+2：_当守望者生命值满时，拾取露珠可以为守望者提供护盾，上限为守望者_40%的最大生命值_。

_+3：_当守望者生命值满时，拾取露珠可以为守望者提供护盾，上限为守望者_60%的最大生命值_。

source: fan of blades
target: 千叶刀扇

source:
_+1:_ Spectral blades can hit up to _1 additional target_ for 50% damage. The target must be visible and within a _30 degree_ cone AOE.

_+2:_ Spectral blades can hit up to _2 additional targets_ for 50% damage. The targets must be visible and within a _60 degree_ cone AOE.

_+3:_ Spectral blades can hit up to _3 additional targets_ for 50% damage. The targets must be visible and within a _90 degree_ cone AOE.

_+4:_ Spectral blades can hit up to _4 additional targets_ for 50% damage. The targets must be visible and within a _120 degree_ cone AOE.
target:
_+1：_灵魂飞刃最多能命中_1个额外目标_，造成50%的伤害。目标须在视野内且与原目标同处于_30度_扇形内。

_+2：_灵魂飞刃最多能命中_2个额外目标_，造成50%的伤害。目标须在视野内且与原目标同处于_60度_扇形内。

_+3：_灵魂飞刃最多能命中_3个额外目标_，造成50%的伤害。目标须在视野内且与原目标同处于_90度_扇形内。

_+4：_灵魂飞刃最多能命中_4个额外目标_，造成50%的伤害。目标须在视野内且与原目标同处于_120度_扇形内。

source: projecting blades
target: 索敌飞刃

source:
_+1:_ Spectral blades has _+25% accuracy_, and can penetrate up to _2 solid tiles_.

_+2:_ Spectral blades has _+50% accuracy_, and can penetrate up to _4 solid tiles_.

_+3:_ Spectral blades has _+75% accuracy_, and can penetrate up to _6 solid tiles_.

_+4:_ Spectral blades has _+100% accuracy_, and can penetrate up to _8 solid tiles_.
target:
_+1：_灵魂飞刃精准提升_25%_，最多能穿透_2格坚实地形_。

_+2：_灵魂飞刃精准提升_50%_，最多能穿透_4格坚实地形_。

_+3：_灵魂飞刃精准提升_75%_，最多能穿透_6格坚实地形_。

_+4：_灵魂飞刃精准提升_100%_，最多能穿透_8格坚实地形_。

source: spirit blades
target: 灵能飞刃

source:
_+1:_ Spectral blades has a _30% chance_ to also use the enchantment on the spirit bow.

_+2:_ Spectral blades has a _60% chance_ to also use the enchantment on the spirit bow.

_+3:_ Spectral blades has a _90% chance_ to also use the enchantment on the spirit bow.

_+4:_ Spectral blades has a _100% chance_ to also use the enchantment on the spirit bow, and it gives each enchantment _+10% power_.
target:
_+1：_灵魂飞刃有_30%_的概率额外使用灵能弓的附魔。

_+2：_灵魂飞刃有_60%_的概率额外使用灵能弓的附魔。

_+3：_灵魂飞刃有_90%_的概率额外使用灵能弓的附魔。

_+4：_灵魂飞刃有_100%_的概率额外使用灵能弓的附魔，且每种附魔都获得_10%的附魔强化_。

source: growing power
target: 茁壮之力

source:
_+1:_ The attack and movespeed boosts from nature's power are increased to _38% and 125%_, from 33% and 100%.

_+2:_ The attack and movespeed boosts from nature's power are increased to _42% and 150%_, from 33% and 100%.

_+3:_ The attack and movespeed boosts from nature's power are increased to _46% and 175%_, from 33% and 100%.

_+4:_ The attack and movespeed boosts from nature's power are increased to _50% and 200%_, from 33% and 100%.
target:
_+1：_自然之力对射击速度与移动速度的加成由33%与100%提升至_38%_与_125%_。

_+2：_自然之力对射击速度与移动速度的加成由33%与100%提升至_42%_与_150%_。

_+3：_自然之力对射击速度与移动速度的加成由33%与100%提升至_46%_与_175%_。

_+4：_自然之力对射击速度与移动速度的加成由33%与100%提升至_50%_与_200%_。

source: nature's wrath
target: 自然之怒

source:
_+1:_ While nature's power is active, shots from the spirit bow have an _8% chance_ to trigger a random harmful plant effect.

_+2:_ While nature's power is active, shots from the spirit bow have a _17% chance_ to trigger a random harmful plant effect.

_+3:_ While nature's power is active, shots from the spirit bow have an _25% chance_ to trigger a random harmful plant effect.

_+4:_ While nature's power is active, shots from the spirit bow have a _33% chance_ to trigger a random harmful plant effect.

The plants that can be triggered are: blindweed, firebloom, icecap, sorrowmoss, and stormvine.
target:
_+1：_在自然之力的加持下，灵能弓的射击有_8%的概率_触发一个随机的有害植物效果。

_+2：_在自然之力的加持下，灵能弓的射击有_17%的概率_触发一个随机的有害植物效果。

_+3：_在自然之力的加持下，灵能弓的射击有_25%的概率_触发一个随机的有害植物效果。

_+4：_在自然之力的加持下，灵能弓的射击有_33%的概率_触发一个随机的有害植物效果。

可能触发的植物有：致盲草、烈焰花、冰冠花、断肠苔、风暴藤。

source: wild momentum
target: 自然飞矢

source:
_+1:_ Killing an enemy with the spirit bow prolongs the duration of nature's power by _1 turn_. The duration can be extended by a max of _2 turns_.

_+2:_ Killing an enemy with the spirit bow prolongs the duration of nature's power by _2 turns_. The duration can be extended by a max of _4 turns_.

_+3:_ Killing an enemy with the spirit bow prolongs the duration of nature's power by _3 turns_. The duration can be extended by a max of _6 turns_.

_+4:_ Killing an enemy with the spirit bow prolongs the duration of nature's power by _4 turns_. The duration can be extended by a max of _8 turns_.
target:
_+1：_使用灵能弓射杀一名敌人时，延长_1回合_自然之力，最多延长_2回合_。

_+2：_使用灵能弓射杀一名敌人时，延长_2回合_自然之力，最多延长_4回合_。

_+3：_使用灵能弓射杀一名敌人时，延长_3回合_自然之力，最多延长_6回合_。

_+4：_使用灵能弓射杀一名敌人时，延长_4回合_自然之力，最多延长_8回合_。

source: eagle eye
target: 鹰之瞭望

source:
_+1:_ The spirit hawk's vision range is increased to _7 tiles_ from 6.

_+2:_ The spirit hawk's vision range is increased to _8 tiles_ from 6.

_+3:_ The spirit hawk's vision range is increased to _9 tiles_ from 6, and it gets _2 tiles_ of mind vision.

_+4:_ The spirit hawk's vision range is increased to _10 tiles_ from 6, and it gets _3 tiles_ of mind vision.
target:
_+1：_飞鹰的视野范围由6格提升至_7格_。

_+2：_飞鹰的视野范围由6格提升至_8格_。

_+3：_飞鹰的视野范围由6格提升至_9格_，并获得_2格_的灵视感知。

_+4：_飞鹰的视野范围由6格提升至_10格_，并获得_3格_的灵视感知。

source: go for the eyes
target: 夺目利爪

source:
_+1:_ Attacks from the spirit hawk blind enemies for _2 turns_.

_+2:_ Attacks from the spirit hawk blind enemies for _5 turns_.

_+3:_ Attacks from the spirit hawk blind enemies for _5 turns_ and cripple them for _2 turns_.

_+4:_ Attacks from the spirit hawk blind enemies for _5 turns_ and cripple them for _5 turns_.
target:
_+1：_飞鹰在攻击时会扑抓敌人的眼睛并令其致盲_2回合_。

_+2：_飞鹰在攻击时会扑抓敌人的眼睛并令其致盲_5回合_。

_+3：_飞鹰在攻击时会扑抓敌人的眼睛并令其致盲_5回合_，并附加_2回合_的残废。

_+4：_飞鹰在攻击时会扑抓敌人的眼睛并令其致盲_5回合_，并附加_5回合_的残废。

source: swift spirit
target: 疾风之魄

source:
_+1:_ The spirit hawk's movement speed is increased to _2.5 tiles_ from 2, and it is guaranteed to dodge the first _2 attacks_ made against it.

_+2:_ The spirit hawk's movement speed is increased to _3 tiles_ from 2, and it is guaranteed to dodge the first _4 attacks_ made against it.

_+3:_ The spirit hawk's movement speed is increased to _3.5 tiles_ from 2, and it is guaranteed to dodge the first _6 attacks_ made against it.

_+4:_The spirit hawk's movement speed is increased to _4 tiles_ from 2, and it is guaranteed to dodge the first _8 attacks_ made against it.
target:
_+1：_飞鹰的移动速度由每回合2格提升至_2.5格_，必定闪避其遭到的前_2次攻击_。

_+2：_飞鹰的移动速度由每回合2格提升至_3格_，必定闪避其遭到的前_4次攻击_。

_+3：_飞鹰的移动速度由每回合2格提升至_3.5格_，必定闪避其遭到的前_6次攻击_。

_+4：_飞鹰的移动速度由每回合2格提升至_4格_，必定闪避其遭到的前_8次攻击_。

source: strengthening meal
target: 强健一餐

source: _+1:_ Eating food grants the Duelist 3 bonus damage the next _2 times_ she hits an enemy with a physical attack.\n\n_+2:_ Eating food grants the Duelist 3 bonus damage the next _3 times_ she hits an enemy with a physical attack.
target: _+1：_进食会使决斗家接下来对敌人造成的_2次物理攻击_增加3点额外伤害。\n\n_+2：_进食会使决斗家接下来对敌人造成的_3次物理攻击_增加3点额外伤害。

source: adventurer's intuition
target: 探险直觉

source: _+1:_ The Duelist identifies weapons _2.5x faster_ and armor _1.75x faster_.\n\n_+2:_ The Duelist identifies weapons _when she equips them_ and armor _2.5x faster_.
target: _+1：_决斗家鉴定武器的速度提升至原来的_2.5倍_，鉴定护甲的速度提升至原来的_1.75倍_。\n_+2：_决斗家能在_装备武器时_将其直接鉴定，且鉴定护甲的速度提升至原来的_2.5倍_。

source: patient strike
target: 沉稳一击

source: _+1:_ If the Duelist waits before performing a melee attack, she will deal _1-2 bonus damage_.\n\n_+2:_ If the Duelist waits before performing a melee attack, she will deal _2 bonus damage_.
target: _+1：_如果决斗家在进行一次近战攻击前进行等待，该次攻击将会造成_1~2点额外伤害_。\n_+2：_如果决斗家在进行一次近战攻击前进行等待，该次攻击将会造成_2点额外伤害_。

source: aggressive barrier
target: 烈气护盾

source: _+1:_ The Duelist gains _3 shielding_ when she uses a weapon ability and is at or below 50% health.\n\n_+2:_ The Duelist gains _5 shielding_ when she uses a weapon ability and is at or below 50% health.
target: _+1：_决斗家在生命值不高于50%最大生命值时，使用武技会获得_3点护盾_。\n\n_+2：_决斗家在生命值不高于50%最大生命值时，使用武技会获得_5点护盾_。

source: _If this talent is gained by a different hero_ it will instead grant shielding when making a melee attack at low health, with a 50 turn cooldown.
target: _如果这个天赋被其它英雄获得_，那么此天赋变为在低生命值时使用近战攻击获得此护盾。此时这个天赋有50回合的冷却时间。

source: focused meal
target: 专注一餐

source: _+1:_ Eating food takes the Duelist 1 turn and grants her _0.67 charges_ on her weapons.\n\n_+2:_ Eating food takes the Duelist 1 turn and grants her _1 charge_ on her weapons.
target: _+1：_决斗家进食只花费1回合，并获得_0.67点武技充能_。\n\n_+2：_决斗家进食只花费1回合，并获得_1点武技充能_。

source: _If this talent is gained by a different hero_ it will instead grant bonus damage to their next hit equal to their level/3 at +1, or level/2 at +2.
target: _如果这个天赋被其它英雄获得_，那么它会在+1等级时使英雄的下一次物理攻击额外造成英雄等级/3点伤害，+2等级时额外造成英雄等级/2点伤害。

source: liquid agility
target: 液蕴机敏

source:
_+1:_ When drinking or throwing a potion, brew, or elixir, the Duelist has _3x evasion_, and has _3x accuracy_ on her next melee attack within 5 turns.

_+2:_ When drinking or throwing a potion, brew, or elixir, the Duelist has _infinite evasion_, and has _infinite accuracy_ on her next melee attack within 5 turns.

This bonus lasts for one additional turn and attack when using potions of strength, experience, or alchemy items that must be crafted using those potions.

For alchemy items with higher output quantities (e.g. aqua brew), this talent has a chance to trigger based on how many of that item is produced.
target:
_+1：_决斗家在饮用或投掷一瓶药剂、魔药或秘药的期间拥有_4倍闪避_，并且她在5回合内的下一次近战攻击拥有_3倍精准_。

_+2：_决斗家在饮用或投掷一瓶药剂、魔药或秘药的期间拥有_无限闪避_，并且她在5回合内的下一次近战攻击拥有_无限精准_。

如果使用的是力量药剂、经验药剂或须用前述药剂炼制的炼金物品，则闪避加成会额外持续一回合，精准加成会额外持续一次攻击。

对产量较高的炼金物品(如水爆魔药)，这项天赋会基于该物品的单次产出数量概率触发。

source: weapon recharging
target: 武器充能

source: _+1:_ The Duelist gains one weapon charge every _15 turns_ when under the effect of wand or artifact recharging buffs.\n\n_+2:_ The Duelist gains one weapon charge every _10 turns_ when under the effect of wand or artifact recharging buffs.
target: _+1：_决斗家在处于法杖或神器充能状态时，每_15回合_恢复1点武技充能。\n\n_+2：_决斗家在处于法杖或神器充能状态时，每_10回合_恢复1点武技充能。

source: _If this talent is gained by a different hero_ it will instead cause them to deal +5% melee damage while recharging at +1, or +7.5% melee damage while recharging at +2.
target: _如果这个天赋被其它英雄获得_，那么处于任一充能状态的情况下，+1时造成额外5%近战伤害，+2时造成额外7.5%近战伤害。

source: lethal haste
target: 夺命余势

source: _+1:_ When the Duelist lands a killing blow on an enemy with a weapon ability, she gains _3 turns_ worth of instant movement.\n\n_+2:_ When the Duelist lands a killing blow on an enemy with a weapon ability, she gains _5 turns_ worth of instant movement.
target: _+1：_决斗家用武技击杀一名敌人后，获得_3回合_瞬间移动效果。\n\n_+2：_决斗家用武技击杀一名敌人后，获得_5回合_瞬间移动效果。

source: _If this talent is gained by a different hero_ it will instead trigger with regular weapon attacks, with a 100 turn cooldown.
target: _如果这个天赋被其它英雄获得_，那么此天赋可以由常规的武器攻击触发，但会有100回合的冷却时间。

source: swift equip
target: 迅疾配装

source:
_+1:_ The Duelist can switch her equipped weapon instantly _one time_ every 20 turns.

_+2:_ The Duelist can switch her equipped weapon instantly _two times_ every 20 turns.

If the Duelist has this talent and it is not on cooldown, quick-using an unequipped weapon will equip it.
target:
_+1：_决斗家每20回合可以瞬时更换_一次_装备的武器。

_+2：_决斗家每20回合可以瞬时更换_两次_装备的武器。

当决斗家获得此天赋，且其不处于冷却时间时，点击快捷栏中的未装备武器时会瞬时装备。

source: precise assault
target: 精准打击

source:
_+1:_ When the Duelist uses a weapon ability, she gains _2x accuracy_ on her next melee attack within 5 turns.

_+2:_ When the Duelist uses a weapon ability, she gains _5x accuracy_ on her next melee attack within 5 turns.

_+3:_ When the Duelist uses a weapon ability, she gains _infinite accuracy_ on her next melee attack within 5 turns.
target:
_+1：_当决斗家使用了一个武技，她在5回合内的下一次近战攻击将具有_2倍精准_。

_+2：_当决斗家使用了一个武技，她在5回合内的下一次近战攻击将具有_5倍精准_。

_+3：_当决斗家使用了一个武技，她在5回合内的下一次近战攻击将具有_无限精准_。

source: _If this talent is gained by a different hero_ it will instead increase melee accuracy by 10% at +1, 20% at +2, or 30% at +3.
target: _如果这个天赋被其它英雄获得_，那么它会在+1/+2/+3等级时提升10/20/30%的近战精准。

source: deadly followup
target: 夺命追击

source:
_+1:_ When the Duelist hits an enemy with a thrown weapon, she will deal _10% more melee damage_ to them for 5 turns.

_+2:_ When the Duelist hits an enemy with a thrown weapon, she will deal _20% more melee damage_ to them for 5 turns.

_+3:_ When the Duelist hits an enemy with a thrown weapon, she will deal _30% more melee damage_ to them for 5 turns.
target:
_+1：_当决斗家使用投掷武器命中敌人，她在随后5回合对其造成的近战伤害增加_10%_。

_+2：_当决斗家使用投掷武器命中敌人，她在随后5回合对其造成的近战伤害增加_20%_。

_+3：_当决斗家使用投掷武器命中敌人，她在随后5回合对其造成的近战伤害增加_30%_。

source: varied charge
target: 异技充能

source:
_+1:_ The Champion instantly regains _0.17 weapon charges_ when she uses two different weapon abilities, with no time limit.

_+2:_ The Champion instantly regains _0.33 weapon charges_ when she uses two different weapon abilities, with no time limit.

_+3:_ The Champion instantly regains _0.5 weapon charges_ when she uses two different weapon abilities, with no time limit.
target:
_+1：_当勇士分别使用了两种不同的武技时，她将立即获得_0.17点武技充能_。使用两种武技间隔的回合数没有限制。

_+2：_当勇士分别使用了两种不同的武技时，她将立即获得_0.33点武技充能_。使用两种武技间隔的回合数没有限制。

_+3：_当勇士分别使用了两种不同的武技时，她将立即获得_0.5点武技充能_。使用两种武技间隔的回合数没有限制。

source: twin upgrades
target: 伴生强化

source:
_+1:_ If one of the Champion's two equipped weapons has a lower level and is _2 or more tiers lower_ than the other weapon, it will be boosted to the other weapon's level.

_+2:_ If one of the Champion's two equipped weapons has a lower level and is _1 or more tiers lower_ than the other weapon, it will be boosted to the other weapon's level.

_+3:_ If one of the Champion's two equipped weapons has a lower level and is _the same tier or lower_ than the other weapon, it will be boosted to the other weapon's level.
target:
_+1：_如果勇士所双持的武器，其中一把等级较低且阶数比另一把_低出至少2阶_，则将其等级加强至与另一把相同。

_+2：_如果勇士所双持的武器，其中一把等级较低且阶数比另一把_低出至少1阶_，则将其等级加强至与另一把相同。

_+3：_如果勇士所双持的武器，其中一把等级较低且阶数_不高于_另一把，则将其等级加强至与另一把相同。

source: combined lethality
target: 复合损伤

source:
_+1:_ If the Champion attacks with a melee weapon immediately after using a different weapon's ability, that attack will execute any non-boss enemy left at _below 13% HP_.

_+2:_ If the Champion attacks with a melee weapon immediately after using a different weapon's ability, that attack will execute any non-boss enemy left at _below 27% HP_.

_+3:_ If the Champion attacks with a melee weapon immediately after using a different weapon's ability, that attack will execute any non-boss enemy left at _below 40% HP_.

This attack can be a regular melee weapon attack, or part of a weapon ability.
target:
_+1：_如果勇士在使用一把武器的武技后立刻使用不同的近战武器进行攻击，则此次攻击将处决_生命值低于13%_的非Boss敌人。

_+2：_如果勇士在使用一把武器的武技后立刻用不同的近战武器进行攻击，则此次攻击将处决_生命值低于27%_的非Boss敌人

_+3：_如果勇士在使用一把武器的武技后立刻用不同的近战武器进行攻击，则此次攻击将处决_生命值低于40%_的非Boss敌人。

此次攻击可以是一次普通的近战武器攻击，也可以是武技中的一部分。

source: unencumbered spirit
target: 无羁之魂

source:
_+1:_ The Monk gains _50% more energy_ for each piece of _tier 3 or lower_ equipment she is using.

_+2:_ The Monk gains _75% more energy_ for each piece of _tier 2 or lower_ equipment she is using. The tier 3 benefit is unchanged.

_+3:_ The Monk gains _100% more energy_ for each piece of _tier 1 or lower_ equipment she is using. The tier 2 and 3 benefits are unchanged. She also gains a free cloth armor and studded gloves.

Note that this talent gives no benefit from being unarmed or attacking with a Ring of Force.
target:
_+1：_每使用一件_3阶及以下_的装备，武僧获取的内力就会_+50%_。

_+2：_每使用一件_2阶及以下_的装备，武僧获取的内力就会_+75%_。3阶装备收益不变。

_+3：_每使用一件_1阶_的装备，武僧获取的内力就会_+100%_。2，3阶装备收益不变。她还会免费获得一件布甲与一副镶钉手套。

注意，使用赤手空拳或武力之戒攻击时该天赋无收益。

source: monastic vigor
target: 道心盎然

source:
_+1:_ If the Monk has _100% energy_, her abilities are empowered.

_+2:_ If the Monk has _80% or more energy_, her abilities are empowered.

_+3:_ If the Monk has _60% or more energy_, her abilities are empowered.

When empowered:
- Flurry applies your weapon's enchantment
- Focus is instantaneous
- Dash gains +4 range
- Dragon Kick deals +50% damage and applies its knock back and stun effect to all adjacent enemies
- Meditate slowly heals 20% of missing HP and grants 80% damage resistance.
target:
_+1：_如果武僧拥有_100%的内力_，则各门武功会得到突破。

_+2：_如果武僧拥有_80%的内力_，则各门武功会得到突破。

_+3：_如果武僧拥有_60%的内力_，则各门武功会得到突破。

当处于突破状态：
-空振使用你的武器附魔。
-凝神不消耗回合。
-登云的冲刺距离+4。
-盘龙造成的伤害+50%，可击退并击晕所有邻近的敌人。
-冥思可缓慢回复20%的已损生命值并提供80%的伤害抗性。

source: combined energy
target: 阴阳调和

source:
_+1:_ If the Monk uses a weapon ability and a _4+ energy_ ability within 5 turns of each other, she regains 1 spent energy.

_+2:_ If the Monk uses a weapon ability and a _3+ energy_ ability within 5 turns of each other, she regains 1 spent energy.

_+3:_ If the Monk uses a weapon ability and a _2+ energy_ ability within 5 turns of each other, she regains 1 spent energy.
target:
_+1：_如果武僧在5回合内使用了一次武技与一门_4+内力消耗_的武功，她就会回复1点内力。

_+2：_如果武僧在5回合内使用了一次武技与一门_3+内力消耗_的武功，她就会回复1点内力。

_+3：_如果武僧在5回合内使用了一次武技与一门_2+内力消耗_的武功，她就会回复1点内力。

source: close the gap
target: 跨越彼端

source:
_+1:_ The Duelist blinks _up to two tiles_ toward her target when starting a duel.

_+2:_ The Duelist blinks _up to three tiles_ toward her target when starting a duel.

_+3:_ The Duelist blinks _up to four tiles_ toward her target when starting a duel.

_+4:_ The Duelist blinks _up to five tiles_ toward her target when starting a duel.

This blink can go through hazards and enemies, but not solid terrain like walls. The blink is taken into account when determining if an enemy is in range to be challenged.
target:
_+1：_发起决斗时，决斗家会向她的目标闪现_至多2格_距离。

_+2：_发起决斗时，决斗家会向她的目标闪现_至多3格_距离。

_+3：_发起决斗时，决斗家会向她的目标闪现_至多4格_距离。

_+4：_发起决斗时，决斗家会向她的目标闪现_至多5格_距离。

这种闪现可以越过危险地形或敌人，但不能穿透墙壁等坚固地形。闪现距离也会纳入决斗发起距离的判定。

source: invigorating victory
target: 凯旋复苏

source:
_+1:_ If the Duelist defeats her target before the duel ends, she heals for _5 HP plus 30% of the damage_ she took during the duel.

_+2:_ If the Duelist defeats her target before the duel ends, she heals for _10 HP plus 50% of the damage_ she took during the duel.

_+3:_ If the Duelist defeats her target before the duel ends, she heals for _15 HP plus 65% of the damage_ she took during the duel.

_+4:_ If the Duelist defeats her target before the duel ends, she heals for _20 HP plus 75% of the damage_ she took during the duel.
target:
_+1：_如果决斗家在决斗结束前击败了目标，则恢复_5+30%决斗中承伤_的生命值。

_+2：_如果决斗家在决斗结束前击败了目标，则恢复_10+50%决斗中承伤_的生命值。

_+3：_如果决斗家在决斗结束前击败了目标，则恢复_15+65%决斗中承伤_的生命值。

_+4：_如果决斗家在决斗结束前击败了目标，则恢复_20+75%决斗中承伤_的生命值。

source: elimination match
target: 连续淘汰

source:
_+1:_ If the Duelist challenges again within 3 turns of a duel ending, that challenge has a _16% reduced_ charge cost.

_+2:_ If the Duelist challenges again within 3 turns of a duel ending, that challenge has a _30% reduced_ charge cost.

_+3:_ If the Duelist challenges again within 3 turns of a duel ending, that challenge has a _40% reduced_ charge cost.

_+4:_ If the Duelist challenges again within 3 turns of a duel ending, that challenge has a _50% reduced_ charge cost.
target:
_+1：_如果决斗家在决斗结束之后的3回合内再次发起决斗，那么该次决斗消耗的充能_减少16%_。

_+2：_如果决斗家在决斗结束之后的3回合内再次发起决斗，那么该次决斗消耗的充能_减少30%_。

_+3：_如果决斗家在决斗结束之后的3回合内再次发起决斗，那么该次决斗消耗的充能_减少40%_。

_+4：_如果决斗家在决斗结束之后的3回合内再次发起决斗，那么该次决斗消耗的充能_减少50%_。

source: elemental reach
target: 元素延展

source:
_+1:_ Elemental strike's range is increased to _5 tiles_ from 4, and its width is increased to _75 degrees_ from 65.

source: Recall Inscription

source:
_+1:_ The Cleric can cast _Recall Inscription,_ a spell that lets them repeat the effect of the last runestone or scroll they used within _10 turns._

_+2:_ The Cleric can cast _Recall Inscription,_ a spell that lets them repeat the effect of the last runestone or scroll they used within _300 turns._

Recall Inscription cannot be used with scrolls of upgrade. This spell's charge cost varies based on which item was used recently: 2 for a runestone, 3 for a scroll, 4 for an exotic scroll. This charge cost is also doubled when used with a scroll of transmutation, or alchemy items that must be crafted using transmutation or upgrade.

_+1：_牧师可以施放法术_符文复制_，以再次触发_10回合_内最近一次使用的符石或卷轴效果。

符文复制不能复制升级卷轴，充能消耗根据最近一次使用的物品变化而变化：符石2点充能、卷轴3点充能、秘卷4点充能。复制嬗变卷轴或嬗变/升级卷轴的符石/秘卷时，充能消耗还会翻倍。

source: Sunray

_+2:_ The Cleric can cast _Sunray,_ a spell that deals _6-12 damage_ and blinds the target for _6 turns,_ at the cost of 1 charge.

Sunray can only blind each target once, but if the target is already blinded by Sunray then it paralyses instead. Sunray always deals maximum damage to demonic and undead foes.

该法术的溢出治疗将被转化为护盾。

_+2:_ The Cleric can cast _Cleanse,_ a spell which _grants 3 turns of negative status immunity_ to the Cleric and any nearby allies, and grants them _20 shielding,_ at the cost of 2 charges.

_+2：_牧师可以施放法术_神圣净化_，消耗2点充能以清除自身和附近任何盟友的所有减益效果并使全体获得_20点护盾_与_3回合减益免疫_。

_+3：_牧师可以施放法术_神圣净化_，消耗2点充能以清除自身和附近任何盟友的所有减益效果并使全体获得_30点护盾_与_5回合减益免疫_。

source: Holy Lance
target: 神圣标枪

source:
_+1:_ The Priest can cast _Holy Lance,_ a devastating spell that deals _30-55 damage_ at the cost of 4 charges.

_+2:_ The Priest can cast _Holy Lance,_ a devastating spell that deals _45-83 damage_ at the cost of 4 charges.

_+3:_ The Priest can cast _Holy Lance,_ a devastating spell that deals _60-110 damage_ at the cost of 4 charges.

Holy Lance always deals maximum damage to demonic and undead foes. Holy Lance has a 30 turn cooldown before it can be cast again.
target:
_+1：_祭司可以施放法术_神圣标枪_，消耗4点充能以造成致命的_30~55点伤害_。

_+2：_祭司可以施放法术_神圣标枪_，消耗4点充能以造成致命的_45~83点伤害_。

_+3：_祭司可以施放法术_神圣标枪_，消耗4点充能以造成致命的_60~110点伤害_。

圣枪必定对恶魔和亡灵敌人造成最大伤害。圣枪有30回合的冷却，之后才能再次施放。

source: Hallowed Ground
target: 神圣领域

source:
_+1:_ The Priest can cast _Hallowed Ground,_ a spell that hallows terrain in a _3x3 area_ for 20 turns, at the cost of 2 charges.

_+2:_ The Priest can cast _Hallowed Ground,_ a spell that hallows terrain in a _5x5 area_ for 20 turns, at the cost of 2 charges.

_+3:_ The Priest can cast _Hallowed Ground,_ a spell that hallows terrain in a _7x7 area_ for 20 turns, at the cost of 2 charges.

When it is cast, Hallowed Ground heals allies for 15 HP, briefly roots enemies, and spreads short grass. Afterward, it slowly heals allies, cripples enemies, and causes tall grass to randomly grow. Hallowed ground grants shielding to the Priest instead of healing and is destroyed by fire.
target:
_+1：_祭司可以施放法术_神圣领域_，消耗2点充能以创造_3x3范围_，持续20回合的神圣领域。

_+2：_祭司可以施放法术_神圣领域_，消耗2点充能以创造_5x5范围_，持续20回合的神圣领域。

_+3：_祭司可以施放法术_神圣领域_，消耗2点充能以创造_7x7范围_，持续20回合的神圣领域。

施放时，法术会立即治疗盟友15点生命值，短暂缠绕敌人并扩散矮草。之后，神圣领域会缓慢治疗盟友、残疾敌人并随机催生高草。神圣领域会为祭司提供护盾而非治疗，并且神圣领域会被火焰摧毁。

source: Mnemonic Prayer
target: 祈愿诗篇

source:
_+1:_ The Priest can cast _Mnemonic Prayer,_ a spell that extends buffs/debuffs on an ally/enemy for _3 turns_ at 1 charge cost.

_+2:_ The Priest can cast _Mnemonic Prayer,_ a spell that extends buffs/debuffs on an ally/enemy for _4 turns_ at 1 charge cost.

_+3:_ The Priest can cast _Mnemonic Prayer,_ a spell that extends buffs/debuffs on an ally/enemy for _5 turns_ at 1 charge cost.

Mnemonic prayer takes no time to cast. Mnemonic Prayer can only extend a particular instance of a buff/debuff once, and cannot extend buffs from armor abilities.
target:
_+1：_祭司可以施放法术_祈愿诗篇_，消耗1点充能以延长_3回合_盟友/敌人的增益/减益效果。

_+2：_祭司可以施放法术_祈愿诗篇_，消耗1点充能以延长_4回合_盟友/敌人的增益/减益效果。

_+3：_祭司可以施放法术_祈愿诗篇_，消耗1点充能以延长_5回合_盟友/敌人的增益/减益效果。

祈愿诗篇施法不耗时。祈愿诗篇只能延长一次特定目标的增益或减益效果，并且不能延长来自护甲技能的增益效果。

source: lay on hands
target: 圣疗之触

source:
_+1:_ The Paladin can cast _Lay on Hands,_ a spell that instantly heals a nearby character for _15 HP,_ or grants the Paladin _15 shielding,_ at the cost of 1 charge.

_+2:_ The Paladin can cast _Lay on Hands,_ a spell that instantly heals a nearby character for _20 HP,_ or grants the Paladin _20 shielding,_ at the cost of 1 charge.

_+3:_ The Paladin can cast _Lay on Hands,_ a spell that instantly heals a nearby character for _25 HP,_ or grants the Paladin _25 shielding,_ at the cost of 1 charge.

Excess healing from this spell is converted into shielding. Lay on Hands can be cast repeatedly, but cannot apply more than three casts worth of shielding at once.
target:
_+1：_圣骑士可以施放法术_圣疗之触_，消耗1点充能以立即治疗附近一个单位_15点生命值_，或使圣骑士获得_15点护盾_。

_+2：_圣骑士可以施放法术_圣疗之触_，消耗1点充能以立即治疗附近一个单位_20点生命值_，或使圣骑士获得_20点护盾_。

_+3：_圣骑士可以施放法术_圣疗之触_，消耗1点充能以立即治疗附近一个单位_25点生命值_，或使圣骑士获得_25点护盾_。

该法术的溢出治疗将被转化为护盾。圣疗可被重复施放，但无法立即施加超过三次施法数值的护盾。

source: aura of protection
target: 守御灵光

source:
_+1:_ The Paladin can cast _Aura of Protection,_ a spell that grants the Paladin and all allies within 2 tiles _20% damage resistance_ and the effect of the Paladin's armor glyph at _+50% power_ for 20 turns, at the cost of 2 charges.

_+2:_ The Paladin can cast _Aura of Protection,_ a spell that grants the Paladin and all allies within 2 tiles _30% damage resistance_ and the effect of the Paladin's armor glyph at _+75% power_ for 20 turns, at the cost of 2 charges.

_+3:_ The Paladin can cast _Aura of Protection,_ a spell that grants the Paladin and all allies within 2 tiles _40% damage resistance_ and the effect of the Paladin's armor glyph at _+100% power_ for 20 turns, at the cost of 2 charges.
target:
_+1：_圣骑士可以施放法术_守御灵光_，消耗2点充能以使圣骑士与2格范围内的所有盟友获得_20%伤害减免_与圣骑士护甲_50%刻印强化_。

_+2：_圣骑士可以施放法术_守御灵光_，消耗2点充能以使圣骑士与2格范围内的所有盟友获得_30%伤害减免_与圣骑士护甲_75%刻印强化_。

_+3：_圣骑士可以施放法术_守御灵光_，消耗2点充能以使圣骑士与2格范围内的所有盟友获得_40%伤害减免_与圣骑士护甲_100%刻印强化_。

source: wall of light
target: 神圣屏障

source:
_+1:_ The Paladin can cast _Wall of Light,_ a spell that creates a _3 tile wide_ solid wall in front of the Paladin that pushes away enemies and lasts for 20 turns, at the cost of 3 charges.

_+2:_ The Paladin can cast _Wall of Light,_ a spell that creates a _5 tile wide_ solid wall in front of the Paladin that pushes away enemies and lasts for 20 turns, at the cost of 3 charges.

_+3:_ The Paladin can cast _Wall of Light,_ a spell that creates a _7 tile wide_ solid wall in front of the Paladin that pushes away enemies and lasts for 20 turns, at the cost of 3 charges.

The wall can be placed cardinally or diagonally, only one wall can exist at a time.
target:
_+1：_圣骑士可以施放法术_神圣屏障_，消耗3点充能以在圣骑士面前创造一面持续20回合，_3格宽_，可击退敌人的坚固墙壁。

_+2：_圣骑士可以施放法术_神圣屏障_，消耗3点充能以在圣骑士面前创造一面持续20回合，_5格宽_，可击退敌人的坚固墙壁。

_+3：_圣骑士可以施放法术_神圣屏障_，消耗3点充能以在圣骑士面前创造一面持续20回合，_7格宽_，可击退敌人的坚固墙壁。

神圣屏障可被正向或斜向施放，同时只能存在一面屏障。

source: divine intervention
target: 神圣干预

source:
_+1:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Divine Intervention,_ which boosts the Cleric and all allies up to _150 shielding_ and extends Ascended Form by _3 turns._

_+2:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Divine Intervention,_ which boosts the Cleric and all allies up to _200 shielding_ and extends Ascended Form by _4 turns._

_+3:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Divine Intervention,_ which boosts the Cleric and all allies up to _250 shielding_ and extends Ascended Form by _5 turns._

_+4:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Divine Intervention,_ which boosts the Cleric and all allies up to _300 shielding_ and extends Ascended Form by _6 turns._

Divine Intervention costs a whopping 5 tome charges, and can only be cast once in the same ascended form.
target:
_+1：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_神圣干预_，以强化牧师与所有盟友的护盾至_150点_并延长超凡升天_3回合_。

_+2：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_神圣干预_，以强化牧师与所有盟友的护盾至_200点_并延长超凡升天_4回合_。

_+3：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_神圣干预_，以强化牧师与所有盟友的护盾至_250点_并延长超凡升天_5回合_。

_+4：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_神圣干预_，以强化牧师与所有盟友的护盾至_300点_并延长超凡升天_6回合_。

神圣干预消耗高达5点圣典充能，并且在同次超凡升天中只能施放一次神圣干预。

source: judgement
target: 终末天启

source:
_+1:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Judgement,_ which deals _10-20 damage_ to all visible enemies.

_+2:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Judgement,_ which deals _15-30 damage_ to all visible enemies.

_+3:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Judgement,_ which deals _20-40 damage_ to all visible enemies.

_+4:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Judgement,_ which deals _25-50 damage_ to all visible enemies.

Judgement costs 3 tome charges. Judgement deals +33% damage for every spell the Cleric has cast since entering ascended form or since the last cast of Judgement.
target:
_+1：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_终末天启_，以对视野内所有敌人造成_10~20点伤害_。

_+2：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_终末天启_，以对视野内所有敌人造成_15~30点伤害_。

_+3：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_终末天启_，以对视野内所有敌人造成_20~40点伤害_。

_+4：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_终末天启_，以对视野内所有敌人造成_25~50点伤害_。

终末天启消耗3点圣典充能。牧师自进入超凡升天以来或自上次施放终末天启以来的每次施法都会额外造成33%伤害。

source: flash
target: 天堂阶梯

source:
_+1:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Flash_ to teleport up to _3 tiles_ away.

_+2:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Flash_ to teleport up to _4 tiles_ away.

_+3:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Flash_ to teleport up to _5 tiles_ away.

_+4:_ While in Ascended Form, the Cleric can cast _Flash_ to teleport up to _6 tiles_ away.

Flash costs 2 tome charges initially, and 1 more charge for each use in the same ascended form.
target:
_+1：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_天堂阶梯_，以传送至最多_3格_外。

_+2：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_天堂阶梯_，以传送至最多_4格_外。

_+3：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_天堂阶梯_，以传送至最多_5格_外。

_+4：_开启超凡升天时，牧师可以施放法术_天堂阶梯_，以传送至最多_6格_外。

天堂阶梯初始消耗2点圣典充能，并且在同次开启超凡升天时每次施放都会+1充能消耗。

source: body form
target: 体之位格

source:
The Cleric can cast _Body Form_, which imbues Trinity with the power of an enchantment or glyph that the Cleric has identified this run, at the cost of 2 charges.

_+1:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric gains the chosen effect for _20 turns._

_+2:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric gains the chosen effect for _27 turns._

_+3:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric gains the chosen effect for _33 turns._

_+4:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric gains the chosen effect for _40 turns._

Trinity can only be imbued with one body effect at a time. Trinity's armor charge cost is higher if the chosen glyph is rare and powerful.
target:
牧师可以施放法术_体之位格_，消耗2点充能以使三位一体幻化牧师本局已鉴定的附魔或刻印。

_+1：_使用三位一体时，牧师会获得所选附魔或刻印的效果_20回合_。

_+2：_使用三位一体时，牧师会获得所选附魔或刻印的效果_27回合_。

_+3：_使用三位一体时，牧师会获得所选附魔或刻印的效果_33回合_。

_+4：_使用三位一体时，牧师会获得所选附魔或刻印效果_40回合_。

三位一体同时只能幻化一种体之位格效果。选择罕见而强力的刻印时，三位一体的护甲充能消耗更高。

source: mind form
target: 智之位格

source:
The Cleric can cast _Mind Form_, which imbues Trinity with the power of a wand or thrown weapon that the Cleric has used this run, at the cost of 3 charges.

_+1:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric uses the zap or throw effect of the chosen item, as if it were _+3._

_+2:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric uses the zap or throw effect of the chosen item, as if it were _+4._

_+3:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric uses the zap or throw effect of the chosen item, as if it were _+5._

_+4:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric uses the zap or throw effect of the chosen item, as if it were _+6._

Trinity can only be imbued with one mind effect at a time.
target:
牧师可以施放法术_智之位格_，消耗3点充能以使三位一体幻化牧师本局已使用的法杖或投武。

_+1：_使用三位一体时，牧师会使用所选法杖或投武的_3级_效果。

_+2：_使用三位一体时，牧师会使用所选法杖或投武的_4级_效果。

_+3：_使用三位一体时，牧师会使用所选法杖或投武的_5级_效果。

_+4：_使用三位一体时，牧师会使用所选法杖或投武的_6级_效果。

三位一体同时只能幻化一种智之位格效果。

source: spirit form
target: 魂之位格

source:
The Cleric can cast _Spirit Form_, which imbues Trinity with the power of a ring or artifact that the Cleric has identified this run (except the holy tome), at the cost of 4 charges.

_+1:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric will gain a ring's effect at _+1_ for 20 turns, or will trigger an artifact's effect at _+4._

_+2:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric will gain a ring's effect at _+2_ for 20 turns, or will trigger an artifact's effect at _+6._

_+3:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric will gain a ring's effect at _+3_ for 20 turns, or will trigger an artifact's effect at _+8._

_+4:_ When Trinity is used, the Cleric will gain a ring's effect at _+4_ for 20 turns, or will trigger an artifact's effect at _+10._

Trinity can only be imbued with one spirit effect at a time. Artifacts have varied effects and armor charge costs when triggered by Trinity.
target:
牧师可以施放法术_魂之位格_，消耗4点充能以使三位一体幻化牧师本局已鉴定的戒指或神器(神圣法典除外)。

_+1：_使用三位一体时，牧师会获得所选戒指的_1级_效果20回合或使用所选神器的_4级_效果。

_+2：_使用三位一体时，牧师会获得所选戒指的_2级_效果20回合或使用所选神器的_6级_效果。

_+3：_使用三位一体时，牧师会获得所选戒指的_3级_效果20回合或使用所选神器的_8级_效果。

_+4：_使用三位一体时，牧师会获得所选戒指的_4级_效果20回合或使用所选神器的_10级_效果。

三位一体同时只能幻化一种魂之位格效果。通过三位一体使用神器时效果与护甲充能消耗因神器而异。

source: beaming ray
target: 光灵召唤

source:
The Cleric can cast _Beaming Ray_ from an empowered ally at the cost of 1 charge. This ray can go through walls and teleports the ally to a targeted location. If an enemy is at that location, the ally appears next to the enemy and will target them. Beaming Ray can even teleport normally immobile allies, but has half range when doing so.

_+1:_ Beaming Ray has a max range of _4 tiles,_ and increases Power of Many's bonus to _+35% damage_ against the closest enemy for 10 turns.

_+2:_ Beaming Ray has a max range of _8 tiles,_ and increases Power of Many's bonus to _+40% damage_ against the closest enemy for 10 turns.

_+3:_ Beaming Ray has a max range of _12 tiles,_ and increases Power of Many's bonus to _+45% damage_ against the closest enemy for 10 turns.

_+4:_ Beaming Ray has a max range of _16 tiles,_ and increases Power of Many's bonus to _+50% damage_ against the closest enemy for 10 turns.
target:
牧师可以施放法术_光灵召唤_，消耗1点充能以使强化盟友释放传送光束。光束可穿透墙壁并传送盟友至指定位置。若该位置有敌人，盟友会出现在敌人附近并将其作为攻击目标。该法术还可传送通常情况下无法移动的盟友，但若如此做则传送光束范围减半。

_+1：_传送光束的最大范围为_4格_，并使万物一心对最近敌人的伤害加成提升至_35%_，持续10回合。

_+2：_传送光束的最大范围为_8格_，并使万物一心对最近敌人的伤害加成提升至_40%_，持续10回合。

_+3：_传送光束的最大范围为_12格_，并使万物一心对最近敌人的伤害加成提升至_45%_，持续10回合。

_+4：_传送光束的最大范围为_16格_，并使万物一心对最近敌人的伤害加成提升至_50%_，持续10回合。

source: life link
target: 血色羁绊

source:
The Cleric can cast _Life Link_ between themselves and an empowered ally at the cost of 2 charges. This spell causes damage to be shared between the Cleric and their ally, and causes beneficial cleric spells of tier 3 or lower to apply to both if either is being affected.

_+1:_ Life Link lasts for _10 turns_ and increases Power of Many's bonus to _-35% damage taken._

_+2:_ Life Link lasts for _13 turns_ and increases Power of Many's bonus to _-40% damage taken._

_+3:_ Life Link lasts for _17 turns_ and increases Power of Many's bonus to _-45% damage taken._

_+4:_ Life Link lasts for _20 turns_ and increases Power of Many's bonus to _-50% damage taken._
target:
牧师可以施放法术_血色羁绊_，消耗2点充能以使牧师自身与强化盟友之间建立生命联结。该法术会使牧师与其盟友共享所受伤害，并使3阶及以下的增益型牧师法术对任何一方施放时对双方均生效。

_+1：_生命联结持续_10回合_并使万物一心的伤害减免提升至_35%_。

_+2：_生命联结持续_13回合_并使万物一心的伤害减免提升至_40%_。

_+3：_生命联结持续_17回合_并使万物一心的伤害减免提升至_45%_。

_+4：_生命联结持续_20回合_并使万物一心的伤害减免提升至_50%_。

source: Stasis
target: 星界投射

source:
The Cleric can cast _Stasis_ on an empowered ally at the cost of 2 charges. Stasis temporarily removes the ally from the dungeon and preserves the remaining time on all buffs, including Power of Many. The ally will reappear next to you when the effect ends. Stasis can be re-cast instantly and at no cost to end the effect early. Stasis works on immobile allies, but cannot move them between dungeon floors.

_+1:_ Stasis lasts for a max of _60 turns._

_+2:_ Stasis lasts for a max of _90 turns._

_+3:_ Stasis lasts for a max of _120 turns._

_+4:_ Stasis lasts for a max of _150 turns._

The Cleric can also cast Beaming Ray when an ally is in stasis to resummon them, or cast Life Link to pre-emptively apply its effect. Allies do not benefit from Life Link while in stasis however.
target:
牧师可以施放法术_星界投射_，消耗2点充能以凝滞强化盟友。该法术会将盟友临时移出地牢，并保留其包括万物一心在内的所有增益效果的剩余时间。当法术效果结束时盟友会在你附近再次出现。该法术可被无消耗地立即再次施放，以提前结束法术效果。该法术对无法移动的盟友也会生效，但无法将其跨层移动。

_+1：_凝滞状态最多持续_60回合_。

_+2：_凝滞状态最多持续_90回合_。

_+3：_凝滞状态最多持续_120回合_。

_+4：_凝滞状态最多持续_150回合_。

当有盟友处于凝滞状态时，牧师还可施放光灵召唤以再次召唤盟友，或施放血色羁绊以使盟友提前获得法术效果。然而，凝滞状态下的盟友无法从血色羁绊的法术效果中获得效益。

source: heroic energy
target: 英勇能量

source: ratroic energy
target: 阴勇能量

source:
_+1:_ The hero's armor ability has a _12% reduced_ charge cost.

_+2:_ The hero's armor ability has a _23% reduced_ charge cost.

_+3:_ The hero's armor ability has a _32% reduced_ charge cost.

_+4:_ The hero's armor ability has a _40% reduced_ charge cost.

_+1：_发动英雄护甲能力的充能消耗_减少12%_。

_+2：_发动英雄护甲能力的充能消耗_减少23%_。

_+3：_发动英雄护甲能力的充能消耗_减少32%_。

_+4：_发动英雄护甲能力的充能消耗_减少40%_。

source: ratsistance
target: 鼠手鼠脚

source:
_+1:_ Hostile ratmogrified enemies deal _-10% damage_.

_+2:_ Hostile ratmogrified enemies deal _-19% damage_.

_+3:_ Hostile ratmogrified enemies deal _-27% damage_.

_+4:_ Hostile ratmogrified enemies deal _-35% damage_.
target:
_+1：_被鼠化的敌人造成的伤害会降低_10%_。

_+2：_被鼠化的敌人造成的伤害会降低_19%_。

_+3：_被鼠化的敌人造成的伤害会降低_27%_。

_+4：_被鼠化的敌人造成的伤害会降低_35%_。

target: 外交鼠段

_+2:_ Using ratmogrify on a ratmogrified enemy makes them friendly, makes the transformation permanent, and gives them _2 turns_ of adrenaline.

_+3:_ Using ratmogrify on a ratmogrified enemy makes them friendly, makes the transformation permanent, and gives them _4 turns_ of adrenaline.

_+4:_ Using ratmogrify on a ratmogrified enemy makes them friendly, makes the transformation permanent, and gives them _6 turns_ of adrenaline.
target:
_+1：_对被鼠化的敌人再次使用鼠化术会固化老鼠形态并将其永久转化为友军。

_+2：_对被鼠化的敌人再次使用鼠化术会固化老鼠形态并将其永久转化为友军，并赋予其_2回合_的激素涌动。

_+3：_对被鼠化的敌人再次使用鼠化术会固化老鼠形态并将其永久转化为友军，并赋予其_4回合_的激素涌动。

_+4：_对被鼠化的敌人再次使用鼠化术会固化老鼠形态并将其永久转化为友军，并赋予其_6回合_的激素涌动。

source: ratforcements
target: 吱援部队

source:
_+1:_ Using ratmogrify on yourself _spawns 1_ ally marsupial rat next to you.

_+2:_ Using ratmogrify on yourself _spawns 2_ ally marsupial rats next to you.

_+3:_ Using ratmogrify on yourself _spawns 3_ ally marsupial rats next to you.

_+4:_ Using ratmogrify on yourself _spawns 4_ ally marsupial rats next to you.

_+1：_以自身为目标使用鼠化术会在身边_召唤1只_友军啮齿小鼠。

_+2：_以自身为目标使用鼠化术会在身边_召唤2只_友军啮齿小鼠。

_+3：_以自身为目标使用鼠化术会在身边_召唤3只_友军啮齿小鼠。
